Sol Levante is a visionary residential project that redefines modern living by harmonizing architecture, nature, and community. Designed to embrace the rhythm of the sun, its dynamic façade plays with light and shadow, creating an ever-changing visual experience. Expansive terraces, panoramic windows, and a thoughtfully designed multi-facility podium dissolve the boundaries between indoor and outdoor spaces, fostering a sense of openness, vitality, and tranquility.

More than just a residence, Sol Levante is an immersive lifestyle experience where well-being and social connection take center stage. The elevated podium serves as a vibrant social and recreational hub, offering a diverse array of amenities, including a swimming pool with sunken seating, a state-of-the-art gym, an outdoor cinema, yoga and meditation areas, a pet-friendly space, and a suspended running track with panoramic views. Every element is meticulously crafted to inspire movement, relaxation, and a deep sense of belonging within a thriving community.

Each residence at Sol Levante is designed with elegance and functionality in mind, maximizing natural light and open layouts to create an effortless connection with the surrounding environment. Floor-to-ceiling windows and spacious terraces invite breathtaking views into everyday life, while modern design principles ensure both comfort and sophistication. At Sol Levante, residents are invited to shape their own journey, surrounded by an atmosphere of harmony, innovation, and limitless possibilities.

title: Lume Residences
description:
Project general facts
Where simplicity meets satisfaction, and energy ignites excitement. LUME is a space designed to reflect the vibrancy of community—future-forward, bright, and bold. It is illuminated living at its finest, bringing more life in with every detail. Designed to redefine urban living, it offers a range of meticulously crafted apartments, including studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units.

Floor-to-ceiling windows maximise natural light and connect to the outdoors, bringing the energy of Jumeirah Village Circle inside and transforming every apartment into a haven of comfort. Smartly placed nooks and refined details — such as state-of-the-art appliances, rich terracotta and burgundy paint and fabrics, and custom pendant lighting — add a mature, timeless touch, allowing you to live, work, and soak in the energy of your surroundings.

Finishing and materials
The interplay of natural light, premium finishes, and modern fixtures defines LUME. Off- white shades bring a serene and minimalist ambiance, while brushed gold finishes and reflective wall accents add a touch of elegance and depth. Each apartment features carefully selected materials, from sleek, high-quality laminate wood flooring to custom- designed cabinetry and countertops.

title: The Oasis Address
description:
The Oasis Address is an extraordinary extension of an ultra-luxurious community, meticulously designed to offer an unparalleled living experience. Spanning an impressive 2,295,069 square meters, this phase continues the legacy of exclusivity with a harmonious blend of opulence and tranquility. A breathtaking network of water elements weaves through the landscape, crafting an enchanting atmosphere that elevates everyday living into a sensory masterpiece.

This exquisite development is a testament to thoughtful planning, with 103,422 square meters of shimmering waterways and 233,000 square meters of lush green parks, ensuring an environment of serenity and grandeur. Each residence is thoughtfully positioned to provide privacy, space, and seamless integration with nature, redefining the art of sophisticated living. The ultra-low-density concept ensures that residents enjoy vast, open spaces while being surrounded by meticulously curated landscapes.

Beyond its architectural and natural beauty, The Oasis Address stands as a remarkable investment opportunity. With its meticulously planned infrastructure and commitment to excellence, this development offers exceptional potential for long-term value appreciation. It is more than a residential destination—it is a sanctuary of luxury, exclusivity, and enduring worth.

title: IR1DIAN Park
description:
Welcome to IR1DIAN Park, a residential masterpiece inspired by the captivating interplay of light and color. Designed to embody the essence of iridescence, this development offers a dynamic and visually stunning living experience, where architectural elegance meets the natural beauty of its surroundings. Every detail has been thoughtfully curated to create an atmosphere of harmony, sophistication, and contemporary comfort.

At IR1DIAN Park, modern design seamlessly integrates with functionality to enhance everyday living. Spacious layouts, abundant natural light, and high-quality finishes come together to offer residents a refined yet practical home environment. Whether it's the serene ambiance of the interiors or the thoughtfully designed shared spaces, each element contributes to a lifestyle that is both inspiring and effortlessly convenient.

Beyond its striking aesthetics, IR1DIAN Park fosters a sense of well-being through a selection of essential amenities that cater to relaxation, leisure, and community engagement. The development is designed to encourage a balanced lifestyle, providing residents with inviting outdoor areas, wellness-focused facilities, and spaces that nurture social connections. It’s a place where modern sophistication meets the warmth of a true home.

title: Costa Mare
description:
Costa Mare is an extraordinary residential development on Al Marjan Island, Ras Al Khaimah, featuring four architecturally stunning towers that blend seamlessly with their natural surroundings. Designed to capture the beauty of the mountains and the sea, Costa Mare presents a refined aesthetic with earthy tones, fluid shapes, and breathtaking views. Every residence is crafted with elegance, ensuring an atmosphere of tranquility and exclusivity.

The amenities at Costa Mare set a new benchmark for luxury and leisure, offering residents an unmatched living experience. The development boasts a private beach, multiple infinity pools, and beautifully landscaped communal spaces that encourage relaxation and social connection. Sports enthusiasts can enjoy the padel court, jogging tracks, and fitness studios, while families have access to dedicated kids' play areas and clubhouses. Additional features such as a cinema room, wellness studio, and immersive dining spaces elevate the lifestyle.

Costa Mare’s strategic location offers seamless connectivity to Ras Al Khaimah’s best attractions and conveniences. Also the development's thoughtful design integrates green spaces and waterfront serenity, creating a perfect balance between modernity and nature. With its sophisticated architecture, premium amenities, and breathtaking setting, Costa Mare stands as a pinnacle of luxurious coastal living.

title: Society House
description:
Society House at Downtown Dubai is a pinnacle of architectural brilliance by Invest Group Overseas that offers luxury studios, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. The high-rise architecture is nestled amidst the iconic cityscape as an exclusive 52-storey façade that is a testament to the ambitious, accomplished, and like-minded individuals who call it home.

As you step foot into the development, you enter a world where luxury, convenience, and community converge. Designed to reflect their never-ending drive, this architectural masterpiece stands tall as a symbol of ambition and success in the world's most dynamic city. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to cater to the discerning tastes of esteemed residents. The stunning architecture harmoniously blends modern aesthetics with timeless elegance, captivating the senses at every turn.

The development is strategically located in the heart of the city, offering unparalleled access to the vibrant cultural, entertainment, and business hubs of Dubai. Explore the world-class shopping destinations, indulge in gourmet dining experiences, or take in the mesmerizing performances at the nearby Dubai Opera.

Step outside your doorstep and witness the magnificent Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world, standing as a testament to human ingenuity and ambition. Wander through the beautifully landscaped parks, stroll along the stylish boulevards, and immerse yourself in the captivating spirit of Downtown Dubai.

The luxury development invites you to join an exclusive community of achievers, where luxury meets purpose and where dreams are turned into reality. Experience a life of distinction, where every moment is filled with inspiration, every amenity exceeds expectations, and every connection has the potential to transform your future.

title: Pelagos by IGO
description:
Pelagos by IGO is a standout residential project located in the prestigious Dubai Marina, offering a luxurious lifestyle with a variety of apartment types to suit diverse preferences. Prospective buyers can choose from elegant studios, spacious one-bedroom apartments, and stunning two-bedroom options. Each apartment is meticulously designed to offer breathtaking, unobstructed views of either the Dubai Marina or the shimmering sea. The project’s prime location and striking design ensure residents enjoy not just beautiful views but also a vibrant, iconic lifestyle. Pelagos by IGO embodies a perfect balance of glamour, identity, and freedom, elevating the concept of contemporary living.

The world-class amenities at Pelagos by IGO further elevate the living experience, ensuring residents have everything they need for a vibrant lifestyle. The fully equipped gym is ideal for fitness enthusiasts, providing top-notch equipment in a sleek, modern environment. Residents can also unwind by the pristine swimming pool or enjoy gatherings in the multi-purpose hall. For those who prefer the outdoors, the project offers a serene outdoor seating area, perfect for relaxation or casual socializing. These amenities combine functionality with luxury, making every day feel like a retreat.

Beyond its lavish interiors and amenities, Pelagos by IGO stands out with its unparalleled location and stunning design, ensuring residents are always surrounded by beauty and energy. The development is perfect for individuals who seek an active, dynamic lifestyle with all the comforts of modern living. Its prime waterfront location offers not just views but a sense of serenity amidst the bustling cityscape. The combination of luxurious apartments, breathtaking vistas, and premium amenities make Pelagos by IGO more than just a residence - it's a lifestyle statement.

title: Esme Beach Residences
description:
Esme Beach Residences at Dubai Islands is the prestigious residential milestone by Elysian Development that covers sea-facing luxurious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Live tastefully by the refined and natural shore-side beauty of the island. Including sophisticated and subtly designed contemporary infrastructure, this enticing housing complex is blending the modernity with the comfortable and aesthetic interiors alongside the delightful and never-ending picturesque scenery of the Arabian Gulf. This exquisite oasis is an exclusive gateway to the private sandy beach, shimmering ocean water and a diverse range of amenities. Embrace a neighbourhood that is expected to be a pulsating heart for visitors that features precious beaches, marinas, high-end resorts, parks, golf courses and multiple urban elements.

From Dubai Islands' Island A arises the residences which creates both connectivity and luxury. The strategic position at the Islands offers simple connections to Dubai's main landmarks along with peaceful residential living. Through a brief transit you can transform from your time in Downtown Dubai's active zones to relaxing on your seaside home. The growth of Dubai Islands through their upcoming bridge to Dubai will turn this location into a prime urban entrance for city access. Through its key transportation links to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Islands Mall with Dubai International Airport and vibrant marinas; the façade places all necessary comforts within easy reach for residents.

The extra-vantage façade showcases state-of-the-art architectural design as its main artistic feature. The residence shows ocean-inspired curved walls, which capture ocean waves and its modernistic design shows respect for local natural surroundings. The architectural masterpiece combines practical needs with beautiful form to create a beautiful home. The extensive living space design of these residences provides accommodation solutions for a diverse range of people starting from families up to solitary residents who seek their ideal rest point. The development serves people wishing to achieve luxury living combined with peaceful surroundings and practical execution of their spaces.

title: Zenith J1
description:
Zenith J1 is a stunning tower in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle, offering a modern and luxurious lifestyle. The project features a range of beautifully designed apartments, including Studio, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom options, catering to different needs and preferences. Each apartment is thoughtfully crafted with high-quality finishes and spacious layouts to ensure maximum comfort. With its prime location and elegant design, Zenith J1 stands out as a perfect place to call home.

The amenities at Zenith J1 are truly world-class, offering everything needed for relaxation, fitness, and entertainment. Residents can enjoy a refreshing swim in the leisure pool deck, unwind in the jacuzzi, or stay active in the fully equipped gym. Families will love the kids' play area and dedicated children’s pool, creating a safe and fun environment for little ones. Additionally, the project includes a pet care facility, a coffee shop, and a bar, ensuring convenience and social opportunities right at your doorstep.

Beyond its luxurious apartments and outstanding amenities, Zenith J1 also embraces a lifestyle of comfort and ease. The presence of a sauna and laundry facility adds extra convenience, making everyday living stress-free. Green areas provide a peaceful retreat, creating a perfect balance between nature and urban living. Zenith J1 is more than just a residence - it is a vibrant community designed for those who appreciate elegance, relaxation, and modern living at its finest.

title: Coastal Haven
description:
Project general facts
Coastal Haven by Prestige One is a masterpiece of luxury living, blending modern elegance with the tranquility of seaside serenity. Designed for those who seek both sophistication and relaxation, this prestigious residential enclave offers an unparalleled lifestyle where every detail is meticulously crafted to perfection.

From its striking architectural design to its thoughtfully curated interiors, Coastal Haven embodies a seamless harmony between nature and contemporary refinement. Expansive windows invite breathtaking views, while open-concept living spaces create an airy, sunlit ambiance.

Beyond the residences, Coastal Haven presents an array of world-class amenities designed to elevate everyday living. Residents can indulge in infinity pools overlooking scenic horizons, unwind in lushly landscaped gardens, or stay active in state-of-the-art fitness and wellness facilities. 

Finishing and materials
At Coastal Haven designed a lifestyle that is as effortless as it is elegant. Every detail, from the finest materials to the most innovative technologies, has been carefully considered to provide with the ultimate in comfort and convenience.

title: Firoza
description:
Firoza offers an exclusive collection of luxury residences designed to provide an elevated living experience. Spread across eight residential floors and complemented by a dedicated parking level, the project features fully furnished 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments. Each residence is thoughtfully designed with spacious layouts, contemporary furnishings, and premium finishes to cater to the refined tastes of modern homeowners.

Residents can enjoy a host of high-class amenities that blend comfort with convenience, creating a harmonious living environment. From serene landscaped areas to fitness facilities and social spaces, every detail is crafted to enhance daily life. The project's seamless integration of luxury and functionality ensures that every resident enjoys a perfect blend of tranquility and sophistication.

Located within the vibrant Dubai Islands community, the development offers unparalleled connectivity to the mainland and easy access to top-tier schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and entertainment hubs. With pristine beaches, marinas, and green spaces just moments away, residents are immersed in a lifestyle that balances urban living with the natural beauty of Dubai's coastal landscape.

title: Terra Heights
description:
Terra Heights offers a perfect blend of connectivity and tranquility, located just a 5-minute walk from Expo City. The community features modern 1- and 2-bedroom apartments designed with open layouts that invite natural light, offering views of serene courtyards and the dynamic Expo City skyline.

The development is centered around lush landscaped gardens and open spaces, with a podium-level courtyard serving as a gathering spot for relaxation or socializing. Residents can enjoy a variety of amenities, including adult and kids’ pools, a yoga deck, multipurpose sports courts, a mini-golf area, and barbecue spots for evenings with friends and family.

As part of the vibrant Expo Living community, Terra Heights combines thoughtful architecture and functional design with peaceful green spaces. This makes it an ideal choice for those seeking a modern lifestyle enriched by convenience, comfort, and opportunities for leisure.

Finishing and materials
The interiors at Terra Heights feature modern finishes crafted with high-quality materials, including sleek countertops and backsplashes, elegant glass shutters for wardrobes and kitchens, and refined joinery details for a polished and contemporary look.

title: Pierside Marina Residences
description:
Pierside Marina Residences is a premium waterfront development by Sobha Realty. Situated on the scenic Siniyah Island in Umm Al Quwain, the project offers a serene coastal living experience where modern architectural aesthetics seamlessly blend with the natural beauty of the island. The residences in all three complexes feature elegant interiors and contemporary designs, providing a harmonious and luxurious lifestyle.

Residents of Pierside Marina enjoy an array of top-tier amenities, including infinity swimming pools, state-of-the-art fitness centers, and beautifully landscaped parks. Each complex offers access to exclusive recreational facilities like jogging and cycling trails, water sports areas, and children's play zones, ensuring a well-rounded and active lifestyle. The natural beauty of the island, with its pristine beaches and lush mangroves, creates an idyllic backdrop for relaxation and outdoor pursuits.

This development is part of the larger Sobha Siniya Island project, which is designed with eco-friendly principles and high-quality construction. The strategic location of Siniyah Island, with excellent transport links to Dubai and Sharjah, provides residents with the perfect balance of serene island life and urban convenience. Whether enjoying breathtaking views of the sea or exploring the island's vibrant community spaces, Pierside Marina Residences offers a unique and rewarding living experience.

title: Belgravia Gardens
description:
Belgravia Gardens is set to offer an exceptional lifestyle in an idyllic location, where convenience and luxury seamlessly merge. Residents will enjoy a vibrant community with everything they need right at their doorstep, from a variety of retail options to easy access to the beach. The development features expansive recreational amenities, including a large swimmable pool and multiple sports courts, ensuring there's something for everyone to enjoy. A central island pavilion serves as the heart of the community, offering a range of activities for all age groups.

The project comprises four stylish courtyard buildings designed for modern living. With options ranging from studio apartments to spacious 1, 2, and 3-bedroom, Belgravia Gardens caters to diverse lifestyles and family needs. Each residence is thoughtfully designed to maximize space, light, and comfort, making it the ideal place to call home.

In addition to its impressive array of amenities, Belgravia Gardens fosters a sense of community with its unique layout and proximity to outdoor leisure spaces. Whether you're relaxing by the pool, engaging in sports, or spending time at the central pavilion, this development provides a perfect balance of relaxation and activity. It's a place where residents can truly thrive and experience an enriched way of living.

title: 77 Boulevard
description:
77 Boulevard’s exterior design seamlessly blends sunlight, space, and style. Natural light fills every corner, creating bright, open spaces that flow effortlessly. Even car parking areas are thoughtfully designed, balancing beauty with functionality to enhance the building’s overall aesthetic.

Experience luxury through elegantly designed corridors with ambient lighting and sophisticated finishes. The marble-clad lobby and elevator lobbies create a striking first impression, while landscaped pathways surrounded by lush greenery and contemporary lighting offer a peaceful retreat. State-of-the-art amenities such as pools, top-tier fitness centers, and spa lounges ensure a lifestyle of unparalleled luxury.

77 Boulevard includes lounge areas, co-working spaces, and wellness facilities, designed to support both professional and leisure lifestyles. Landscaped pathways and green spaces enhance the surroundings, while fitness and recreational amenities ensure a balanced living environment.

title: The Chedi Private Residences
description:
The Chedi Private Residences at Sheikh Zayed Road is a futuristic and ground breaking collaboration between Devmark and Al Seeb Real Estate Development lined with premium 2 to 5-bedroom villas and 6 to 8 bedroom Mansions. This high-rise 52-storey architectural masterpiece combines vertical living ascends 254 meters into the sky, with luxury residential spaces that incorporate both premium shopping opportunities and seven-star hotel services and elite facilities. The amazing architectural framework is inspired by the Dubai's skyline and demonstrates advanced contemporary architecture techniques alongside sustainable development methods. International architecture studio Bruno Guelaff Studio created these one of its kind residences which represents superb design excellence.

Situated on Sheikh Zayed Road, the residences position its inhabitants close to Dubai’s dynamic urban core. With its unparalleled connectivity, this location seamlessly intertwines urban energy with serene exclusivity. An easy connection leads residents from their residence to the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC) as well as Downtown Dubai and the celebrated leisure locations The Palm Jumeirah and Burj Al Arab. The dwelling area offers a peaceful haven as people escape the hectic bustle of Downtown Dubai outside its premises. The balance between metropolitan flair and individual comfort exists perfectly within this development, which grants its inhabitants excellent access to urban vitality while providing them their private retreat space.

A dreamlike experience occurs here because extensive sky gardens stretch out from private terraces to create flawless spaces between home and outdoors. Privacy comes first at this development because each home is equipped with semi-private as well as elevator lobbies that create a private arrival experience. Every sky villa or sky Mansions, presents itself as a masterpiece offering residents exceptional private havens located above the city. Under Dubai sunshine, the signature architecture shows its glass exterior which depicts the city built by ambitious innovators. The Pinnacle Mansion alongside Sanctuary Villas form part of an exceptional residential lineup at the tower that includes the majestic duplex and triplex within the buildings.

title: Sky Hills Astra
description:
Sky Hills Astra is a visionary residential masterpiece in Dubai offering an exquisite selection of residences - including Studio, One-Bedroom with Study room, and also Two-Bedroom Duplexes apartments. Every home is a seamless blend of elegance, comfort, and modern sophistication. Rising gracefully from a three-level podium, its twin towers stand as a beacon of architectural brilliance, framing breathtaking skyline views.

Beyond its beautifully designed homes, Sky Hills Astra presents an unparalleled lifestyle enriched with world-class amenities. A serene open-air wellness sanctuary invites residents to embrace mindfulness through yoga and meditation, while a dual-track running podium, cutting-edge fitness center, and professional padel court cater to an active lifestyle. The tranquil beach-style sandy pool offers a blissful escape, and the private business center with a library creates the perfect setting for productivity and reflection.

In partnership with Dubai Cares, the project has pledged AED 30 million to global education initiatives, ensuring that every resident becomes a part of something greater. Eco-conscious innovation is at the heart of its design, with a ReGen irrigation system that repurposes greywater, smart energy solutions that minimize waste, and dedicated electric vehicle charging stations. More than just a place to live, Sky Hills Astra is a community with a bigger purpose—offering a future where luxury meets responsibility, eco-friendly living is a priority, and every home makes a positive impact.

title: Wellington Ocean
description:
Wellington Ocean is a prestigious development that redefines coastal living in Dubai Islands. Designed to blend modern elegance with the beauty of the sea, this low-rise architectural gem offers a collection of thoughtfully crafted residences with breathtaking views. The development captures the essence of sophisticated waterfront living, with clean lines, expansive glass facades, and seamless indoor-outdoor spaces that create a tranquil yet luxurious atmosphere.

Wellington Ocean features an exclusive selection of one- and two-bedroom apartments, including residences with private pools or study rooms, and two duplex units, catering to diverse lifestyle preferences. Each home is designed with contemporary interiors, open-plan layouts, and high-end finishes, ensuring a refined living experience. The ground floor welcomes residents with an elegant reception, while the podium level provides secure parking and world-class amenities.

Beyond its beautifully designed homes, Wellington Ocean offers an elevated lifestyle with an array of exclusive leisure and wellness facilities. The podium and rooftop levels feature a swimming pool, mini golf, a lounge, and serene yoga pods. Whether unwinding by the ocean, enjoying outdoor activities, or embracing the vibrant community, Wellington Ocean delivers an unparalleled living experience in one of Dubai’s most sought-after waterfront locations.

title: Hillsedge at Dubai Hills Estate
description:
Hillsedge at Dubai Hills Estate is the forthcoming luxurious residential development by renowned Emaar Properties, lined with plush 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Discover this new façade, where modern urban living meets tranquillity of nature set within the Dubai’s green heart. The façade offers premium homes, designed for those who seek a perfect balance between vibrant city life and serene landscapes. With stunning views of Dubai Hills Park and the Iconic city skylines, each home provides a picturesque backdrop that elevates your living experience. Get along with the art of active living that keeps inspiring and encouraging you to live to the fullest your every day.

Witness an escape that acquires both urban living and breathtaking serenity at the same place. Popular as the green heart of Dubai, this one-of-a-kind destination is the integrated part of the MBR City that is close to the city’s prime metropolitan and popular attractions and yet distant from its hustle. Situated close to the Al Khail Road, this project is a collection of multiple mid-rises complexes that are surrounded by the prime landmarks of Dubai Hills Park and the 18-hole championship Hills Estate Golf Course. Unwind in the active and engaging vibrant life at the interconnected parks or rejuvenate at the professional golf course. Dubai Hills Mall is another centre of attraction with over thousands of shopping, retail, cafe and dining outlets that promote all- inclusive urban indulgences for the natives.

Rising gracefully in the open skyline of the serene community, this development offers a dazzling view of Hillside Park, which is the hub of well-being and the sweeping verdant locality. The artfully crafted architecture of this project exudes the minimalistic yet attractive modernity that blends with the surroundings’ nature. Explore the interiors of your home, where each detail has been stricken to make life easier, more convenient, brighter, and joyfulful. There are 204 units of one-bedroom homes and 202 numbers of two-bedroom units. The distinctive features of floor-to-ceiling windows, modern finishes and bespoke furnishing with spacious layout ensure a desired living.

Living at the unveils infinite opportunities where you can live, interact, refresh and thrive at ease within the wholesome environment. Many integrated amenities within this development ensure everything is always available at the fingertips of the natives.

title: 105 Residences
description:
105 Residences by Kamdar is a masterpiece of modern luxury, offering a selection of stunning studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartments, including exclusive units with private pools. Nestled in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle, this exquisite development is designed to provide residents with a sophisticated and serene living experience. Every home boasts impeccable design, high-end finishes, and smart layouts that maximize space and comfort.

The amenities at 105 Residences by Kamdar are truly exceptional, providing an unparalleled lifestyle of relaxation and recreation. Residents can unwind at the rooftop open-air cinema, find peace in the Zen garden, or socialize in the stylish rooftop lounge with breathtaking city views. The podium level features a stunning swimming pool, a dedicated kids’ pool, and a multipurpose court for sports enthusiasts. A fully equipped fitness studio, and outdoor play area further enhance the living experience, making every moment one of indulgence and comfort.

Designed with the highest standards in mind, 105 Residences by Kamdar is a perfect blend of luxury and practicality. The interiors showcase sleek, modern finishes inspired by nature, creating a calming and inviting atmosphere. With a legacy of over 40 years in real estate, Kamdar Developments has once again set a new benchmark in premium living, making 105 Residences by Kamdar the ultimate choice for those seeking elegance and exclusivity.

title: Skyhills Residences 3
description:
Sky Hills Residence 3 is an extraordinary residential project located in the prestigious JVC in Dubai, offering a wide array of apartments, including studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom configurations. The development features 499 luxurious apartments all designed to cater to diverse lifestyle needs. Blending modern elegance with high-end finishes, these fully furnished residences exude sophistication and comfort. Every apartment is thoughtfully designed with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light to enhance the living experience, while polished porcelain tiles and branded kitchen appliances elevate the interiors.

The amenities at Sky Hills Residence 3 redefine contemporary living, providing residents with access to an outdoor gym, a basketball court, and a tennis court for an active lifestyle. Families will appreciate the dedicated children's play area, while the serene water garden and a luxurious swimming pool invite relaxation. The project also features lush gardens and peaceful communal spaces, making it an ideal retreat from the bustling city life. From sports enthusiasts to those seeking tranquility, the development ensures every lifestyle need is met with exceptional care and attention to detail.

Sky Hills Residence 3 is a fusion of modernity and tranquility. Its proximity to major roads such as Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road ensures seamless connectivity to iconic destinations like Dubai Mall, Palm Jumeirah, and Dubai Hills Mall. The design and vision of Sky Hills Residence 3 embody the spirit of aspiration, offering not just a home, but an opportunity to thrive in a community that supports growth and innovation. HRE is a developer known for excellence and sustainability, this project is truly a masterpiece that redefines luxurious urban living.

title: Floarea Grande
description:
Floarea Grande at Arjan is the newest residential architectural edition developed by Mashriq Elite Developments featuring exclusive selection of multi-bedroom apartments in Dubai. The exquisite design advancement is flagship project away from the city chaos redefining a world of tranquillity and contemporary living. The architectural wonder sets new precedents in urban luxury featuring wonderful design along with comfort and functionality. Step into a world where you achieve perfection in every corner and convenience with sophistication.

Rising majestically within the lap of greens at Arjan, within Dubai with its edge fronted with Dubai Miracle Garden and Dubai Butterfly Garden. Created for contemporary pioneers as well as families, it is equipped with a peaceful setting along with unimpeded access to Dubai’s lively city centres and Iconic landmarks.

The exclusive class development is spread across multiple floors to introduce an array of units suitable for various tastes and lifestyle needs. Contemporary design sanctuary to spacious layouts, premium finishes and plenty of natural light in each unit. This is the perfect equation of luxurious lifestyle and city breaks, where residents can enjoy quality time with family or loved ones. The community focused façade is thoughtful balance between amenities and dedicated spaces for interaction and rest. Here at this façade, every day is about living a leisure lifestyle, whether you are relaxing or enjoying the tranquillity at home.

title: Solea by Taraf Holding
description:
The only residential building in Saadiyat Lagoons masterplan offering breathtaking 360° panoramic views. Experience uninterrupted vistas of Saadiyat Island from every angle. Welcome to a home where every ray of light tells a story. A sanctuary designed to let the sun dance through every space, filling your days with energy, warmth, and wonder.

At Solea by Taraf Holding, light isn’t just an element; it’s an experience. From sunrise to sunset, it illuminates your life, transforms your surroundings, and reveals beauty in every moment. Solea follows a smart and efficient linear volumetric design, creating a perfect balance between functionality and beauty. Four interconnected buildings, arranged in a tongue-and-groove structure to maximize space and enhance architectural harmony. 

A focus on outdoor living, with landscaped gardens, pools, and shared community spaces at different levels that encourage social interaction and relaxation. A layout that ensures privacy, carefully positioning apartments to prevent direct views into neighboring homes while maintaining stunning, unobstructed views of the surrounding scenery.

title: Timez by Danube
description:
Timez by Danube Properties represents an extraordinary high-rise residential development that revolutionizes urban lifestyles at Dubai Silicon Oasis with elegant apartments. Through this superior project creation with premium class units that integrate luxurious amenities and attractive outlooks as well as outstanding accessibility to Dubai's key destinations. The exclusive development achieves architectural brilliance through its integration of modern design with enhanced systems to establish an all-inclusive ambience. The architectural team pays meticulous attention to smallest design detail, which creates an ideal balance between fashionable living and relaxing comfort under the city's dynamic atmosphere.

The prime location at Dubai Silicon Oasis presents a serene escape within Dubai to enjoy the lifestyle and get inspired everyday with its attractions. The façade is ideally located proximity to the Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Dubai-Al Ain Road, which allows fast access to Downtown Dubai and Dubai Mall. The inhabitants at this location gain access to several premium facilities which are intended to enhance their daily existence. The property stands out within the region because it satisfies all buyers profiles including tech workers and investors across the city.

The architectural tower features a lineup of luxury class residences which optimise the design efficiency along with advanced smart home systems. Every feature through the façade showcases the highest level of craftsmanship with elegant design and modern finishing elements. Apart from swimming and relaxation at the pool residents can find rejuvenation in the gardens as well as enjoy fine dining at F&B outlets. This development caters specifically to families through children’s play spaces and recreational areas, which creates an ideal location for wholesome living.

title: Sports View Residence
description:
Sports View Residence is a truly unique six-storey residential building from the developer Al Helal Al Zahaby Real Estate. Every corner of this complex is designed for your comfortable and active stay.

The building features clean lines and an elegant design that blends in with the surrounding landscape. Available for sale are one-and two-bedroom apartments and studios. Each residence is carefully designed to provide you with a harmonious blend of elegance and functionality.

For active residents, there are state-of-the-art gyms and outdoor sports fields, including barbecue areas, basketball and tennis courts. Convenient running tracks and ample parking for residents and guests will make your life here even more comfortable and eventful. Modern elevators provide quick access to the necessary floors.

Sports View Residence is located in the International Phase 2 district and provides easy access to key attractions. Burj Khalifa is just 10 minutes away, while Palm Jumeirah is 23 minutes away. The international airport is just an 8-minute drive away.
developer: Al Helal Al Zahaby Real Estate

title: The Element at Sobha One
description:
The Element at Sobha One is a true masterpiece of modern elegance, seamlessly blending luxury with nature’s serenity. Designed to redefine urban living, this architectural marvel offers an exceptional collection of 1 to 4-bedroom residences, each thoughtfully crafted to provide unparalleled comfort and sophistication. Expansive open spaces and breathtaking panoramic views create an atmosphere of tranquility, where natural light and sweeping vistas immerse residents in a world of refined beauty.  

Set against the backdrop of the Dubai Skyline, Dubai Creek, and the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary, The Element at Sobha One presents an extraordinary living experience. From golden sunrises to glittering nightscapes, every view is a captivating masterpiece. Whether overlooking the lush mangroves, the tranquil waters, or the elegant golf course, residents are invited to embrace a lifestyle where urban luxury meets the untamed charm of nature.  

More than just a residence, The Element at Sobha One is a sanctuary where modern design harmonizes with timeless allure. Thoughtfully designed community spaces encourage meaningful connections and shared experiences, while world-class amenities elevate everyday living. Whether seeking moments of solitude or vibrant social gatherings, every space within this exquisite tower fosters a sense of belonging, refinement, and serenity, offering a life of unmatched grandeur and endless inspiration.

title: The Corner
description:
Welcome to The Corner, a modern residential development offering an exceptional lifestyle with a selection of studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, 3-bedroom, and luxurious 3-bedroom duplex apartments. Designed for contemporary living, The Corner combines elegance and functionality, making it an ideal choice for those seeking both comfort and convenience.

Residents can enjoy a range of premium amenities, including a refreshing swimming pool and a fully equipped gym to support a healthy, active lifestyle. Each apartment is equipped with a state-of-the-art Smart Home System, allowing you to control lighting, temperature, and security with ease.

At The Corner, luxury and technology come together to create a seamless living experience, ensuring your home is not only stylish but also highly efficient and connected.

title: Gharbi 2 Residences
description:
Gharbi 2 Residences is an extraordinary project offering a wide selection of luxurious living spaces. Residents can choose from stylish studio apartments, elegant 1- and 2-bedroom apartments with private pools, or lavish 4-bedroom penthouses with exclusive pools. With its sophisticated designs and impeccable finishes, Gharbi 2 showcases a blend of modern architecture and comfortable living. This development ensures an elevated lifestyle with its well-planned spaces and premium residential options.

The amenities at Gharbi 2 Residences are nothing short of exceptional, catering to diverse lifestyle needs. Residents can enjoy a serene swimming pool, a fully equipped indoor and outdoor gym, and rejuvenating sauna and steam rooms. For leisure and convenience, the project features a yoga space, a gaming room, an indoor cinema, and a business hub. Additional offerings such as a café, a kids' playground, a podcast room, and BBQ areas complete the experience, making this community ideal for families and professionals alike.

Positioned in a prime area of Dubai, Gharbi 2 Residences ensures excellent connectivity to major roads and proximity to world-class attractions. Iconic destinations like Dubai Miracle Garden, Dubai Mall, and Palm Jumeirah are just a short drive away. The use of high-quality materials adds to the project's allure, promising durability and elegance. Gharbi 2 is not just a home - it's a remarkable investment opportunity.

title: Volna by Kasco
description:
Volna by Kasco is an exceptional residential development situated in Dubai's dynamic Al Jaddaf Waterfront district. This architectural marvel offers a selection of luxurious studios, as well as one-, two-and three-bedroom apartments, each meticulously designed to blend modern aesthetics with functional elegance.

Inspired by the gentle curves of ocean waves, Volna's design showcases wave-like contours that harmoniously integrate with its surroundings. The building's façade presents a timeless aesthetic, while the interiors are thoughtfully curated to provide spacious, light-filled living spaces. High-quality finishes and customizable layouts ensure that each residence caters to the discerning tastes of its inhabitants.

Volna by Kasco is more than just a residential development; it is a testament to luxurious living, offering residents a harmonious blend of modern design, premium amenities, and a vibrant community atmosphere in one of Dubai's most sought-after locales.

title: SAAS Hills at Dubai Science Park
description:
SaaS Hills is an ambitious project in Dubai, designed to redefine modern living and working environments. This project features a blend of residential and commercial spaces, offering a vibrant community that caters to a diverse range of lifestyles and business needs. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, SaaS Hills aims to create a dynamic ecosystem that fosters collaboration and creativity among its residents and tenants.

The development showcases cutting-edge architecture and thoughtfully designed interiors, prioritizing comfort and functionality. With an array of amenities such as green spaces, leisure facilities, and state-of-the-art technology, SaaS Hills provides a unique environment where residents can thrive. The project not only emphasizes quality living but also promotes a balanced lifestyle, making it an attractive destination for those seeking a modern urban experience in one of the world's most dynamic cities.

title: Ellison
description:
Nestled within the dynamic community of Town Square Dubai, Ellison by Nshama redefines modern living with its thoughtfully designed residences and unparalleled amenities. Strategically positioned at the entrance of the main park, Ellison offers residents a seamless blend of urban convenience and natural tranquility, making it an ideal destination for those seeking a balanced and vibrant lifestyle.

This distinguished residential development presents a collection of elegant 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, along with spacious 3-bedroom duplexes, each designed to maximize space, comfort, and style. With contemporary interiors, expansive windows, and private balconies, every home at Ellison captures breathtaking boulevard views while ensuring an abundance of natural light. The architectural design reflects a harmonious fusion of sophistication and functionality, catering to the evolving needs of modern homeowners.

Beyond its exquisite residences, Ellison fosters a strong sense of community, providing an array of world-class amenities that promote relaxation, recreation, and social engagement. For families, the development boasts children's play areas, dedicated swimming pools, and fully equipped fitness centers, ensuring a healthy and active lifestyle for all ages.

title: The Autograph i Series Residence
description:
The Autograph i Series Residence is a pinnacle of modern luxury living, redefining the skyline with its iconic 39-story tower. This architectural masterpiece blends elegance and innovation, offering a distinctive living experience in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods of Dubai. With its sleek design, premium materials, and attention to detail, the building stands as a testament to contemporary sophistication.

The tower offers a variety of exclusive residential units to suit diverse preferences and lifestyles. Among the options are thoughtfully designed studios, duplexes, and simplex apartments, some of which include private pools for an elevated living experience. For those seeking unparalleled luxury, the development also features a limited selection of spacious skyvillas with stunning views of the surrounding cityscape.

Every apartment in the tower is a sanctuary of luxury with panoramic views and interiors crafted with the finest finishes. The seamless integration of modern architecture and functional design ensures that every detail meets the highest standards of quality and style. The Autograph i Series Residence is not just a home but an iconic statement of elevated living, offering its residents an unparalleled lifestyle.

title: Altay Hills
description:
Altay Hills is a prestigious residential project set amidst the serene landscapes of Sharjah, offering an exclusive lifestyle defined by luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. Nestled in a prime location within the Al Suyoh Suburb, Altay Hills combines sophisticated architectural design with a tranquil environment, making it an ideal destination for families and individuals seeking an upscale living experience.

The project is characterized by its collection of elegant villas and townhouses, designed with meticulous attention to detail. Each home features spacious layouts, high-end finishes, and modern interiors, seamlessly blending contemporary aesthetics with functionality. Expansive windows and private outdoor spaces invite natural light and greenery into the living areas, creating a harmonious connection between the indoors and the surrounding environment.

Altay Hills is designed to foster a sense of community while prioritizing privacy and comfort. The development boasts landscaped parks, walking paths, and recreational areas, encouraging residents to enjoy an active and healthy lifestyle. Sport complexes, fitness centers, and children’s play areas, provide opportunities for relaxation and entertainment, ensuring a well-rounded living experience.

title: Empire Lakeviews
description:
Empire Lakeviews at Liwan is the residential landmark development by Empire Developments lined with premium selection of studios, 1, 2 bedroom apartments and duplexes with pool. Discover the epitome of modern living at this striking 29-storey tower presenting a unique combination of luxury, comfort, and tranquillity, redefining urban living in one of Dubai’s most sought-after communities. With its sleek façade and prime location, the high-rise façade provides residents with an unparalleled lifestyle that blends contemporary design with natural beauty.

The project features a total of 604 meticulously designed units, including luxury residences with an option of pool or without pool within the apartments, whereas the duplexes presents a pure blend of luxury at ease. Catering to various lifestyle preferences, many units come with private pools, offering a touch of luxury and privacy. Whether you’re a young professional seeking a chic studio, a growing family in need of spacious living, or someone who desires the ultimate luxury of a duplex with a pool, the façade has the perfect home for you.

title: Marriott Residences JLT
description:
Explore the essence of contemporary living with a comprehensive overview of Marriott Residences JLT. From the meticulously designed living spaces to the upscale amenities and prime location, delve into the unparalleled lifestyle offered at this prestigious residence. Discover a harmonious blend of sophistication, comfort, and convenience as you embark on a journey of premium living.

Experience the essence of seamless living at Marriott Residences JLT. Nestled in the heart of Jumeirah Lakes Towers, it offers the epitome of modern living, where every detail is meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations. From the stunning architecture to the lavish amenities, immerse yourself in a lifestyle that defines excellence. Discover a harmonious balance of sophistication and relaxation as you make Marriott Residences Jumeirah Lakes Towers your new home.

Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of refined elegance and class with Marriott Residences JLT. From meticulously designed living spaces to upscale amenities, every aspect of the residence exudes sophistication. Elevate your lifestyle and indulge in the epitome of refined living.

Experience the pinnacle of upscale living with unparalleled amenities located on the 5th floor of the tower. From infinity pools to state-of-the-art fitness centers, each facility is meticulously designed to elevate your lifestyle and provide you with the ultimate in comfort and convenience. Indulge in a world of relaxation and recreation immersing in exclusive amenities where every detail is crafted to exceed expectations.

title: VERDAN1A
description:
Verdania at Dubailand Residence Complex (DLRC) is a haven where nature and modernity converge, a development by Object 1 Development with premium studios, 1 and 2.5 bedroom apartments. The development is inspired by its name, derived from "verde," symbolizing growth and renewal, which mirrors the commitment to creating a harmonious environment for its residents. With a philosophy centered on sustainable living, this is not just a residence but a lifestyle choice for those who value tranquillity, community, and innovation. To redefine urban living, this architectural masterpiece presents premium-designed homes with a lifestyle that blends luxury with sustainability.

Located in the heart of DLRC, the façade presents an unparalleled living experience infused with leisure, luxury, and convenience. The tower is a sanctuary for modern dwellers, featuring exquisite interiors and unparalleled amenities that cater to relaxation, fitness, recreation, and socialization. From the lagoon-inspired infinity pool with cascading waterfalls to lush landscaped gardens, every element is designed to evoke serenity and harmony. Beyond relaxation, the development enhances active lifestyles with a state-of-the-art gym, yoga lounge, and recreational facilities, ensuring residents thrive both physically and mentally.

title: Jacob and Co Beachfront Living
description:
Here, life moves in harmony with the environment, offering a haven of tranquility and well-being. The residences overlook endless vistas, where the blue of the sea merges with the green of the Natural Reserve, creating an atmosphere that invites you to slow down and savor the luxury of a natural setting.

Enjoy breathtaking ocean vistas and direct beach access in a setting that defines iconic seaside living, Each residence seamlessly blends luxury with the natural beauty of the coastal landscape.

Branded residences with Jacob & Co. transforms living spaces into exclusive luxury experiences, embodying the brand's renowned craftsmanship and aesthetic excellence. Each home becomes a design masterpiece, a symbol of prestige that sets new standards of sophistication and timeless elegance.

Embrace a lifestyle of gentle luxury, where sophistication meets comfort. Thoughtful design and exquisite finishes create serene spaces that promote relaxation and refined living. Surrounded by nature's wonders, residents enjoy curated experiences, including the Jacob & Co. Beach Club, Jacob & Co. Residents Club, Jacob & Co.Seafront Cigar Lounge and signature restaurants, all set against breathtaking surroundings.

title: FIJI at Damac Islands
description:
Embrace the charm of Fiji at Damac Islands, the pristine new residential cluster crafted by Damac Properties where Island bliss meets urban sophistication with premium villas. The exclusive class development is inspired by the serene beauty of its South Pacific namesake. This cluster provides a tranquil retreat with a touch of luxury, surrounded by crystal-clear lagoons and lush greenery. Featuring meticulously designed residences and a host of world-class amenities, it delivers a unique blend of relaxation and adventure. From private beaches to vibrant leisure hubs, this community caters to families, couples, and individuals seeking a serene yet engaging environment.

The community is designed to foster a sense of belonging, with its beautifully landscaped gardens, waterside cafes, and family-friendly attractions. This new edition is not just a place to live; it's a destination where residents can immerse themselves in the beauty of nature while enjoying modern conveniences. With its strategic location, residents have easy access to key destinations in Dubai, making this an ideal choice for families, professionals, and investors alike. Offering a harmonious blend of tropical serenity and urban sophistication, it is a haven for those seeking an elevated lifestyle.

title: Golf Dale at Emaar South
description:
Get Inspired with Golf Dale at Emaar South, a new residential development crafted by esteemed Emaar Properties, lined with pristine selection of 1 to 3-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. This is the latest suburban façade to the leisure golfing community, where residents can discover countless opportunity of growth and fulfilment at the heart of Dubai. This charming design enclave is positioned adjacent to the 18-hole championship golf course, with stunning views serving as the perfect backdrop for a luxurious lifestyle. Residents can enjoy the best of both worlds, a serene suburban lifestyle amidst lush green landscapes and the convenience of easy access to the bustling city life. Whether you are seeking relaxation or vibrant city energy, this new advancement provides an ideal setting to experience life’s best moments.

The strategic location within Dubai South ensures that residents enjoy seamless access to key areas of the city. Situated along Dubai-Al Ain Road, this development is perfectly positioned for both work and leisure, making daily commutes and weekend getaways equally effortless. Whether you’re heading to the bustling city center, the serene beaches, or the nearby Dubai Expo City, everything is just a short drive away. The lush greenery, expansive fairways, and stunning views create a sense of escape, allowing you to unwind and recharge in the comfort of your home.

Living at this development means immersing yourself in the charm of a golf-inspired lifestyle. Overlooking the pristine fairways of the Emaar South Golf Course, this community offers unparalleled access to a world-class golfing experience. Whether you’re a seasoned player or a beginner looking to learn, the 18-hole championship course and driving range are at your doorstep, promising endless hours of enjoyment and relaxation.

But the appeal doesn’t stop there. The clubhouse serves as the heart of the community, offering fine dining experiences and a welcoming space to connect with neighbours and friends. With panoramic views of the course and surrounding hills, every moment spent here feels like a retreat into luxury. Expansive windows frame breathtaking views of the golf course and surrounding greenery, bringing the outdoors in and creating a seamless connection with nature. These residences are more than just homes; they are spaces where you can find inspiration, relaxation, and a renewed sense of purpose.

title: Golf Acres
description:
Golf Acres at Emaar South is the latest residential development by Emaar Properties, launching within the prestigious community with 1 to 3-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. The elegant mid-rise façade establishes a serene lifestyle, where luxury meets serenity with the views of the 18-hole championship golf course. Nestled in the lush landscapes of the serene golf environment, designed to maximise the views from every corner, evoking a sense of endless possibilities. This exclusive community offers a harmonious blend of contemporary design and natural tranquillity, setting the stage for an elevated lifestyle.

Strategically situated in the heart of Emaar South, the façade offers seamless connectivity to major areas of Dubai. Its proximity to the Dubai-Al Ain Road ensures residents have easy access to the city’s key landmarks while enjoying the tranquillity of a suburban retreat. The location’s centrality makes it a convenient choice for families, professionals, and golf enthusiasts alike. The residences are designed to maximize vistas of rolling green hills, pristine fairways, and the expansive Emaar South Golf Course. Located just minutes away from the Expo City Dubai and Al Maktoum International Airport, it redefines suburban elegance with urban connectivity at ease.

The architecture excellence is defined with state of the art design and luxury element, where nature exist in perfect harmony. The contemporary façades, with their earthy tones and natural materials, blend seamlessly into the surrounding landscape, creating a community that feels both modern and organic. Inside these homes, the same palette carries through, offering a warm and inviting atmosphere that mirrors the natural beauty outside. The interiors are crafted with precision and care, combining functional layouts and stylish details. Large windows flood the space with natural light, while open-plan living areas encourages a sense of freedom and flow to enjoy the lifestyle.

title: Damac Riverside Views
description:
Damac Riverside Views Apartments by Damac Properties is a luxury residential community located in Dubai Investment Park 2. Featuring 1 and 2-bedroom apartments with premium finishes, the project offers a peaceful waterfront lifestyle with exclusive access to hydroponic farms, zen spas, and floating cinemas. Combining modern living with tranquil surroundings, it’s an ideal choice for both homeowners and investors.

Nestled along the tranquil banks of a serene waterway, Damac Riverside Views is a testament to modern architectural brilliance and luxurious living. This iconic development by Damac Properties combines innovative design with an unparalleled lifestyle, offering residents the perfect balance of nature and urban sophistication.

The design of Damac Riverside Views is a masterpiece of modern architecture, featuring sleek lines, glass façades, and a blend of contemporary and timeless aesthetics. Each building stands tall as a symbol of luxury, offering panoramic views of the shimmering waterway and the city skyline. The use of high-quality materials and attention to detail in the construction reflect Damac's commitment to excellence.

Damac Riverside Views offers an array of amenities that redefine luxury living. Residents can stay active at the fully equipped fitness center, or indulge in relaxation at the spa and wellness center. The landscaped gardens and outdoor seating areas provide a serene environment for socializing or quiet reflection. For families, the development includes dedicated children’s play areas and community spaces.

title: Bab Al Qasr Resort Residence
description:
Bab Al Qasr Resort Residence at Masdar City is the latest landmark development that redefines luxury living by combining traditional Emirati Heritage by Burtville Development with 1 to 5-bedroom apartments, duplexes and sky villas. This is the first exclusive residential project to maintain sustainable inspiration in Abu Dhabi, presenting a distinctive blend of classic cultural heritage together with present-day urban facilities. The development showcases 483 units distributed across two buildings (B18 and B19) as an 8-storey residential artwork that allows occupants to enjoy scenic vistas of the lagoon and Masdar Park.

The luxury class development is located at Masdar City, known for its culture and heritage to experience the lifestyle. Situates only minutes from Abu Dhabi International Airport, while offering lifestyle privileges defined by premium amenities. The development addresses multiple lifestyle choices via its extensive spaces alongside carefully designed interiors that create surroundings of luxury and relaxed comfort. Residents experience a blissful environment alongside easy access to major Yas Island destinations including Yas Mall, Yas Waterworld and Warner Bros World.

Living here at this premium class façade represents an experience that goes beyond ordinary home elements to create a full lifestyle. Luxury amenities include sandy beach pools alongside state-of-the-art health clubs, a cycling track and elegant social facilities that incorporate sky lounges. Families alongside individuals searching for tranquil lives find luxury living experience that aligns with exceptional standards through every carefully selected detail. World-class amenities are effortlessly accessible to residents who live within peaceful surrounding environments.

title: Damac Safa Gate
description:
Damac Safa Gate stands as a beacon of luxury and architectural excellence in the heart of Dubai. Offering an exquisite collection of 1, 2, 3, and 5-bedroom apartments, this development redefines upscale urban living, catering to those with a penchant for exclusivity, elegance, and world-class amenities.

Damac Safa Gate is a masterpiece of modern architecture, with its design inspired by elegance, innovation, and sustainability. The sleek glass façade and contemporary lines create a striking visual impact, seamlessly blending with Dubai’s skyline. Meticulously designed interiors reflect opulence, making every corner of Safa Gate a celebration of luxury and sophistication.

The apartments at Safa Gate are the epitome of grandeur, offering a curated living experience for individuals and families alike. Each residence is thoughtfully designed, featuring expansive layouts, high ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows that frame breathtaking views of the city and the Arabian Gulf.

title: Golf Edge at Emaar South
description:
Golf Edge at Emaar South is the new sophisticated residential development crafted by Emaar Properties with a premium selection of 1 to 3-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. Discover the epitome of luxury living, presenting a midrise residential haven set against the lush landscape of a championship golf course, this development offers residents unparalleled views of the fairways, complemented by a vibrant, well-connected community. The new façade harmoniously combines modern architectural elegance with natural beauty, creating a tranquil sanctuary that’s both stylish and welcoming. Spacious interiors, high-quality finishes, and open-plan designs cater to those seeking a balance between luxurious comfort and refined aesthetics.

The location within Emaar South unites peaceful suburban comfort with the urban conveniences of the community. The location combines the calm oasis of Expo City Dubai alongside Al Maktoum International Airport, which connects globally while remaining within easy reach. With the vicinity to the Dubai–Al Ain Road, residents link seamlessly to Dubai’s major landmarks together with professional centers and active leisure areas. The community emphasizes nature-based living through its winding streets, landscaped gardens and tranquil water elements that form peaceful sanctuaries. The façade provides the perfect residential area for anyone who wants to effortlessly blend life with relaxation time without leaving their ideal location.

Modern architectural mastery provides a unique testament to the combination of contemporary sophistication that joins perfectly with environmental beauty. The architectural design takes its cues from earth elements and natural materials which create a fluid transition between minimalist spaces and surrounding natural vegetation. Every aspect of the facade showcases a classic design approach which praises minimalistic elegance. Each home in this residential project welcomes indoor/outdoor unity through its many floor-to-ceiling windows and generous balconies which bring abundant sunlight throughout the day.

title: Azizi Wasel
description:
At Azizi Wasel, residents can choose from an array of meticulously crafted homes, including studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, three-bedroom apartments, and four-bedroom penthouses. Each residence reflects the epitome of modern design, with clean architectural lines, expansive glass façades, and interiors that emphasize light, space, and elegance. The seamless flow between indoor and outdoor living spaces provides a sense of openness, complemented by breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf and the vibrant Dubai skyline.

This waterfront development is more than just a place to live—it’s a destination. Azizi Wasel boasts an array of retail options, ensuring that daily conveniences and indulgences are just steps away. For families, the kids’ play area offers a safe and fun environment for children to explore and enjoy.

Azizi Wasel is also designed to promote an active and balanced lifestyle. Residents can unwind in the luxurious swimming pools, stay fit in the state-of-the-art gym, or host events in the multi-purpose hall, all while being surrounded by the tranquility of landscaped gardens and the soothing sound of the waves. These thoughtfully curated amenities cater to both relaxation and social interaction, fostering a strong sense of community within the development.

title: Coventry 66
description:
Coventry 66 is a luxurious residential project in the vibrant Dubai South, offering Studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom apartments. Each unit is thoughtfully designed to blend style and functionality, with elegant interiors, abundant natural light, and contemporary layouts. Residents will experience a seamless combination of comfort and sophistication, perfect for modern living.

The amenities at Coventry 66 are catering to all aspects of a balanced lifestyle. Residents can enjoy a stunning infinity pool for relaxation, a state-of-the-art gymnasium for fitness enthusiasts, and a children's park that ignites creativity and fun. The community also offers serene landscapes, making it perfect for nature walks, family picnics, or unwinding outdoors.

Situated at the heart of Dubai South, Coventry 66 boasts unparalleled connectivity to key landmarks like Expo City and Al Maktoum International Airport. Its strategic location ensures effortless access to business hubs and leisure destinations via major highways. Beyond its prime positioning, the project offers breathtaking rooftop views of the surrounding tranquil landscapes, making every moment memorable in Coventry 66.

title: City Walk Crestlane
description:
City Walk Crestlane at City Walk is the latest revolutionary development by the esteemed Meraas laced with innovative designed 1 to 4 bedroom apartments and duplexes in Dubai. The architectural brilliance of its three high rise towers and the core design functionality blends modern harmony, unmatched connectivity, and vibrant community focuses lifestyle at ease. Perfectly tailored with the unmatched lifestyle, the façade promises to be a place of desire and extra-vantage comfort and convenience to enjoy and explore. Crafted with today's city dweller in mind, the façade delivers everything a person needs: a comfortable lifestyle that joins together efficiency and trendy features.

The prime location within the City Walk in within Jumeirah presents a serene address lined with seamless connectivity experience and its proximity reach to the key destinations. Thanks to the nearby Sheikh Zayed Road, which lead directly to Dubai's top destinations. Local residents can easily access City Walk, where they'll have a wide choice of designer shops, fancy eating places, and city attractions right on their doorstep. The carefully arranged community setting offers a healthy, engaged lifestyle that naturally combines indoor and outdoor living.

For more the development comes up with its new release of City Walk Crestlane 2 and Crestlane 3, perfectly combining the aesthetic of the three towers together. These towers present one of its kind residences where the Tower A, B and C its whole designed to present a self-sustained community lifestyle with main highlights of lagoons and water activities just outside your door. Themed around architecture as an artistic form exists this spatial domain. The architects created an advanced design that leads with sleek contemporary lines while offering expansive areas which express refined elegance. The vast spaces of both floor heights in each lobby entrance reveal panoramic city and community views while defining an elevated living experience.

title: Amaal 8
description:
Amaal 8 rises as a testament to visionary design, tower that redefine the Dubai skyline. This architectural masterpiece is meticulously composed to orchestrate breathtaking panoramas at every turn.

Imagine yourself stepping into a world where luxury and nature intertwine seamlessly. At Amaal, they’ve crafted spaces that are more than just residences; they’re sanctuaries. Picture yourself lounging by a tranquil pool, surrounded by lush greenery, the gentle breeze carrying the scent of blooming flowers. Or perhaps you envision yourself entertaining guests in your elegant living room, bathed in natural light.

Every detail of your home has been meticulously designed to enhance your lifestyle. From the curvature of your balcony to the contemporary walls, each element is a testament to our commitment to creating a harmonious living experience. Welcome to a world where luxury finds its true expression. You'll also have easy access to places like Dubai Creek Harbour, just 7 minutes away, and Dubai Airport, 14 minutes away.

title: Beachfront Gates
description:
Beachfront Gates is a premium residential development offering a collection of 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments designed with elegance and functionality in mind. Nestled in the vibrant Dubai South area, the project stands out for its contemporary aesthetic. Each apartment boasts breathtaking views and meticulous design, blending comfort with sophistication.

The array of amenities at Beachfront Gates is designed to cater to every need and preference. Residents can enjoy access to beautifully landscaped parks, a variety of retail outlets, and family-friendly services, ensuring convenience and entertainment for all ages. The emphasis on wellness is evident in the grand open spaces and greenery, creating a serene and invigorating environment.

Beachfront Gates enjoys a prime location, ensuring unmatched convenience for its residents. The development masterfully combines urban accessibility with the tranquility of nature, offering a truly unique living experience in Dubai. This project sets a new standard for luxurious, nature-inspired urban lifestyles.

title: Coventry Gardens
description:
Coventry Gardens at Dubailand is an exceptional residential development presented by GFS Builders & Developers with exquisite selection of studios, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. With an aim to redefine the real estate concept, the façade delivers its residents living spaces that are unmatched within the region. Blending the modern elegance and unparalleled comfort, the façade striking architecture and high-end finishes makes sure to offer a sanctuary of tranquillity, while being close to the energetic pulse of the Dubai. From the moment you enter the garden development, you’ll experience a lifestyle that cater to those seeking both sophistication and convenience, all within one of the most exciting cities.

The central and prime location within Dubailand provides an ideal setting with easy access to the Dubai’s key attractions and Iconic destinations. Being located close to Downtown Dubai and minutes away reach from the Burj Khalifa as well as Dubai International Airport, the development’s strategic location ensures convenience at every turn. The surrounding area offers everything from lush green parks to the family-friendly green spaces, to top-rated shopping destinations like Dubai Outlet Mall and Mall of the Emirates at ease.

The architecture offers premium and exclusive range of apartments, each designed to maximise space, natural light and comfort. The floor to ceiling windows, elegant fitting and open-plan layouts are just some of the features that makes these homes a perfect choice for modern urban living. This development is truly a haven for those who desire a sophisticated lifestyle with all the convenience at doorstep. Beyond your apartment’s walls, world-class amenities such as a state-of-the-art gym, swimming pools, and leisure areas provide everything needed for a balanced and fulfilling lifestyle.

title: Allegro Residences
description:
Allegro Residences on Dubai Islands offers a premium collection of luxury homes by Mill Hill Riviera, designed for those seeking refined and exceptional living. This brand-new residential offering presents a range of meticulously crafted units, each tailored to meet the needs of those seeking an extraordinary living experience. From cozy apartments to spacious family homes, these residences cater to a variety of tastes and lifestyle preferences, promising both elegance and comfort in equal measure.

The development blends modern architectural innovation with luxurious interiors, offering an elevated standard of living. Every detail has been thoughtfully considered, from premium materials to state-of-the-art finishes, ensuring an atmosphere of sophistication throughout. Expansive floor plans, open-concept layouts, and large windows fill the homes with natural light, creating an inviting ambiance that seamlessly blends style with practicality.

Set within an idyllic environment that balances tranquility with accessibility, these residences offer a unique opportunity to enjoy a serene lifestyle without sacrificing the energy of the city. The carefully designed landscape and exceptional amenities further elevate the living experience, providing residents with the perfect backdrop for both relaxation and social engagement. Whether for quiet reflection or active entertainment, this development promises a life of luxury in one of the region's most desirable destinations.

title: Villa del DIVOS
description:
Villa Del Divos by Mr. Eight Development is a spectacular residential project located on Dubai Islands, offering a refined lifestyle with unparalleled elegance. This boutique collection includes a range of residences: 1, 2, 3-bedroom apartments, 4-bedroom duplexes, and 5-bedroom penthouses, each designed with meticulous attention to detail. Every unit features a private pool and expansive living spaces with ceiling heights up to 3.2 meters, creating an ambiance of luxury and openness.

The amenities at Villa Del Divos project redefine luxury living, providing residents with exclusive access to a private beach club, an infinity pool with private sun cabanas, and wellness-focused features like a cryotherapy studio, a steam sauna, and a yoga terrace. For recreation, there’s a state-of-the-art gym designed by Antonio Citterio and a children’s play zone with a serene lagoon.

Residents can also indulge in signature services such as in-house massages, pre-bookable chauffeur-driven Rolls-Royces, and a luxury motorboat experience complete with a professional captain. These features are seamlessly managed by a dedicated concierge team, ensuring a world-class living experience. Villa Del Divos is not just a residence; it is an exquisite lifestyle statement, setting a new benchmark for modern, opulent living on Dubai Islands.

title: Zephyra Residences
description:
Zephyra Residences coming up soon on Dubai Islands, Deira, will gleam like a gem with its architectural grace encased in a 14-storey structure. In exquisitely designed 3-bedroom, apartments, penthouses, and townhouses, the development presents a collection of modern residences crafted to perfection. Architecture incorporates the natural beauty of surroundings with balconies and terraces peeling out like dunes and waves in a way to get deeply connected with nature—all while creating a perfect waterfront community. It offers stunning views of the ocean from every private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows.

Zephyra Residences is spread over a plot of 10,200 square meters, and it has two buildings, each having 10 residential floors. The entrance contains the tastefully decorated lobby from whence an essence of luxury begins and continues to elegant hallways, high-speed elevators, and other common areas. Three basement floors provide ample parking. The ease of access is thoroughly provided to every resident in this prime location. The project only takes 10 minutes to reach the Gold Souq Metro Station, while Dubai International Airport is a 20-minute car drive away. The famous Dubai Frame is a mere 22 minutes from here, while in 24 minutes you can be at the Dubai World Trade Centre or walk around Downtown Dubai. Business Bay is yet another key center at a distance of just 33 minutes from your door. Both Dubai Marina and Jumeirah Beach are within a walkable distance from the site.

The facilities include an infinity pool with breathtaking panoramic views and an ultra-modern, state-of-the-art fitness center for keeping fit.
