These spaces are not just amenities; they are extensions of your home, designed to elevate your lifestyle.

title: Damac Islands Dubai
description: Damac Islands is a new master community cluster by the renowned Damac Properties lined with premium collection of residences in Dubai. The newly launched façade redefines luxury living by blending natural charm with modern conveniences. This off-plan development is located at the coveted address adjacent to the renowned Sun City community, offering a water-centric lifestyle that transport its residents to the coastal destinations. The development is designed to be more than just a residential hub, lined with its pristine sandy beaches, crystalline lagoons, and immersive waterfront experience, making it a destination in itself.

title: Ava at Palm
description:
Ava Palm Jumeirah is a new ultra-luxury real estate project by Omniyat on the Palm Jumeirah, Dubai. Omniyat is one of the most creative real-estate developments in the Gulf Region. It has launched a new luxury residential project called AVA Palm Jumeirah on the artificial islands Palm Jumeirah Dubai in the United Arab Emirates. The Ava project will showcase a marvel of engineering and real estate development, boasting a set of residences and luxury designed with high architecture standards. According to Omniyat, this project on Palm Jumeirah will feature 17 hanging palaces with a unique and innovative architectural character. The company explained that developments units "re-shape" the real estate development industry alongside its luxury market in Dubai.

AVA Palm Jumeirah is the new addition to OMNIYAT Group's AED 15 billion investment portfolio. It is OMNIYAT's second project at Palm Jumeirah, following its remarkable One at Palm Jumeirah Dorchester Collection and Dubai. A globally famous real estate development and marvel of engineering, boasting a set of luxury designed with unprecedented architecture standards by the world's brightest engineers, this project was fully sold to foreign investors, breaking a record of selling the three exclusive and most expensive development in Dubai for over AED 260 million in total.

For the first time in the world and Dubai, drones have been deployed to show a 3D architectural design and characterize luxury across the Pal, Jumeriah city sky. Which is managed by Dorchester Collection 500 drones flying over 120 m above the ground, and it captivated the eyes of residents and guests at Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina, and Jumeirah Beach.

title: Cove Edition 3 by Imtiaz
description:
Cove Edition 3 at Dubailand is the third phase of the luxury residential series developed by Imtiaz Developments, lined with premium selection of studios, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. The luxury class sophisticated development features a robust structure with two basement levels, a ground level, and multiple residential floors, and a rooftop, curated with comfort and durability. Designed to provide a tranquil sanctuary, each residence boasts soft tones, ambient lighting, and premium finishes, creating a serene ambiance perfect for unwinding. The warm gold accents, sleek wood details, and expansive windows establish a seamless connection between urban luxury and natural beauty.

Nestled in Dubailand, benefits from its proximity to some of Dubai’s most iconic attractions. The nearby Global village offers a vibrant cultural experience, celebrating diversity through its pavilions, performances, and cuisines. The Equestrian & Polo Club, a short drive away, provides an elegant setting for equestrian enthusiasts and social gatherings alike. The locality integrate technology, style, and functionality ensures that every need is met, creating a living experience that is as comfortable as it is inspiring.

Step into the world, where living spaces are thoughtfully designed to elevate everyday living. This is a place where life’s simple pleasures are celebrated, offering an escape from the chaos of urban life. The podium level, a lush green oasis, invites residents to immerse themselves in nature without leaving home. Featuring beautifully landscaped terraces and inviting seating areas, this space is perfect for unwinding after a long day or socializing with neighbours and friends. The experience is both grounding and rejuvenating, a reminder that life’s beauty often lies in the details.

title: Vitalia Palm Jumeirah Residences
description:
Vitalia Palm Jumeirah Residences invites you to experience the pinnacle of luxury living, an ultra-luxury residential development by Pinnacle Developers with 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 4 bedroom duplexes and penthouses. Nestled on the pristine shores of Palm Jumeirah, this latest launch is marketed by Devmark, where the exclusive G+9-storey development is a sanctuary of Italian elegance meeting the dynamic vibrancy of Dubai’s most iconic Island. Boasting just limited 45 bespoke residences, the façade features premium apartments, expansive duplexes, and lavish penthouses, each meticulously crafted to embody timeless sophistication.

At the heart of the development lies a celebration of architectural brilliance and curated amenities. Expansive, light-filled living areas are framed by full-height, double-reflection thermo-glazed windows, offering panoramic views of the azure waters of the Arabian Gulf and the Dubai skyline. Premium finishes, including Dekton Marmorio surfaces, warm wood parquet flooring, and sleek oak grey veneer doors, create interiors that exude refinement. Italian-crafted kitchens by Snaidero feature sophisticated Laminam Diamond Cream countertops, complemented by Miele appliances and Quooker taps, ensuring every culinary experience is a masterpiece. Bespoke Gessi bathroom fittings add a touch of luxury, while Pianca wardrobes provide elegant storage solutions.

Enhancing the living experience, the façade integrates cutting-edge smart home technology, allowing seamless control over lighting, climate, audio, and security. Sustainability is prioritized with eco-friendly EV charging stations, making luxury living environmentally conscious. From the welcoming lobby with attentive concierge service to the state-of-the-art fitness center and shimmering swimming pool, every aspect is designed for indulgence. The façade is a testament to timeless beauty and modern innovation, offering an unparalleled lifestyle on Dubai’s prestigious East Crescent.

title: Hadley Heights JVC
description:
Hadley Heights at JVC is a high-rise residential development by LEOS Developments featuring premium studios, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. This is the first residential development in Dubai by this globally known developer establishing its new lifestyle. The dynamic architecture and stunning infrastructure in the city is a charm in itself to definitely become a part of a thriving community.

The development combined premium serenity with natural elements that offer a new and classic scene of lifestyle. The nest of luxury with several lush green spaces is all you may desire for premium living within the heart of this space. Make your home the paradise of your dreams, the space that fits your needs and allows you to be the path of fun and pleasure.

There are numerous lush green areas and spaces loaded with fun and picnic elements, socialising spaces and areas to play, and much more for your lifestyle of pleasures. This development features some really amazing classic rooms and spaces which are absolutely elegant and luxurious immersed in the modernity you have always wanted. Come on and book your dream home in the heart of JVC that could really transform your lifestyle with ease.

title: The Hillgate by Ellington
description: The Hillgate at Dubai Silicon Oasis is the prestigious masterpiece by Ellington Properties that composes ultra-lavish and sustainable range of homes. Explore new heights of living within this latest housing landmark of the locality rising graciously in the open and nature-inspired thriving skyline. From comfortable homes to the stunning views of the cityscape and world-class options of amenities, your home unlocks infinite opportunities right at the doorstep. Take advantage of living in the emirate’s famous mix-used community that offers modern residential and business infrastructures, making it an ideal hub for growing families and businesses.

title: Arisha Terraces
description:
In one of Dubai’s most dynamic communities, Dubai Studio City, Qube Development offers a new luxury residential project called Arisha Terraces for an elevated living experience. With 419 well-crafted apartment units spread across five spacious stories covering a total build-up area of 615,440.53 square feet, this L-shaped building has been crafted to maximize natural light and enhance both visual appeal and functionality. The architecture not only reflects contemporary style but also prioritizes comfort for its residents.

Advanced smart technology simplifies daily life at this project, from lighting and temperature control to security features-all managed through an intuitive app. These homes offer a sophisticated lifestyle with top-of-the-line appliances, modern finishes, and high-end furnishings. The open floor plans ensure that space is used efficiently and expansive private balconies offer breathtaking views of the city skyline. There are also lush, green parks surrounding the development for a tranquil environ away from the city’s bustle.

The project’s location in Studio City offers more than just a comfortable home; it provides a gateway to some of Dubai’s most visited attractions, famous malls, school, hotels, luxury shopping hubs, and more. In just 9 minutes, you can reach Dubai Autodrome, a must-visit for motorsport enthusiasts while a quick 18-minute drive brings you the Mall of the Emirates. For those seeking the sun and sea, Dubai Marina and Jumeirah Beach are only 22 and 25 minutes away, respectively. The towering Burj Khalifa and the bustling streets of Downtown Dubai are also just 25 minutes from here. Even international travel is hassle-free, with Dubai International Airport a mere 30 minutes away.

Arisha Terraces is designed with a focus on creating a harmonious living environment, featuring eco-friendly features, well-maintained recreational areas, and a range of top-notch amenities. It has scenic trails, areas for a variety of outdoor activities, and private BBQ areas. Also, there are facilities, such as high-tech fitness center, world-class swimming pool, and communal spaces for relaxation and social interaction. With its high-quality sports facilities, ample parking spaces, 24/7 security with CCTV cameras, and retail spaces, this development is one of the most sought-after ones in the community.

title: Kensington Gardens
description:
Kensington Gardens is a serene, boutique low-rise community located in the heart of Dubai. Inspired by British architecture, the development features elegant townhouses and standalone villas set amid expansive green spaces designed to enhance well-being and provide a tranquil lifestyle. The community’s proximity to urban conveniences ensure residents can easily enjoy both the peace of nature and the vibrancy of city life.

The homes in Kensington Gardens are a blend of refined British elegance and modern luxury, with 3, 4, and 5-bedroom townhouses, as well as opulent 6 and 7-bedroom standalone villas. Designed with an emphasis on sustainable, green living, these residences feature branded interiors and exquisite craftsmanship, offering a unique blend of sophistication and exclusivity. Set within lush surroundings, the development is an ideal retreat for families seeking both luxury and well-being in one of Dubai’s most vibrant new communities.

title: La Tilia at Villanova
description:
La Tilia at Villanova is a remarkable new addition to Dubailand, crafted by Dubai Properties lined with exclusive selection of plush 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses. Nestled within the much-coveted villanova community, the development is a follow-up to the highly successful the community series, making it an excellent opportunity for both homeowners and investors. This vibrant neighbourhood is thoughtfully crafted to provide a harmonious environment where families can thrive. The spacious, contemporary homes are designed to deliver the highest level of comfort and functionality. Surrounded by lush green spaces, this community fosters a relaxed lifestyle with a host of leisure and recreational options.

Strategically located in the heart of Dubailand, the façade ensures unparalleled connectivity to Dubai’s key destinations. Positioned along Emirates Road, with easy access to major thoroughfares like Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Ain Road, residents can enjoy the convenience of a central location. Whether commuting to Downtown Dubai, exploring the cultural vibrancy of Global Village, or catching a flight from Al Maktoum International Airport, every destination is within easy reach.

This new façade is more than just a residential project; it’s a thoughtfully designed community where families can flourish. With its expansive green parks, tree-lined walkways, and engaging amenities, the neighbourhood fosters a close-knit environment. The development emphasizes creating spaces that encourage interaction and connection, offering families a place to bond, grow, and thrive together. The park offers shaded trails for walking, jogging, and cycling, inviting residents to embrace an active lifestyle while connecting with the natural surroundings.

title: Knightsbridge at Meydan
description:
Knightsbridge at Meydan District 11 is the Dubai’s first climate adaptive residential development by Leos Developments with 4 bedroom townhouses and 5 & 6 bedroom villas. This ground breaking development redefines opulence with a visionary approach to climate-adaptive design, where the future of luxury living meets the innovative spirit of environmental consciousness.

Embrace a lifestyle where British architectural elegance seamlessly blends with cutting-edge technology, offering an unrivalled living experience in the heart of Dubai. The façade stands as a testament to superior design and thoughtful planning. Each residence is meticulously crafted to offer both comfort and sophistication, ensuring that every detail is tailored to your lifestyle. These homes provide a welcoming environment for families, combining practicality with luxury. The crown jewels of this development are the six-bedroom villas, of which only five are available. These homes represent the pinnacle of luxury, providing unparalleled space and exclusive features.

Inspired by traditional British design, the development incorporates classic elements with a modern twist. The distinctive architectural style is reflected in the wave-like lines of the buildings and the bay-view windows that invite abundant natural light. The use of yellow stone and metal cladding not only enhances the visual appeal but also ensures that the design harmonizes with the surrounding natural landscape.

This unique blend of heritage and innovation extends to the interiors, where natural materials create a soothing and luxurious environment. The integration of smart home technology ensures that every aspect of your living experience is enhanced by modern convenience and efficiency. The homes are equipped with exclusive features such as private pools, elevators, and wellness spaces. The interiors are designed with natural materials that complement the lush greenery and tranquil water elements, creating a serene living environment.

title: Beach Walk Grand
description:
Beachwalk Grand at Dubai Islands is all set to embellish the shimmering coastline as the new housing jewel by Imtiaz Developments with premium 1 & 2 bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom penthouses. Standing upon the most sought-after piece of the island, this property epitomizes the robust architectural-style with contemporary design that blend into the natural landscape of the island. Own your slice of heaven that brings the enticing amenities and private comfortable sanctuary together at one dazzling space. Witness the undiscovered touch of the vast beaches with gleaming sands and the soothing waves of the clear Arabian Gulf waters.

The prime location at Dubai Islands, with its visionary design, offers a lifestyle that resonates with both vibrancy and serenity. Spanning five islands and boasting over 50 kilometers of untouched coastline, the community is a testament to Dubai's ambitious vision. The façade is strategically located within this remarkable setting, providing residents with unparalleled access to exclusive luxurious resorts, upscale retail, and cultural attractions. Every day here is an invitation to embrace life to its fullest, with the ocean as a constant companion and the city’s iconic skyline within reach.

The tower’s configuration, comprising ground floor, two podiums for car parking, 12 residential floors, and a rooftop with unparalleled features, ensures a seamless living experience. Each of the 112 units is meticulously designed, with 54 one-bedroom apartments, 54 two-bedroom apartments, and 04 penthouses. These residences are not merely living spaces; they are a harmonious blend of form and function, where every single element is tailored to elevate everyday living. From spacious layouts to premium finishes, every detail is a testament to commitment to quality and luxury.

title: The Community Sports Arena
description:
he Community Sports Arena at Dubai Sports City is a residential development by Aqua Properties, where contemporary luxury meets urban living with studios, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments. This impressive project rises with 22-storey plus roof structure with four basements and ground areas that is tailored for every lifestyle. These smart-system, semi-furnished apartments are thoughtfully crafted to harmonize modern interiors with ample natural light, bringing comfort and sophistication to every home.

Designed for those who appreciate active living, the arena combines world-class sports amenities, including an infinity pool, fully equipped gym, and access to Dubai Sports City championship golf courses and international sports academies. The community enjoys an exclusive rooftop with recreation areas, pergolas, and spectacular city views. Situated near a future metro station and major roadways, residents benefit from exceptional connectivity to Dubai Marina, Downtown Dubai, and other key districts.

title: Sunset Bay by Imtiaz
description:
Sunset Bay at Dubai Islands is an iconic waterfront development that sets a new benchmark in luxury living with 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments by Imtiaz Developments. Nestled within the serene and vibrant Islands, this exclusive low-rise 08-storey façade comes with ground, plus two podium levels, offering a lifestyle that seamlessly combines tranquillity with urban sophistication. Designed for those who seek both comfort and grandeur, it features an exquisite collection of fully furnished residences. Each residence is thoughtfully designed, with modern layouts and high-quality finishes that reflect contemporary elegance.

From the moment you enter the development, you’re greeted with an ambiance of refined opulence. The interiors boast premium appliances, sleek fittings, and a meticulous attention to detail that ensures every aspect of your home exudes sophistication. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide breathtaking views of the surrounding Island paradise, flooding your living space with natural light and offering panoramic vistas of sunlit waters and vibrant sunsets.

Residents will enjoy unparalleled access to world-class amenities, including a fully equipped fitness center, swimming pools, and lush landscaped gardens. The development is designed for those who crave a resort-style experience, with exclusive beach and marina access just minutes away. Whether you’re unwinding at the private beach, taking a leisurely stroll along the marina, or enjoying the vibrant social scene of the island, every moment here is an invitation to embrace the finer things in life.

title: The Beach Collection Villas 2
description:
Nakheel is presenting a highly anticipated oasis of The Beach Collection Villas Launch 2 at Palm Jebel Ali in Dubai aligned with stunning 5 & 6-bedroom villas. This is another grand offering on the world-class man-made archipelago that is designed spark the massive growth in infinite and unparalleled living opportunities. Welcome to a blissful private realm, where serene mesmerizing gulf waters touch your doorstep and instant access to your own sandy beach unwind the calm and exuberant environment. The multiple choices of distinctive residences reflect the exceptionalism and uniqueness, in which some of aspects are timeless modernity, stylish minimalism, cultural heritage, mediterranean touch and many other.

Each of the villa embodies a ground and 2 levels, where frond B combines 78 different types of abodes and frond C comes with 100 other home units. The Villa Blue Horizon is the first type of beach-side home influenced by the endless skyline of sky and the gulf, including a family room, roof lounge, terrace, an interior courtyard adorned with greenery and fully curated exquisite interiors. Villa Indigo Ocean is another type of beachfront sanctuary that comes with simply contemporary and alluring facade style with additional indoor spaces and the scenic green surroundings.

Villa Cyan Sky is recognized by the elegant and stylish infrastructural style with the expensive-fusion of neutral and dark facade-materials, large windows and interiors designed with artistic approach. The Villa Pacific Breeze has been composed with sleek lines, timeless urban charm and minimalistic detail in all aspect of the exterior, while the interiors come with rich and earthy hues, spacious layouts, extra-large balcony and deck area with well-furnished setup.

Villa Cobalt is another extraordinary beachfront enclave characterised by the large ceiling heights, curated with natural wooden elements, perfect match of soft and brown materials on the exterior. The inviting interiors also exude the sense of a warm ambiance, where furnished and finely equipped spaces blend within the nature-inspired scenic layouts. Villa Baia Luna is a striking range of homes, distinguished by the expensive interiors inspired by the futuristic aspect of living, including cutting-edge elements, layout, dark and the prestigious phase of modernity.

title: Damac Nice
description:
Lagoons Nice is a new residential development by Damac Properties that presents 4 to 6 bedroom villas and townhouses, laced with premium amenities at service. The exclusive residential collections are further laced with an amazing community charm offering you access to some of the finest lifestyle amenities.

This coastal destination offers residents as well as guests’ access to the sunny skies, deep blue waters, cobblestone streets along with the distinctive architecture that make it picturesque seem like a pastel work of art.

Damac Nice is a starting point of an awe-inspiring journey across the scenic coastline, where you can experience the rich history and the heritage of Dubai. The townhouses and villas are conveniently located around the community and offer residents a perfect balance of privacy, fun and adventure.

The convenient location of the development near Damac Lagoons will further offer you access to the rest of the city. Whereas living proximity to the major highways will further provide easy access to the key business districts, retail areas and the leisure hubs of the community.

Experience the magical lifestyle destination, where you can explore the waterfront facilities. Further, the development is made available with attractive payment plan options, so end-users can easily opt for booking the townhouses or villas with relative ease.

title: Beach Walk Residence 3
description:
Beachwalk Residence 3 at Dubai Islands is the latest waterfront façade within the pristine ground developed by Imtiaz Developments with 1 & 2 bedroom apartments and 3 bedroom penthouses. Nestled within the edge of the Island, this prestigious property offers an extraordinary living experience that fuses modern convenience with the tranquility of coastal living. With its exclusive sophisticated architecture, high-end interiors and world class amenities, sets a new benchmark for luxury waterfront living.

Located along the picturesque coastline of Dubai Islands, residents are living at the heart of the city’s most vibrant and evolving community. The area is known for its stunning vistas and peaceful environment and is fast becoming the most sought-after waterfront destination in Dubai. With breathtaking views and excellent connectivity to the key famous landmarks including access to Downtown Dubai, Dubai International Airport and key leisure venues, makes this an ideal choice for all. Whether you are heading to a business meeting, want to indulge in high-end shopping or enjoying five-star meal, everything is within easy reach.

The luxury design and the timeless architecture is presented with attention to detail design evident at every corner. Where the sleek and modern design of the façade blends seamlessly with the natural elements. The exterior showcase its expansive glass window that not only enhances the overall aesthetic but also provides panoramic views of the stunning coastal cityscape. The interiors are equally immersive and offers neutral colours design with accents of gold and other luxurious materials creating a warm and soothing atmosphere. With premium collection of residential options that seamlessly blends the contemporary design and functional luxury, with open plan living for entertainment.

title: Cove Edition 2
description:
Cove Edition 2 at Dubailand is a remarkable residential project by Imtiaz Developments redefining the lifestyle with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. This impressive structure, comprising two basement levels, a ground floor, 13 residential floors, and a rooftop designed with a concrete frame and durable block finishes, ensuring both strength and elegance. Each unit is meticulously crafted to provide a serene sanctuary, merging comfort with sophisticated style. The interior spaces are adorned with soft hues and ambient lighting that create a calming atmosphere, inviting residents to unwind after a long day.

Located within Dubailand, one of the most dynamic and sought-after neighbourhoods in Dubai, provides residents with unmatched convenience. Its proximity to Dubai International Airport, Downtown Dubai, and other key attractions makes it an ideal location for families, professionals, and investors alike. Known for its rich mix of residential, leisure, and entertainment options, the community blends modern city life with the charm of a close-knit community. Whether you're looking for world-class shopping, fine dining, or green parks, everything is within easy reach.

The architectural design emphasizes an elevated lifestyle, blending contemporary elements with nature, featuring warm gold tones and wood accents. Residents are greeted by a grand entrance that sets the tone for the luxurious experience that awaits them. The thoughtful design extends throughout the building, enhancing the overall living experience while fostering a sense of community. Its sleek facade and luxurious finishes create a lasting impression, with gold accents and rich wood details adorning the grand entrance. The structure embodies a sophisticated urban aesthetic, offering a visual connection between nature and the city.

title: Cove Edition One
description:
Cove Edition by Imtiaz Developments is the latest residential advancement located at the heart of Dubailand lined with premium range of designer studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. This new and elegant façade offers an elevated lifestyle combining sophistication and luxury at ease, setting the new standard for the upscale living in Dubai. With world-class amenities, these premium class residence is designed to provide unparalleled convenience and serenity, ideal for those seeking a refined living.

Nestled within the expanse of Dubailand, the façade promises a serene lifestyle destination that offers easy access to the rest of the city. The seamless connected network provides swift connectivity to the key landmarks and places such as Downtown Dubai and International Airport within reach. The prime location not only enhances the living experience, but also presents a perfect choice for all.

The timeless architecture promises a refined lifestyle designed harmoniously by blending the natural elements with its contemporary designs. The use of gold tones and wood accents throughout the units and common areas presents a sense of warmth and sophistication, creating a serene environment that is both luxurious and inviting. From the moment you enter the development, it greets you with grand entrance area. The luxurious ascend continues throughout the façade is thoughtfully designed to enhance the living experience.

The façade offers a variety of designer apartments catering to different lifestyle aspects, where each one is crafted to offer a personal sanctuary, providing a calming environment. The soft hues and the light ambience creates a serene touch of sophistication, where these premium living spaces offers a retreat from the hustle and bustle of daily life. The custom designed furniture within the residences, as well as the ambient lightning sets the mood for relaxation offering comfort and elegance.

For the leisure lifestyle, the development is equipped with wide range of premium class amenities and facilities to inspire every day. The club room provides a well-rounded lifestyle with grand space that blends urban bliss with artisanal design, creating a captivating social environment. The state of the art gym is equipped with the latest equipment, catering to those who are passionate about the healthy lives. For the relaxed lifestyle, the façade offers serene cabanas and luxury poolside lounge areas, providing the perfect escape.

title: Azizi Riviera Reve
description:
Riviera Rêve is here by Azizi Developments at Meydan, Mohammed Bin Rashid City offering the most luxurious and classy studios, 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartments. One of the best living experiences that upgrade your life to new heights of excellence in architecture and infrastructure, which comprises a luxurious exposure to beachfront living with iconic amenities and brilliant services.

A home to leisure and entertainment, making every single moment spent here memorial, so you cherish your life which is so enhanced by the luxury of the possibility. It's a tailored life that fits in every demand and expectation even beyond the imagination of all dimensions of lifestyle. A life and infrastructure drawing its inspiration from French Riviera and complements your life with stunning visuals and neighbourhoods.

The eye cherishing views with captivating visuals that soothe the mood and brings you into the proximity of a classy life in entertainment, leisure, joy, and interactions. A home of amenities and facilities that simplifies your life to the endless possibility. What else can you expect in life when you have access to all kinds of retail, grocery, entertainment, recreational, sports, leisure, fun, and more.

An accessible life whose marvels are worth appreciating brings users to the world of beauty with the serenity of class and identical benefits. With all kinds of facilities that are usually rare to find in normal development, making every moment exclusive. So get into this site as soon as possible to enjoy a life of pleasure and distinguished advantages. The most splendid and luxurious homes which make your life an epitome of standard so to enjoy a rare class.

title: Park Beach Residence 2
description:
Park Beach Residence 2 at Al Marjan Island is the second residential series by Deca Properties offering premium collection of studios, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. This new development has quickly become one of the most sought-after residential project after the successful launch of the first phase in Ras Al Khaimah with premium units selling fast. The remarkable appeal lies in a combination of its prime location laced with innovative design features unbeatable lifestyle facilities. The façade is designed for those who seek perfect blend of modern living and serene coastal beauty of the Island.

The premium and exclusive waterfront address at Al Marjan Island within Ras Al Khaimah offers tons of opportunities to indulge in the rich cultural history and lifestyle facilities. The lifestyle is celebrated with its stunning landscapes, pristine beaches, and world-class amenities and waterfront promenade. The destination promises both relaxation and excitement, making it a sough-after location where residents and guests can enjoy the lifestyle. Situated at the heart of breathtaking archipelago, it offers direct access to the pristine beaches and uninterrupted views of the azure waters.

The architectural concept is simple yet profound, that creates a residential haven with the essence of modern coastal living. The vison came into life through its cutting-edge architecture, state of the art techs and its premium range of amenities designed to enhance the quality life. Each residence within the development is a designed with contemporary and functionality in mind, in order to offers premium class living experience.

title: La Mer by ELIE SAAB
description:
La Mer by ELIE SAAB at Al Marjan Island is an exceptional new luxury waterfront project by Arte Developments with a mix of chalet, 1, 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartments, villas and penthouses. The project is a remarkable testament to contemporary architectural elegance, offering an exclusive residential experience that merges opulence with the natural beauty of the Arabian Gulf. The façade design features three distinct, cylindrical-shaped towers as Isle 1, Isle 2, and Isle 3, designed with a sophisticated, organic aesthetic that complements the turquoise waters and pristine shorelines. These interconnected towers, each rising 17 floors with sweeping sea and park views, feature bridge connections that enhance accessibility and community across the levels, furthering the sense of connectivity within the development.

The prime location at Al Marjan Island is itself a marvel, combining the untouched beauty of the Arabian Gulf with modern infrastructure and upscale amenities within Ras Al Khaimah’s coastline. Renowned for its breathtaking landscapes and high-end leisure offerings, this man-made island has become a destination of choice for those seeking a refined lifestyle close to Dubai yet removed from the bustle of city life. Residents enjoy views of the prestigious Wynn Resort and access to a wealth of nearby world-class dining, shopping, and entertainment options, which add vibrancy to the serene ambiance of Al Marjan.

The architectural design emphasizes fluidity, from the towers' curving facades to the elevated walkways that connect them, creating a seamless flow between luxury residences and shared spaces. This continuity extends to the expansive podium level, which hosts a carefully curated selection of premium retail and dining establishments. With direct beach access and a lush landscaped environment, offers residents and visitors an immersive experience where modern luxury meets serene coastal living.

The development and designer Elie Saab have collaborated to ensure that every aspect reflects a commitment to quality and refinement. Interiors are crafted with a sophisticated blend of rich textures and modern design elements that highlight the signature style, exuding an atmosphere of timeless elegance and comfort. This attention to detail enhances the visual appeal of the interiors and allows residents to connect with the scenic surroundings, offering a sense of tranquility and exclusivity.

title: Onda by Kasco
description:
Onda at Business Bay is the latest residential series from the portfolio of Kasco Developments offering premium collection of studios, 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments in Dubai. The exclusive high-rise 23-storey tower is set to redefine the lifestyle providing convenience of urban living lined with its exclusive environment and amenities like none other. The high-rise façade is set along Marasi Drive offering its residents a leisure lifestyle that combines luxury, convenience and an extraordinary connection to nature, all enveloped within the city’s sought-after residential district. The project is not just limited to its luxury residences but all-encompassing lifestyle in the dynamic city designed for those who appreciate luxury, convenience and modernity.

The prime and strategic location at Business Bay (Marasi Drive) is a premier address that provides an unparalleled lifestyle with a blend of business, and leisure. Discover urban sophistication with the costal elegance to redefine the lifestyle, allowing effortless access to the rest of the city. The exclusive connectivity to the main roads such as Al Khail Road and Sheikh Zayed Road, rest provides easy and hassle-free access to the key destinations in Dubai and beyond. The Marasi locality is a picturesque stretch of canal-side beauty, inviting its residents to stroll along the pathways, relax by the water or explore its leisure and attractions.

The project's name is defined as wave in Italian, creates an immediate link with water, symbolizing the seamless blend of lifestyle and location. This deliberate choice not only reflects its proximity to the canal but also signifies a rhythmic harmony, where the bustling city meets the calming influence of the water. With energy-efficient building practices, sustainable materials, and smart home technologies, this development aligns with Dubai’s forward-looking approach to environmentally conscious living.

title: Takaya Symphony at Motor City
description:
Takaya Symphony at Motor City is a 20-storey residential masterpiece crafted by Union Properties with premium collection of studios, 1, 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartments and penthouses in Dubai. The exclusive high-rise architecture seamlessly blends urban vibrancy within lush suburban serenity, presenting an exceptional lifestyle. Designed for those who seek more than just a home, this striking tower is a blend of elegance and functionality. From the moment you step into the tower, you’re enveloped in a world of sophistication, where each detail is crafted to elevate everyday living.

The architecture reflects modern luxury, with sleek lines and expansive glass facades that invite natural light and maximize views of the lively Motor City and surrounding lush landscapes. Each residence exudes class and quality, with interiors designed to balance contemporary aesthetics with functional design. High ceilings, premium finishes, and open layouts create a spacious ambiance, while meticulously crafted kitchens and serene bedrooms ensure comfort and style.

As a part of its luxurious appeal, the façade offers a host of exclusive amenities that encourage wellness, relaxation, and social connections. Residents can unwind at the infinity pool with panoramic views or engage in active pursuits at the fully equipped gym, jogging track, and sports courts. With co-working spaces, an arcade lounge, and dedicated children’s play areas, the tower caters to every need. At this development life is all about enjoying an enriching, connected lifestyle with the luxury and convenience that you deserve.

title: Greenville at Emaar South
description:
Greenville at Emaar South is a remarkable new residential launch brought to life by Emaar Properties lined with a premium selection of 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses in Dubai. This exceptional series emerged after the inspiration from modern design in the heart-filled green community lined with leisure facilities, offering residents a chance to experience contemporary elegance. The façade blends modern architecture with natural elements designed with both individuals and families in mind, offering a serene lifestyle in a vibrant community.

Living here at Emaar South community means enjoying the convenience of being close to all the essentials. The development is situated near a community park, mosque, and nursery, ensuring that everyday needs are within easy reach. In addition, its proximity to Expo City Dubai and Al Maktoum International Airport offers unparalleled access to major attractions and business hubs, making it an ideal location for those who want a peaceful home environment without sacrificing connectivity to the rest of the city. Whether commuting for work, dropping the kids off at school, or enjoying leisure activities, it places everything you need right at your doorstep.

Each townhouse is designed with a focus on both functionality and style, providing a living space that caters to the needs of modern families. The sleek, contemporary facades blend seamlessly with the lush surroundings, creating a harmonious environment where luxury and nature coexist. With panoramic views through expansive windows and interiors that feature warm, earthy tones, these homes exude a sense of serenity and comfort. Residents can expect spacious living areas, modern kitchens, and well-appointed bedrooms, offering a perfect blend of sophistication and practicality.

title: The Alba Residences
description:
The Alba Furnished Residences Dorchester Collection at Palm Jumeirah is a revolutionary concept in luxury living by Omniyat, with ultra-luxury 2 and 3 bedroom residences. As the first fully furnished residences by Dorchester Collection, crafted by the world-renowned design studio YODEZEEN, these residences blend art, comfort, and luxury into every aspect of the living experience. The exclusive façade transcends traditional luxury, crafting a living experience that’s artfully tailored for Dubai’s most discerning residents, set within a retreat that bears the Dorchester hallmark of refined hospitality.

Located at the eastern crescent of Palm Jumeirah, the façade offers residents both tranquil beachfront living and easy access to Dubai’s finest attractions. This premium location allows residents to immerse themselves in the serene ambiance of waterfront luxury while being minutes away from the vibrant dining, shopping, and entertainment venues that define Dubai’s cosmopolitan lifestyle.

Known globally for their exceptional hospitality, the Dorchester brings its legendary service ethos to this premium project. Here, attentive service is a lifestyle, with every need anticipated and met to ensure an unparalleled living experience. The group’s commitment to detail and discretion guarantees that residents will enjoy the same level of service found in its world-famous hotels, right within their homes on Palm Jumeirah.

The development not only showcases commitment to the Art of Elevation, but also underscores their legacy of partnering with the world’s leading architects and designers. Designed by Zaha Hadid Architects and furnished by YODEZEEN, it is the epitome of curated living, redefining elegance and comfort. Every residence has been curated by the acclaimed design studio, known for blending form with function to elevate interiors into immersive experiences. With award-winning expertise, it has created interiors that transform daily living into something spectacular, with each detail thoughtfully selected to enhance beauty, comfort, and functionality.

title: Havelock Heights at JVC
description:
A newly arrived mix-used gem of Havelock Heights by AA HMB Real Estate Development is in JVC of Dubai with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments & duplexes. Witness the heights of an upscale living that is dedicated to serve the best of the experiences to its residents. Including a ground, 4 podiums, 19 floors with 156 home units and a rooftop, this artfully designed rising innovation offers residential and retail spaces. Enjoy the culturally vibrant community that offers a perfect balance of serene, essential and leisure city-like environment right within this fastest thriving district.

This high-end piece of paradise is a home for multiple amenities, catering to all the basic to entertaining and wellness experiences of the modern residents. There you will find a zen sky garden, recreational space, beach pool, an infinity pool, kid’s water splash and play area and many other spaces to unwind quality refreshing moments. A BBQ area, a gym, dining room, gaming lounge & open-air cinema are the prime options to rejuvenate, socialize and stay healthy by staying this enclave.

title: Interstellar Tower at JVT
description: Interstellar Tower at Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) is a premium class development where urban living meets elegance, by Mr. Eight Development with exclusive 2 and 3-bedroom suites in Dubai. Rising 29 storey high, this exceptional development redefines luxury with 236 meticulously designed residences with unmatched comfort. Every unit is crafted to bring residents unmatched comfort, featuring unique layouts, top-quality furnishings, and breathtaking views of Dubai’s iconic Bluewaters and Marina skylines. Beyond the luxury residences, the tower is a haven of relaxation and recreation, with a rooftop river, landscaped green spaces, and state-of-the-art facilities. This development invites you to experience an urban sanctuary where every detail reflects thoughtful planning, creating a space for both relaxation and a vibrant city lifestyle.

title: Binghatti Elite
description: Binghatti Elite at IMPZ (Dubai Production City) is the latest and first ever residential advancement by Binghatti Developers with premium studios, 1 bedroom apartments and garden suites. The exclusive high-rise façade redefined urban living with its blend of sophisticated design, prime location and world-class amenities. From its cosmopolitan lifestyle to its tranquil gated community, it stands out as the epitome of luxury and convenience in the heart of Dubai. Ideal for both investors and end-user, offering a highly investable opportunity in one of the Dubai’s fast growing districts. The development ensures that you are never far away from the action, with major shopping centres like Dubai Hills Mall, Mall of the Emirates and Ibn Battuta Mall, as well as Dubai Marina in just minutes away.

title: Omniyat Vela Viento
description:
Discover the epitome of luxury living with Vela Viento Residences at Business Bay, a prestigious development by Omniyat that offers a curated collection of 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartments, duplexes and penthouses. With a limited edition of 92 exquisite residences, this waterfront masterpiece is a testament to its commitment to shaping Marasi Bay into Dubai's foremost ultra-luxury waterfront community. Explore the boundless possibilities in the transformative setting of waterfront living managed by Dorchester Collection.

The development's prime address offers a gateway to Downtown Dubai, framing the future of this evolving city Marai Bay. The easy accessibility to the main highways allows residents to move quickly to key destinations without any further problems. Unveiling the future at Dubai's new luxury district, it stands as a testament to reshaping Marasi Bay foremost ultra-luxury waterfront community. It takes pride of place, offering a life in motion, guided by the song of the wind and framed by the majestic Burj Khalifa.

Designed by the award-winning Foster + Partners, the 45-storey architecture is a masterpiece of horizontal lines and smooth curves in two towers. The spaces within are a reflection of the power of imagination and the interplay of light, shadow, and voids, connecting the interior and exterior realms. Gilles & Boissier, the Parisian designer duo, infuse their signature style into luxury interior design, creating a harmonious comparison of contemporary elements and classical features.

Selected residences go beyond the ordinary, featuring private pools and double-height spaces. The emphasis on generous proportions creates an ambiance of vastness, ideal for relaxation, entertainment, and savoring the breathtaking vistas. The thoughtfully designed spaces and bridges between the towers form 'hanging' dining rooms, a unique feature that transforms daily moments into transcendent experiences. The floor designs are a testament to the careful consideration of both aesthetic appeal and functional comfort, offering residents a truly extraordinary living experience.

title: Mayar at Reem Island
description: Mayar at Reem Island is the grand part of the first residential development by Modon Properties, presenting a series of 3 & 4-bedroom Maisonettes in Abu Dhabi. Nestled within the vibrant Maysan district, the façade introduces Abu Dhabi's first-ever stacked maisonettes, blending luxury, comfort, and nature. This unique development offers luxury maisonettes, and duplexes, each offering a modern sanctuary in the heart of the city. With its lush green parks, walking trails, and world-class amenities, the development seamlessly connects residents to the outdoors while providing a serene, resort-like environment. Designed for families and individuals seeking a tranquil yet vibrant community, redefining urban living.

title: Emaar Marina Cove
description:
Marina Cove at Dubai Marina is the latest pristine residential addition defining the skyline, a new project by Emaar Properties lined with premium collection of 1, 2, 3 & 4-bedroom apartments. This high-rise façade sets to define the vibrant marina with exceptional blend of modern architecture, cutting-edge amenities, and breathtaking views. The architecture rises in the sky as beacon of sophistication and exclusivity, providing its residents an unparalleled lifestyle experience that capture the essence of cosmopolitan allure. The exclusive class waterfront façade seamlessly blends the vibrant pulse of the city life with the tranquillity of waterfront living at ease.

The prime and exclusive class location at Dubai Marina offers a paradise within the waterfront setting lined with seamless connectivity. The locality is renowned for its breathtaking views of skylines, shimmering waters and luxury lifestyle. Residents can enjoy immediate access to the iconic 3.5 km of canal, surrounded by sleek skyscrapers, high-end boutiques, and waterfront restaurants. The façade is well-connected via metro, tram and major road networks including Sheikh Zayed Road, ensuring residents are always within easy reach to the rest of the city. Whether it’s the bustling Marina Walk, the excitement of watersports, or the serene views of the water, it is where the modern living meets adventurous lifestyle.

The striking architecture presents timeless design standing tall with its sleek, modern architecture, a true reflection of Dubai’s luxurious skylines. The design of the building captures both elegance and practicality, with expansive windows flooding the living space with natural light. Every detail has been thoughtfully considered to create homes that balances luxury with comfort. The optimum configuration is designed in a way that it offers everyone a serene lifestyle, if you are professional seeking a stylish compact apartments or a growing family seeking more space at ease. Every apartment features spacious, open-plan living areas, perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

title: Sunshine Bay at Al Marjan
description:
Sunshine Bay at Al Marjan Island is a premium residential development by Source of Fate Properties, lined with premium apartments in Ras Al Khaimah. This 12-storey architectural masterpiece embodies luxury living, with its sailboat-inspired design that perfectly complements the surrounding coastal beauty. The project features 240 spacious apartments, each designed to offer breathtaking views of the Gulf, while blending modern aesthetics with a tranquil seaside ambiance.

Beyond its stunning architecture, it is designed with sustainability in mind. Biophilic elements, lush greenery, and innovative water features help create a refreshing and eco-friendly environment. With a location less than an hour from Dubai International Airport and in proximity to major attractions, it offers the best of island living and urban convenience, making it an ideal choice for discerning homeowners.

Crafted to resemble the silhouette of a yacht, the undulating balconies and sleek lines exude elegance and sophistication. The interior spaces are designed with a contemporary touch, featuring a lobby, café lounge, state-of-the-art fitness facilities, children’s play areas, and an expansive pool area. The rooftop, with its panoramic views and garden is the perfect space for residents to unwind while soaking in the beauty of the surrounding archipelago.

title: Sobha Coral Beach Villas
description: Sobha Coral Beach Villas at Siniya Island is the pristine luxury residential edition by Sobha Group featuring limited 5-bedroom villas within Umm Al Quwain. These exclusive class homes epitomize the seamless blend of nature and opulence, presenting a rare opportunity to experience beachfront living. Each villa showcases modern elegance while embracing nature’s finest, offering expansive views of lush mangroves, pristine beaches, and the Arabian Gulf. The island is an untouched paradise that combines luxury with tranquility, making this ultimate retreat for those seeking a serene yet adventurous lifestyle.

title: PG Maison at Al Furjan
description: PG Maison at Al Furjan redefines contemporary living with its exclusive 24-storey residential building featuring 02-bedroom apartments developed by Pure Gold Living. Designed with residents in mind, the façade promises a lifestyle of elegance, comfort, and convenience in one of Dubai’s most coveted locations. Featuring spacious living areas, fully equipped kitchens, and dedicated study/home offices, each unit offers an ideal space for both work and leisure. Natural light fills the interiors, while private balconies invite residents to unwind and enjoy their surroundings. This exclusive class façade isn’t just a home; it’s a retreat designed for modern families and astute investors, with its blend of sophisticated interiors, premium finishes, and world-class amenities.

title: Vida Residences Club Point
description:
Start a new urban chapter with Vida Residences Club Point at Dubai Hills Estate, the latest residential development by Emaar Properties, offering premium 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments. This vibrant project sets with two multi-storey towers, designed for those seeking a creative and socially active lifestyle. Offering a perfect blend of modernity and comfort, the façade embraces simplicity, elegance and functionality, all while being nestled in the serene beauty of the green community. Enjoy the seamless integration of nature and urban convenience with stunning views of the of lush greenery and access to state of the facilities to enhance the lifestyle.

Dubai Hills Estate, known as the green heart of Dubai, offers a masterfully planned community that brings together the best of both worlds, urban energy and natural tranquillity. The façade is located in the center of this stunning estate, offering residents easy access to Dubai’s major districts, while being surrounded by peaceful, green landscapes. From Dubai Hills Park, which offers a beautiful setting for leisurely walks and outdoor activities, to Dubai Hills Mall with over 650 retail outlets, this community provides everything you need within a stone’s throw of your home.

The architecture is sleek and modern, while the interiors are designed to maximize light, space, and comfort. Large floor-to-ceiling windows frame sweeping views of the lush greenery, the championship golf course, and the iconic Dubai skyline. With every detail thoughtfully curated, from the choice of materials to the colour palette and layout, it creates a warm, welcoming atmosphere that makes everyday living both inspiring and serene. Whether you're spending time indoors enjoying the elegant living spaces or outdoors in the landscaped gardens, this is the perfect choice where contemporary design meets natural beauty.

The development offers an impressive array of amenities designed to enrich every moment of your day. From state-of-the-art gym facilities to serene pools and lush landscaped gardens, every corner of the community is designed for relaxation, recreation, and socializing. Whether you’re taking a refreshing dip in the pool, working out in the gym, or hosting a barbecue with friends in the outdoor lounge areas, it provides an environment where life’s everyday moments are elevated to new levels of comfort and enjoyment.

title: Binghatti Skyrise
description: Binghatti Skyrise at Business Bay is the latest architectural marvel redefining luxury living developed by Binghatti Developers lined with premium apartments in Dubai. Rising elegantly above the skyline, this high-rise development offers a distinctive blend of signature design elements and modern urban sophistication. Positioned along the scenic Dubai Canal, it provides residents with panoramic views of the city’s most iconic landmarks, including the Burj Khalifa, while immersing them in the vibrant atmosphere of one of Dubai's most sought-after neighbourhoods. Whether you’re seeking a peaceful retreat or a lively hub, it provides an ideal balance, with spaces designed to offer both relaxation and entertainment in the heart of the city.

title: Samana Rome
description:
Samana Rome at Meydan District 11 is an exceptional residential development crafted by Samana Developers lined with premium range of 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with pool. The low-rise concept rising with 05-storey boasts a modern and luxurious architectural design towers, featuring a total of limited 80 units with balanced layouts and high-end finishes. The unique feature of the façade is the private swimming pool ensuring residents can enjoy a touch of exclusivity and luxury right at home. With convenience at the forefront, the façade offers an array of top-notch facilities designed to elevate the lifestyle of its residents.

Located in Meydan, District 11, the façade is strategically positioned to provide seamless connectivity to Dubai’s prime locations. Nestled amidst Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Sheikh Zayed Road, and Al Khail Road, this development ensures residents can easily access the vibrant cityscape while enjoying a peaceful haven within its gated community. The proximity to schools, medical facilities, retail establishments, and leisure spots makes this project the perfect choice for families and professionals alike.

The architecture allure of these lavish residences are thoughtfully designed with luxury in mind. What sets these residences apart is the inclusion of private pools in all, allowing residents to indulge in an oasis of serenity right in the comfort of their homes. The apartments are part of twin low-rise towers, connected at the podium level, creating a seamless flow between spaces while offering exclusive privacy. This low-rise structures ensure a sense of community while maintaining an exclusive feel, offering the ideal balance for those seeking a blend of luxury, comfort, and privacy.

title: Velora 2 at The Valley Phase 2
description:
Velora 2 at The Valley Phase 2 is the second residential series by Emaar Properties offering a limited collection of 3 and 4-bedroom townhouses in Dubai. Designed to blend urban convenience with the tranquility of nature, the façade is inspired by the scenic beauty of its surroundings. Imagine waking up each day in home inspired by the beauty of nature, where adventure and serenity harmoniously co-exist together. Each townhouse combines elegance and practicality with spacious layouts, and floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the home with natural light. The result is a harmonious fusion of indoor and outdoor living, enhanced by the beautiful landscape of rolling hills, lush meadows, and picturesque valleys.

Situated in a prime location within The Valley Phase 2, it offers exceptional connectivity to the rest of Dubai. Residents enjoy quick access to the Jebel Ali Lehbab Road, which links major business districts and leisure hubs with ease. Proximity to key areas such as Expo 2020, Dubai South, and Jebel Ali Industrial Area ensures convenience for both work and leisure. In addition to its strategic location, the façade presents a host of premium amenities that encourage an active and balanced lifestyle.

The architecture allure of these luxury class townhouses reflect the essence of nature, while delivering the best in modern living. Residents are treated to luxurious comfort within the spacious and high-end intuitively design homes that prioritizes light, space and aesthetic appeal. Every corner of the development is crafted to encourage exploration, where the façade offers numerous outdoor facilities that cater to a life of discovery and adventure. Each home is designed with modern family living in mind, offering ample space for gathering, entertainment or simply enjoying the quiet moments.

title: Franck Muller Vanguard
description:
Franck Muller Vanguard at Dubai Marina is the next level magnificent 34-storey residential building by London Gate with premium studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. The architectural marvel designed by Dar Design & Architecture Bureau, brings together the boldness of Swiss watchmaking craftsmanship with the sophistication of contemporary real estate. More than just a residential space, the vanguard is a symbol of a lifestyle driven by ambition and audacity.

Spanning kilometres along the pristine Gulf shoreline, this extraordinary waterfront development is one of the region's most coveted real estate hubs. The tower stands as a beacon of modernity and elegance, blending cutting-edge architecture with timeless charm. Its soaring height of 4 Basements, ground + retail, 3 podiums, and residential floors promises breathtaking vistas of both the marina and the cityscape. This façade is designed for those who seek more than just a home, those who are captivated by a life of relentless pursuit for originality, innovation, and luxury.

Each residence is an embodiment of the Swiss watchmaker’s avant-garde approach to design. From its distinctive exteriors to intricately designed interiors, the tower offers fully furnished, luxury apartments tailored to the tastes of modern connoisseurs. Inspired by the Vanguard watch collection, these residences break the mold of conventional design, offering bespoke living spaces that reflect the epitome of luxury and craftsmanship.

title: Morocco at Damac Lagoons
description:
Experience the exclusive living in Morocco Damac Lagoons by Damac Properties at Damac Lagoons, Dubai offering 4 & 5 bedroom townhouses and 6 & 7 bedroom villas designed in Morocco style of architecture and decor. Explore living in the lap of nature with incredible possibilities and fun elements. Live in the full zeal with perfect ambience and tranquillity that ensures a happy living with your loved ones.

The world of Damac Lagoons as you know has always been great and attractive exuding a new realism and luxury. Within the perfect surroundings of nature and blessings of modernity, users will get to embark on an adventurous journey full of premium and exciting features that combine with technology integrated smart services.

Close to many famous and widely recognised developments that adds glamour to the community. Including some really famous ones like Dubai Autodrome, Dubai Polo & Equestrian Club, Global Village, Mall of the Emirates, and many more world class places. A community which allows you to explore some fresh deal of time and quality. Where you can rejoice with the moments and celebrate life.

This beautiful and elegant lifestyle community has its own charm that reflects its style and luxury. A perfect place which helps you to identify and enhance your standards. Expose yourself to the next level of luxury and comfort with all kinds of convenience at fingertips.

title: Sobha Coraline Beach Residences
description:
Coraline Beach Residences at Siniya Island is the third series of luxury resort-style inspired residential development by Sobha Group lined with premium selection of 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and duplexes. Discover the untouched beauty of the Island, a jewel of Umm Al Quwain, where this latest cluster on the exclusive Island promises a life of elegance and tranquillity, with full panoramic views from every side. Set next to the previous clusters, the façade offers an unmatched Island living experience, blending modern comfort with the natural beauty of its surroundings. Imagine waking up to the soothing sounds of waves, the sight of serene mangroves, and the fresh breeze of Gulf at your doorstep, where the façade offers a unique opportunity to indulge in the ultimate coastal lifestyle.

The prime location at Siniya Island, known for its remarkable wildlife preserve, white sand beaches, and flourishing mangroves, offers a rare oasis for residents seeking serenity with a hint of adventure. Despite its secluded charm, the Island is only a 1.7 km bridge away from the mainland, ensuring convenient access to the city’s key destinations. Picture yourself strolling barefoot on the pristine sands, with gazelles and flamingos as your neighbours, and rare turtles roaming freely. The island’s natural habitat creates a truly immersive living experience, offering a retreat into nature while maintaining the comforts of modern luxury.

Imagine waking up to the soothing sounds of waves, the sight of serene mangroves, and the fresh breeze of the Arabian Gulf at your doorstep. The façade is a part of the exceptional vision, offering a unique opportunity to indulge in the ultimate coastal lifestyle. The tower reflects the harmony of nature and refined living, where each space is thoughtfully designed to offer full sea views, luxurious interiors, and seamless access to the island’s natural wonders.

Experience the sanctuary where luxury meets nature, offering unparalleled coastal living that balances serenity with sophistication. Whether you're gazing out at the endless horizon or exploring the island’s diverse ecosystem, every moment is an invitation to reconnect with the natural world, while enjoying the pinnacle of comfort and elegance. The luxury-class interiors are a true reflection of sophistication, designed to blend contemporary elegance with elements of nature.

title: W Residences at JLT
description:
W Residences at JLT (Jumeirah Lakes Towers) is the next pinnacle of ultra-modern luxury living crafted by Signature Developers lined with branded 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments in Dubai. On the pristine horizon, the high-rise exclusive class 32-storey façade is a venture of collaboration with Marriott International and the developer to present this high-end resort-style development. The breathtaking façade promises to deliver not just homes, but a lifestyle with relaxed, hotel-inspired living lifestyle. As JLT community continues to evolve into a premier destination for leisure, business and recreation, it will stand as a landmark of elegance and exclusivity.

Nestled in the upscale JLT district, it places its residents at the epicenter of Dubai’s finest offerings. Jumeirah Lakes Towers is renowned for its picturesque waterfront setting, framed by tranquil lakes and lush green spaces that provide an oasis of calm within the bustling city. Residents will enjoy proximity access to iconic landmarks such as Downtown Dubai, Burj Khalifa, and the Mall of the Emirates, all easily accessible via Dubai’s well-connected road networks. With its strategic location and seamless connectivity, these premium residences ensure that the best of the city is never far from your doorstep.

The leisure class façade will rise to approximately 32 storeys, featuring meticulously designed apartments. This high-rise marvel offers panoramic views that capture Dubai’s most prestigious landmarks, from the serene greens of the Emirates Golf Course and Emirates Hills to the glittering skyline of the city. The commitment to elevating the standards of luxury living is reflected in every detail of the project, setting new benchmarks in the real estate sector. The tower’s sleek, modern architecture blends seamlessly with the dynamic landscape of JLT, positioning the residences as the epitome of urban sophistication.

The façade will redefine what it means to live luxuriously with a host of world-class amenities designed to cater to every aspect of modern life. Residents will enjoy access to outdoor swimming pools with private cabanas, providing a serene escape from the urban pace. A Sound Suite offers a creative space for music enthusiasts, while children’s play areas and a screening room provide entertainment for families. The residence lounge serves as a sophisticated hub for socializing and relaxation, complemented by co-working spaces and private meeting rooms for the modern professional.

title: Oasiz 2 by Danube
description:
Introduction

Dubai offers two exceptional living experiences: Palm Jumeirah and Danube Oasiz 2. Palm Jumeirah is a renowned man-made island known for its luxury and elegance, while Danube Oasiz 2 is a modern 38-story residential tower that combines contemporary design with functionality. Both developments represent the pinnacle of modern living in Dubai, offering unique lifestyles and top-notch amenities.

Location: Danube Oasiz 2 is located in Dubai Silicon Oasis, providing easy access to major highways like Sheikh Zayed Road. Its strategic location ensures seamless connectivity to business centers, educational institutions, and a wide range of shopping, dining, and entertainment facilities.

Delivery Date: Expected completion by Nov 1, 2027.

Amenities:

Modern apartments with contemporary designs
Luxurious facilities including a state-of-the-art fitness center
Swimming pools
Landscaped gardens
Panoramic city views
At the End: Danube Oasiz 2 combines luxury and functionality with its innovative design and prime location. It promises a unique lifestyle in one of Dubai’s vibrant residential areas, ideal for both professionals and families.

title: Azizi Vista
description:
Azizi Vista is the latest mid-rise development at the beating heart of Dubai Studio City with an exclusive collection of studios, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments, developed by Azizi Developments. You will have the opportunity to live in this premium lifestyle, which offers spectacular services and the pinnacle of access to a genuine living that is abundant with great facilities.

Reside in this wonderful world of amenities, where you will be provided with the opportunity to experience a life of world-class quality in every aspect, including health, recreation, entertainment, and sports, and where you will also have access to astounding levels of entertainment with the people you care about most, so that you can celebrate life to its fullest.

You can have an epic life in these beautiful apartments, where you can look out over some of the best landmarks and infrastructures, skylines and attractions, and more in only a few minutes. Therefore, a location that is absolutely brimming with every imaginable facility and service.

You will be able to experience the best that the world has to offer in terms of modernism and a green environment, complete with breathtaking amenities that are state of the art and iconic features, and provide an edge to your premium lifestyle.

title: Emaar Porto View Mina Rashid
description:
Porto View at Rashid Yachts & Marina is the latest waterfront residential development crafted by Emaar Properties adorning premium 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments and 3 bedroom townhouses. This exclusive development invites you to experience an unparalleled blend of luxury and convenience, where every element of design is meticulously curated to offer residents a world-class living experience. This stunning architectural gem reimagines the essence of sophistication, presenting a bold new vision of opulent seaside living. It establishes an unmatched benchmark for elegance along the coast and transforms the concept of waterfront properties. Here, luxurious living is not just a concept but a lifestyle, with panoramic views of azure waters and vibrant sunsets.

Positioned at the heart of Dubai’s maritime district, the façade is strategically located to offer residents the best of both worlds. Within minutes, you can find yourself immersed in the historical charm of Old Dubai or exploring the cutting-edge modernity of Downtown Dubai. The ease of access to key landmarks such as Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and Dubai Creek Harbour ensures that residents can enjoy the best that this vibrant city has to offer. Whether you're captivated by the cultural richness of the old town or the glittering skylines of modern Dubai, it places you at the heart of it all, offering convenience, luxury, and connectivity.

Each residence is meticulously crafted with sleek lines, contemporary finishes, and open-concept layouts that emphasize space, light, and comfort. The modern architecture is complemented by high-quality materials, ensuring that each home is as functional as it is visually stunning. The interiors are designed with a bright, minimalist aesthetic that creates a sense of openness and serenity. Large windows allow natural light to flood the spaces, while the clean, sophisticated lines of the architecture foster a sense of modern luxury. Whether you're a young professional, a growing family, or someone looking for a peaceful retreat, the residences provide a perfect blend of style and comfort.

title: W Residences at Dubai Harbour
description:
W Residences at Dubai Harbour presents the new premium development by renowned Arada Developer laced with 1 to 4 bedroom apartments, duplexes and 5-bedroom penthouses. This latest high-rise master piece, offers an unparalleled living experience in one of Dubai's most coveted locations.

The architectural design of the façade incorporates sleek lines and innovative layouts that maximize natural light and offer expansive living spaces. The interiors are crafted with premium materials and finishes, laced with every facility need for a lifestyle, ensuring a sophisticated and elegant ambiance. Each residence is equipped with smart home technology as well as needed features to provide seamless integration of comfort and convenience in day to day lifestyle. These luxurious residences are designed with a contemporary aesthetic and state-of-the-art amenities, reflecting the essence of modern urban living.

Nestled within the iconic Dubai Harbour, the development provides stunning panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf and the city skyline, where every day is beautiful. Residents can enjoy private access to pristine beaches with friends and families, and a plethora of dining and retail options, and world-class leisure facilities. The integration of luxury and convenience ensures that residents can indulge in a dynamic, yet serene, living environment. The carefully curated ground floor enhances the living experience with fine dining and vibrant social scenes.

The creative environment stimulates both residents and visitors with world class amenities layered into the podium level ensuring a fulfilling lifestyle. From a 200-meter long infinity pool and a well-equipped fitness center to exclusive fine dining and shopping experiences, where every aspect is curated to provide the highest standard of luxury.

Residents have access to a range of exclusive amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, spa, swimming pools, and landscaped gardens and much more. The concierge services are unparalleled, catering to every need of the residents, from everyday tasks to special requests, ensuring a hassle-free and luxurious living experience. The development fosters a vibrant social environment with its range of communal spaces designed for gatherings and events.

title: The Pier Residence
description:
The Pier Residence by LMD is a prestigious maritime-inspired residential development with a premium collection of 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments at Dubai Maritime City. Imagine living where the azure sea merges beautifully with the endless sky, finding a sanctuary where lapping waves find their gentle way to the calmness of the sea. The unique façade style designed by the globally renowned firm Arkiplan is about creating living spaces that present a characterised way of life, where residents will find a blend of comfort, style and sophistication at ease.

Located at the Maritime City in Dubai, it offers a waterfront lifestyle with a course set for a dynamic urban destination that presents the combination of waterfront living with the convenience of the city life. With direct access to the major roadways and sea, airports, and public transportation, the façade provides the best connectivity and accessibility to the rest of the city. The strategic location makes this an ideal choice for everyone, who is looking for serenity and convenience in daily life.

The meticulously designed residences are crafted with exclusivity to offer a seamless blend of comfort and elegance, where the expansive windows flood the natural light. With its contemporary finishes and nautical-inspired design elements, the façade enhances the overall experience of its residents to enjoy the haven of refined elegance. The interiors are beautifully designed to adhere to the modern lifestyle that features spacious layouts laced with high-end materials and amenities, elevating the everyday experience.

The façade is meticulously designed to enhance the living experience and comes with its smart home system, allowing you to control the lights, AC, doorbell, curtains and more with just a single touch. The kitchen is equipped with marble and quartz countertops and top-tier integrated appliances, including refrigerator, AC, coffee machine, stove and washing machine. The floor-to-ceiling windows and opulent finishing come with full-height thermal glazing and offer natural light and expansive views of the outdoors. The spa-inspired bathrooms are offered with luxury design Villeroy and Boch sanitary ware fitted with Italian-inspired marble and porcelain tiles. As well as the quality flooring in the bedroom and living areas from the Scandinavian oak style and its natural elements to elevate the lifestyle.

title: Samana Ibiza
description:
Samana Ibiza at Dubailand is the next level residential art developed by Samana Developers, offering premium studios, 1, and 2 bedroom apartments with pool. The exclusive class façade rises in the sky with its two basement levels and ground, lined with 20-storey residential levels designed to promise a serene lifestyle blending tranquillity and grandeur. From the moment you enter the development, the welcoming ambience offers a timeless charm, where the vibrant colours, and the luxury lifestyle creates a space to enjoy a sense of peace and indulgence. The architecture brilliance is further evident in the façade with its minimalist yet elegant design, complemented by leisure amenities enhancing the quality of life.

The prime and strategic location at Dubailand offers the façade a centric address to enjoy the lifestyle that Dubai has to offer. The nearby access to the key famous roadways including Al Ain Road and Emirates Road offers unparalleled connectivity to the prime destinations and attractions. Located in the rapidly growing district provides convenient access to the city’s key destinations, making it easy to navigate through the city without any problem.
