Positioned between the picturesque promenade and the beach, this development provides residents with the luxury of scenic walks through landscaped spaces and seamless access to retail outlets, outdoor areas, and cafes along the waterfront.

The elegantly designed building features a shared podium encompassing a ground floor and two parking levels, housing two exquisite towers—Citrine and Topaz. The 10-storey boasts 123 units, including five luxurious townhouses and a variety of apartments, catering to a diverse range of residents. Each apartment is equipped with a private balcony and dedicated parking spaces, offering breathtaking waterfront views and access to lavish landscaping and pool deck areas.

The development's location on the Corniche Road enhances its appeal, providing residents with easy access to essential facilities and the tranquil waters of Al Khan Lagoon. This prime location ensures that residents enjoy the perfect balance of urban vibrancy and serene waterfront living. Maryam Island, the ultimate leisure and lifestyle destination in Sharjah, offers a range of premium waterfront living experiences. The 900-meter promenade, stunning sea and beach views, and an array of entertainment, shopping, and dining options make it an ideal location for residents and visitors alike.

description: Azizi Neila is part of the popular Al Furjan community in Dubai. by Azizi Developments with meticulously designed studio and 1-bedroom apartments. Embodying the spirits of a vibrant residential hub complemented by the best of lifestyle amenities and leisure facilities.

Enjoy the modern fitness center, perfect for maintaining your wellness routine, or unwind in the stylish communal lounge, designed for social gatherings and casual interactions. Every corner of Beach Walk Residence II is crafted to enhance living experience, blending luxury with a profound sense of community.

The apartments are equipped with Alexa smart home technology. In addition, there is a charging station for electric vehicles.

The rooftop features a plunge pool and lounge with sea views, offering a stunning vantage point for relaxation and social gatherings, that families can enjoy.

The multipurpose hall is ideal for social gatherings and community events, while the kids' play area offers a safe and engaging environment for children. The development also features a scenic walk track and lush green spaces, perfect for leisurely strolls and outdoor activities. Residents can enjoy refreshments at the pool bar, adding to the resort-like ambience. Direct beach access ensures easy enjoyment of Al Marjan Island's pristine beaches and water activities.

With a lifestyle of luxury, comfort and sophistication, the development’s iconic design and the visionary concept create a unique residential experience. As well as the stunning location, its world-class amenities and exquisitely designed residences offer a testament to living

description:
Midora Residences at JVC is a premium class residential sanctuary by QUBE Development offering elegant studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments, 2 & 3-bedroom duplexes. This premier façade embodies the philosophy of "Live, Work, Play and Rejuvenate," providing an all-inclusive environment that harmoniously blends convenience and serenity. This development showcases the exquisite design prowess of the award-winning Japanese architect Nikken Sekkei, who has infused the property with the Japanese concept of Yuragi. The butterfly layout of the buildings absorbs sunlight to enhance their aesthetic appeal, ensuring that every resident experiences the essence of nature within an urban setting.

The prime location at Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), offers residents a family-friendly environment making it an ideal choice for families. The locality is rich in offering green spaces, parks, top-tier schools, premium class dining and shopping facilities, and all the convenience of urban living. Residents can easily access supermarkets, healthcare facilities, and retails options, ensuring every accessibility at the doorstep. The strategic location provides quick connectivity to the major highways, making easy commutes to key areas including Downtown Dubai, Dubai Marina and Palm Jumeirah.

With premium-designed interiors blending contemporary elegance and practical functionality, these residences offer a serene lifestyle. The thoughtfully designed apartments and duplexes are optimised to maximise space and natural light, creating warm and inviting living spaces. The smartly designed residences allow the control of light and temperature to security through a user-friendly app. The integration of smart technology further makes the living experience simpler and more efficient. As well the high-end quality finishes and premium appliances add a touch of exclusivity, meeting the highest standard.

The architecture exteriors exude a modern charm that seamlessly integrates with the lush green surroundings, where the design celebrates its natural elements, crafted to provide a tranquil living experience. The premium oasis offers next-level infrastructure, welcoming you to enjoy the lifestyle. Discover the exclusive built residences, that come with top-notch aesthetics and spacious living environments to enjoy with guests and family.

Aqua Arc is a sanctuary where luxury meets tranquillity, and every detail is crafted with intention and purpose. Inspired by the timeless allure of the sea, the residences boast awe-inspiring wavelike balconies, echoing the elegance of coastal living. Premium units feature meticulously designed private pools on expansive terraces, offering exclusive retreats with sweeping vistas of azure waters. Aqua Arc redefines the art of seaside living, where every moment is an ode to the pinnacle of opulence.

Experience the pinnacle of coastal living at Aqua Arc, an unparalleled masterpiece where the tranquillity of coastal living meets the vibrancy of urban sophistication, creating an oasis of serenity amidst the dynamic energy of the Emirates. description: Velora at The Valley Phase 2 presents the next level residential development by Emaar Properties with limited series of 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses in Dubai. Nestled within the heart of Dubai, this latest community with its first of its kind development, inspired by the natural beauty of surrounding landscape. The architecture design ethos is rooted in creating minimal yet functional living spaces, incorporating a striking influence that harmonizes with serene natural surroundings.
