Towering majestically over the picturesque Dubai Water Canal on Sheikh Zayed Road, the 47-storey ONE B will feature an awe-inspiring design and amenities that will redefine luxury which is synonymous with the city. 

The exceptional design and craftsmanship are evident in even the smallest detail of the tower. Welcoming you to a universe of grandeur is the striking podium with its elevated ceiling and towering column structures. Leaving you in awe the moment you step in, the podium stands as a testament to the opulence you experience inside the tower.

The homes are a world apart. Featuring one, two, three-bedroom as well as duplex and penthouse units, the homes come with expansive spaces and are meticulously designed to impart an aura of absolute luxury and comfort. Equally magnificent are the lifestyle amenities – the finest Dubai has to offer.

The amenities at ONE B give residents the opportunity to relax, play, train, and commit to a wellness-first lifestyle. From state-of-the-art training equipment, gym areas and yoga spaces, a podium-level swimming pool, enticing retail spaces to the enchanting and vibrant kids’ playroom, ONE B is a haven for balanced living.

title: Lucky Oasis Residence
description:
Experience unparalleled luxury living at Lucky Oasis Residence at JVC developed by Lucky Aeon Development, nestled within premium range of studios, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments. Crafted by visionary architects and design experts, every detail is meticulously curated to elevate your living experience. Refined interiors complement your lifestyle, boasting seamless aesthetics and thoughtful details. From exquisite kitchens inspiring culinary experiments to inviting dining areas perfect for gatherings, every space exudes elegance and functionality.

Situated in the heart of Dubai's Jumeirah Village Circle, it enjoys a prime location surrounded by serene landscapes. With seamless connectivity and a bustling neighborhood vibe, residents experience the perfect balance of tranquility and excitement.

With diverse selection of residences within the complex, the luxury façade caters to varying lifestyle needs. No matter of choice, residents can expect thoughtfully designed interiors, seamless transitions between living space, and ample natural light throughout. Additionally, the luxurious apartments, offering unparalleled space and sophistication for discerning residents.

The development sets the standard for luxury living with a diverse array of world-class amenities designed to enhance every aspect of resident’s lives. From relaxation to recreation, the amenities cater to all ages and interests, ensuring a truly enriching living experience.

Indulge in the ultimate relaxation at the beach-style pool, unwind in the rooftop sky lounge with panoramic views, or elevate your fitness routine at the fully equipped gym with a beach pool view. For family-friendly fun, enjoy a game of mini golf or bond over arcade games in the gaming facilities.

title: Palace Residences
description:
Emaar Properties presents the latest launch of Palace Residences, the first 5-star branded residence in Dubai Hills Estate, lined with premium apartments. Situated amidst the lush greenery of Dubai Hills Park, this development redefines contemporary elegance with its sleek, modern design and handpicked natural materials.

With panoramic views of the park and convenient access to Dubai Hills Mall, residents enjoy a vibrant yet serene lifestyle. Dive into the pools, stay active at the gyms, or unwind in the communal spaces, all meticulously designed to enhance the resident experience. The prime location offers seamless connectivity to Downtown Dubai and proximity to essential amenities, making it an ideal choice for those seeking luxury and convenience.

title: Starlight Park
description:
Starlight Park by Amwaj Development epitomizes luxury living in the heart of District 11 Meydan, Dubai lined with premium 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments. This exclusive project redefines urban living, offering residents a haven of sophistication and elegance. With four opulent buildings, it stands as a testament to meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail, setting a new standard for modern living in Dubai.

At the heart lies a thoughtfully designed community area, fostering a sense of belonging and community spirit among residents. This central hub serves as a gathering place for families and neighbors, providing a space for relaxation, recreation, and socializing amidst the lush surroundings.

Each of the four buildings—Block A, B, C, and D—comprises five floors crowned with a rooftop swimming pool and residents' lounge. These architectural marvels blend seamlessly into the urban landscape, offering panoramic views of the city skyline and beyond. The apartments within the complex are meticulously designed to cater to the diverse needs and preferences of modern families.

Upon entering, residents are greeted by a luxurious lobby lounge, setting the tone for the exquisite living experience that awaits. Adorned with contemporary
furnishings and designer touches, the living areas exude elegance and functionality, providing a seamless blend of style and comfort. The bedrooms offer a sanctuary of tranquility and sophistication, offering residents the own oasis of relaxation within the comfort of home.

Boasting a range of world-class facilities and amenities, the development caters its residents and guests every need within the complex. Moreover, the rooftop pool offers a breathtaking retreat above bustling city, while the fitness studio provides a cutting-edge space for health and wellness enthusiasts to embark on their journey of fitness. The rooftop cinema offers a one-of-a-kind cinematic experience under the stars, while the dedicated kids play area ignites imagination and fosters friendships among the youngest residents.

title: Palmiera 2 at The Oasis
description:
Palmiera Villas Phase 2 at The Oasis is another latest residential development by Emaar Properties with limited 4-bedroom villas, epitomizing luxurious living within a serene, resort-like environment. These newly released villas redefine opulence with their classic, contemporary, and chamfer designs. Crafted by renowned architects and designers, each villa promises a seamless blend of elegance and functionality.

Strategically located within The Oasis community in Dubai, near major transportation routes, including D54 and E44, offering easy access to key areas of Dubai and the Al Maktoum International Airport. Residents can indulge in retail therapy at Dubai Marina and Dubai Marina Mall, just a short drive away.With meticulous attention to detail, every aspect exudes luxury, from exterior facades to interior finishes. Further, the community ensures a holistic lifestyle, boasting world-class amenities such as state-of-the-art fitness centers, serene spa facilities, and recreational spaces.

title: Design Quarter at D3
description:
Design Quarter at Dubai Design District (d3) is a new architectural masterpiece by Meraas in Dubai offering limited edition 1 to 3 bedroom apartments at service. Be the first to find your home in the cultural epicentre standing proud and developed for those with a creative spirit. Live in this truly wonderful and epic life that is loaded with top-notch convenience and superior facilities as one of a kind to offer residents exceptional life.

A tailored fit life designed to meet the perfect need of the residents. With exclusive amenities and services, you will get to enjoy the picturesque environment. In the comfort of your home, you will be offered with premium views and an iconic outlook of the lush green outside. Everything here has been curated to be perfect with the surrounding cityscape, and short steps away from the tranquil nature.

In this exclusive way of life, hundreds of activities and fun elements within nature are available to steal your mind. Experience the finest of space with more lighting and a natural environment. A relaxing lifestyle where your time will flow with the lifestyle, just because of immense indulgence to several services, amenities, and creative life.

This new creative development offers timeless design and a prime location with access to uninterrupted city views. Come out and enjoy in the golden gardens, tennis court, jogging and play areas, BBQ areas making the most beautiful nights. You can book your home with hassle-free options via interesting and simple payment plans available to choose. So why wait, just choose and reserve your dream home amidst this natural escape.

title: The Palm Crown
description:
Experience the pinnacle of coastal luxury at The Palm Crown by Nakheel, an esteemed development nestled on the prestigious Palm Jumeirah with villas and plots. With its meticulously crafted residences, the luxury class development epitomizes a harmonious blend of opulence and modernity. Offering an unparalleled lifestyle, this exclusive community promises a sanctuary where serenity meets sophistication.

Strategically positioned at Plam Jumeirah, it provides unrivaled convenience with easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road and Dubai International Airport. The Palm Jumeirah's monorail system seamlessly connects residents to major attractions, ensuring effortless exploration of the city's vibrant offerings.

With meticulous attention to detail, the development features 38 exquisite residential villas, each exuding opulence and elegance. Positioned strategically, these villas offer breathtaking views of the iconic Atlantis and are complemented by lush landscaping that enhances the overall ambiance. The development also includes 18 Crown Views plots, presenting an opportunity for discerning buyers to create their own Atlantis-facing paradise. Additionally, 20 Crown Garden Villas, nestled amidst verdant greenery, provide a serene retreat for residents seeking tranquility amidst the bustling cityscape.

Residents are greeted with a wealth of amenities designed to elevate their living experience. From state-of-the-art gym facilities to a serene swimming pool and vibrant retail outlets, every aspect of daily life is catered to within this illustrious development. Whether unwinding at the clubhouse or socializing in the open spaces, residents will find ample opportunities for relaxation and engagement.

title: Ellington Ocean House
description:
Ellington Ocean House at Palm Jumeirah is the newest residential development by Ellington Properties that presents 2 to 6 bedroom apartments and penthouses in Dubai. In the incredible world of Palm Jumeirah, the most beautiful and amazing examples of luxury living have been commended to the design and creation of the world's most renowned architects.

Have the opportunity to experience a complete lifestyle while residing in one of the premium and luxurious places that is home to facilities and services of the highest possible caliber. With the finest of the availability that provides consumers a new way of life loaded with the pleasures to enjoy with the best of services and facilities is available at your service.

You can take advantage of the finest resort-style amenities and facilities, which collectively provide a broad range of options for your entertainment, happiness, relaxation, fun, and other activities. Take advantage of every opportunity to enjoy well with your loved ones so that you can truly revel the success and happiness.

Plunge into the unrivaled luxury, which extends from the facilities and amenities to the elegant designs, the forward-thinking ideas for a lifestyle, the luxurious facilities, the security and safety, etc. This is a slice of heaven for those who prefer to be a part of the finest that the development has to offer. Get your units booked at this development by availing the attractive payment plan options.

title: Sobha Green Vistas
description: Green Vistas at Sobha Hartland 2 is the latest residential epitome by Sobha Group that offers an exclusive waterfront living experience in the heart of Dubai, redefining luxury and sophistication. Nestled alongside the Dubai Al Ain Road, this prestigious development boasts stunning views of the community and city skyline, providing residents with a picturesque backdrop to everyday life. Thoughtfully designed residences offer spacious living areas and private balconies, providing residents with ample space to relax and unwind amidst breathtaking views of their surroundings.

title: Samana IVY Gardens 2
description:
Nestled within the prestigious Dubai Land Residence Complex (DLRC), Samana IVY Gardens 2 emerges as a testament to luxury living by Samana Developers with premium apartments. Inspired by nature's tranquility, this residential masterpiece extends over 14 storeys, including a podium level, inviting residents to immerse themselves in an extraordinary lifestyle. Building upon the success of IVY Gardens 1, this new launch promises an unparalleled living experience.

Strategically located in DLRC, the development ensures easy access to Dubai's major business centers and commercial hubs, making it an ideal choice for professionals and families alike. The community offers a perfect balance of urban convenience and serene surroundings, enhancing the quality of life for its residents.

Residents are greeted with a harmonious blend of modernity and natural beauty. The meticulously designed apartments boast bedrooms with access to a private swimming pool, offering an oasis of relaxation amidst the bustling city. The development prioritizes elegance and purity, providing residents with an unparalleled living environment.

Experience a lifestyle enriched with exclusive services and amenities, including valet parking, concierge services, leisure pool deck, outdoor cinema, kids play area, outdoor and indoor gyms, barbeque area, and steam and sauna facilities. The façade sets a new standard for luxury living in Dubai, where every detail is crafted to perfection.

title: Weybridge Gardens 2
description:
Weybridge Gardens 2 Provence Edition, crafted by LEOS Developments, presents an exquisite fusion of French-inspired living with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments in the heart of Dubailand. This modern residential façade, comprising 288 meticulously designed apartments, promises residents an unparalleled lifestyle immersed in luxury and sophistication.

Conveniently located just off Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, it offers excellent connectivity and easy access to all areas of Dubai. With its vibrant urban oasis setting and proximity to a plethora of facilities, this residential gem sets a new benchmark for European quality standards, beautiful aesthetics, and superb amenities in Dubailand.

Designed with meticulous attention to detail, each property boasts high-quality finishes and superior craftsmanship, reflecting British and European standards of excellence. Residents will indulge in a wealth of world-class indoor and outdoor amenities, including an infinity pool, landscaped gardens, a fully-equipped gymnasium, and an outdoor cinema.

title: The Coral Collection
description:
The Coral Collection by Nakheel presents an unparalleled opportunity for luxurious living with exclusive selection of 7-bedroom villas and plots on the prestigious Palm Jebel Ali Island, Dubai. Nestled within this iconic destination, the newly launched façade offers exquisite villas designed for utmost comfort and elegance. Each villa boasts access to a private beach, allowing residents to indulge in the serene beauty of the Arabian Gulf and breathtaking Dubai sunsets. With eight distinct villa types, ranging from Villa Hibiscus to Villa Ruby Sunset, residents can choose a home that reflects their unique style and preferences.

Spanning three storey, these villas feature spacious living areas adorned with natural elements like wood, marble, and stone, creating an ambiance of tranquility and sophistication. Ground floor amenities include a double-height living room, open kitchen, guest bedroom, media room, and staff quarters, while upper levels offer generously sized bedrooms, a library, and optional lounges or gyms. Each residence is equipped with a lift for convenience, and select villas include a separate guard house.

Residents of the development will relish in exclusive amenities such as a private infinity pool, garden, BBQ area, and outdoor dining space, all overlooking the stunning Dubai skyline. With meticulous attention to detail and a prime location on Palm Jebel Ali, it redefines luxury living in Dubai.

title: Majan Tower
description:
Tiger Properties is set to elevate the residential landscape of Dubai with the launch of Majan Tower, located in the dynamic district of Majan. This new residential development promises to blend contemporary design with state-of-the-art amenities, offering residents a sophisticated urban living experience.

Majan Tower Dubai is designed to cater to the needs of a diverse range of residents, offering various apartment sizes and layouts. Each unit is crafted with precision, incorporating modern aesthetics and functionality to maximize living space and comfort. The tower is equipped with high-quality finishes and technological integrations, ensuring a luxurious living environment.

Majan Tower by Tiger Properties is not just a residential development; it’s a lifestyle statement. With its advanced architectural design, strategic location in Majan, and a host of luxurious amenities, it promises to be a cornerstone of urban living in Dubai. Whether as a home or an investment, Majan Tower offers a compelling choice for those seeking to experience the best of contemporary living in a flourishing community.

title: Manta Bay
description:
Manta Bay at Al Marjan Island is a premium-class residential development by Major Developers, standing as a testament to refined coastal living with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Developed with unique ideas and refined lifestyle, the façade presents the highest rooftop beach to be built on Ras Al Khaimah’s Al Marjan Island. This exclusive enclave offers a harmonious blend of tranquility, luxury, and innovation, setting a new benchmark for waterfront living in the UAE.

Situated in Ras Al Khaimah, a favored destination for sheikhs and tourists alike, the development enjoys a prime location surrounded by the best hotels and upcoming attractions, including the largest casino in the world. The proximity to the serene beachfront and urban conveniences makes Al Marjan Island an idyllic setting for luxury living, with the forthcoming Wynn Al Marjan Island project poised to further enhance the area's allure and real estate market.

Inspired by the graceful movement of the majestic Stingray, the building’s profile embodies elegance and fluidity. Its distinctive shape harmonizes with the surrounding landscape, creating a seamless integration of modern comforts with natural elements. Each apartment boasts spacious interiors, open-floor plan design and large windows, inviting ample natural light and stunning views of the azure waters.

One of the most distinctive features, its crowing jewel – the world’s highest rooftop beach. With its own sand and seawater, this unparallel amenity offers residents a unique opportunity to bask in the sun and soak in the stunning panoramic views of the Island and beyond.

Residents are treated to a plethora of amenities designed to cater to their every need. From leisure and lap pools to indoor and outdoor fitness areas, every aspect of wellness and recreation is meticulously curated. The addition of a sports arena, spa, and jacuzzi elevates the living experience, ensuring moments of relaxation and rejuvenation are always within reach.

title: Enqlave
description: Discover a new pinnacle of luxury living with Aqasa Enqlave at Al Furjan, an exclusive residential project by Aqasa Developers with premium studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. This newly launched façade epitomizes sophistication, innovation, and opulence, standing as a masterpiece of modern architecture, meticulously crafted to elevate the urban living experience. With its sleek lines, contemporary façade, and timeless design elements, every aspect of this 12-storey residential building exudes elegance and refinement. From the grand entrance to the finest fixtures, attention to detail is evident throughout, creating a visual symphony of luxury and style.

title: W1NNER Tower
description:
W1nner Tower at Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) embodies the pinnacle of modern living in Dubai, Developed by Object 1 Development with 1, 1.5 & 2-bedroom apartments. Standing as a 26-storey architectural marvel, the architectural seamlessly blends aesthetics with functionality to create an unparalleled residential experience.

Upon entering the tower, residents are greeted by a spacious and bright lobby exuding an air of sophistication and warmth. The lobby, adorned with cozy lounge areas, sets the tone for the luxurious living that awaits within. With 24/7 concierge service, residents can rest assured that their needs will be met with utmost care and efficiency.

Each apartment is meticulously crafted to offer the perfect blend of style and functionality. Modern interiors, premium finishes, and ample natural light create a serene and inviting ambiance, while spacious layouts ensure comfort and convenience. Whether it's a cozy 1-bedroom retreat or a spacious 2-bedroom sanctuary, every residence is thoughtfully designed to elevate the living experience.

The amenities are second to none, offering residents a plethora of options for leisure and recreation. Outdoor facilities include an adult swimming pool with aqua fitness equipment, BBQ area, lush green landscaped gardens, and a serene sitting area. For fitness enthusiasts, a well-equipped gym and yoga facilities provide the perfect setting to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Meanwhile, indoor amenities such as a cinema & game room, kids’ room, and vibrant clubhouse offer endless opportunities for entertainment and socializing.

Beyond the confines of the tower, JVT presents a vibrant community filled with parks, schools, and mosques. Its strategic location ensures easy access to major roads and neighboring areas, making it a convenient choice for professionals and families alike. With shopping centers, healthcare facilities, and recreational attractions just minutes away, residents can enjoy a well-rounded living experience without ever venturing far from home.

title: Emerald Vision Tower
description:
Emerald Vision Tower at JVT stands tall as a beacon of elegance and sophistication by Vision Avenue Homes with premium studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments in Dubai. This luxurious residential masterpiece redefines city living with its unparalleled blend of comfort, convenience, and opulence. From its prime location to its meticulously crafted interiors, it sets a new standard for contemporary urban living.

Nestled in the heart of Jumeirah Village Triangle, it offers residents the perfect balance between tranquility and connectivity. Surrounded by lush greenery and neighborhood parks, the tower provides a serene retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. Yet, with direct access to Mohammad bin Zayed Road, residents enjoy seamless connectivity to key destinations across Dubai, including major business districts, educational institutions, and leisure attractions.
Step into the development, and you're greeted by an ambiance of grandeur and sophistication. From the moment you enter the grand entrance lobby, every detail exudes luxury and refinement. High ceilings, premium fixtures, and expansive windows create a sense of space and openness, while meticulous craftsmanship is evident in every corner. Whether you're relaxing in your spacious living room, preparing a meal in your gourmet kitchen, or unwinding in your luxurious bathroom, every aspect is designed to cater to your discerning tastes and elevate your living experience.

Residents have access to an array of world-class amenities, including a swimming pool, wellness sauna & steam, gym, outdoor BBQ area, and kids' play area. The tower's shared spaces, such as the lift lobby and prayer area, foster a sense of community and connection among residents, turning neighbors into friends.

As you gaze out from your floor-to-ceiling windows, taking in the breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline, you feel a sense of awe and wonder. Each residence is meticulously designed to maximize space and offer uninterrupted vistas of Dubai's iconic landmarks. Whether you're enjoying a morning coffee or watching the sunset, the city's charm is right at your doorstep, inviting you to explore and experience its vibrant energy.

title: Lum1nar Tower 1
description:
Lum1nar Tower 1 at JVT is an exquisite residential development by Object 1 Development, offering premium choice of 1 & 1.5-bedroom apartments. Designed to epitomize luxury living, the 20-storey tower seamlessly blends timeless elegance with modern sophistication, offering residents a lifestyle beyond compares. This exclusive development redefines contemporary living, offering residents a harmonious blend of timeless elegance and cutting-edge design.

As you enter the enchanting realm, you'll be greeted by a captivating ambiance that permeates every corner of the space. Matte glass panels softly lit from within create a shimmering embrace, while the warmth of wood accents juxtaposed with bold, sophisticated elements exude a sense of refined opulence. Comprising 196 meticulously designed units, it offers a range of living options to suit diverse preferences. Choose from bedroom apartments, each thoughtfully crafted to maximize comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal.

Beyond its stunning architectural design, the development boasts an array of amenities curated to enhance every aspect of residents' lives. Step into the lobby, where 24/7 concierge service awaits, providing a warm welcome to residents and their guests. Ignite your child's imagination in the vibrant kids' playroom, where laughter echoes and friendships blossom amidst a world of interactive games and whimsical adventures.

For those seeking relaxation and recreation, it offers an outdoor swimming pool with poolside sun loungers, inviting residents to dive into luxury and soak up the sun-kissed serenity. Meanwhile, the dedicated kids' swimming pool ensures endless fun and safety for little ones, while the outdoor kids' play area encourages imaginative play and exploration.

Fitness enthusiasts can elevate their workout routine in the state-of-the-art gym, complete with panoramic city views that inspire progress and focus. After a rewarding workout, find tranquility amidst nature's embrace in the outdoor yoga lounge, where serenity and rejuvenation intertwine beneath the open sky.

title: Mangrove at Creek Beach
description:
Mangrove at Creek Beach by Emaar Properties introduces an unparalleled waterfront living experience in the heart of Dubai Creek Harbour with 1, 2 & 3-bedroom waterfront apartments, poised to become the epitome of luxury and sophistication. Nestled along the pristine shores of Creek Beach, this luxury class project offers a harmonious blend of natural beauty and urban convenience, promising residents a lifestyle of unparalleled comfort and tranquility.

With its premium locality at the Creek Beach within Dubai Creek Harbour, it is perfectly situated next to the beach areas offering serene waterfront living amidst the bustling cityscape of Dubai. Residents can enjoy the tranquillity of the creek waters while being conveniently close to primary business, shopping, and entertainment destinations. Whether indulging in leisurely strolls along the 700-meter beach or immersing in the vibrant energy of nearby attractions, it strikes the perfect balance between work and play, providing residents with an unmatched sense of refined sophistication.

The architectural marvel boasts high-quality construction and cutting-edge design, featuring elegant and spacious interiors adorned with superb finishes. Each residence showcases a unique exterior, complemented by light-filled living spaces, bedroom areas, and balconies that offer panoramic views of the Creek. With an emphasis on tailored living, residents can bask in the beauty of a communal inner plaza or unwind in the private pool, all while enjoying the convenience of nearby shops, restaurants, and fitness facilities.

With stunning views of Dubai Creek Marina and the iconic Dubai Creek Tower, this exclusive development redefines waterfront living with its breathtaking vistas and serene ambience. The development's meticulously designed encompassing lush green courtyards, manicured gardens, and pedestrian-friendly walkways, creating an oasis of calm amidst the vibrant cityscape.

The exclusive-class waterfront development redefines luxury living with its unparalleled amenities, designed to cater to every aspect of the resident’s lifestyle. From rejuvenating in the community pool to hosting gatherings in the barbecue area, there’s something for everyone to enjoy. With expansive outdoor play areas, communal rooms, and a fully-equipped gym, it encourages an active and social lifestyle within a vibrant community setting.

title: Athlon
description:
Discover a revolutionary concept in urban living at Athlon by Aldar Properties, Dubai's premier active wellness community lined with premium 3 to 6 bed villas and 3 & 4 bed townhouses. Embracing the ethos of active living, the newly addressed development redefines the modern lifestyle, seamlessly integrating movement into daily routines. Designed in collaboration with wellbeing experts, this innovative community offers an unparalleled environment, where residents can thrive and live actively. Nestled in a vibrant neighbourhood and complemented by premium services, it promises a unique way of life in the heart of Dubai.

This premium class development redefines the way of community living, where the elegant lifestyle keeps you always active and engaged. Inspired by the ethos of wellness and movement, it seamlessly integrates walking and cycling loops, sprawling parks, and state-of-the-art sports facilities to encourage residents to embrace an active lifestyle. From jogging and cycling tracks to basketball courts and yoga zones, every corner is thoughtfully designed to inspire movement and vitality.

With a range of meticulously crafted townhouses and villas, residents can immerse themselves in a world of comfort and sophistication. Each residence is meticulously designed to blend seamlessly with the community's active ethos, offering effortless access to a plethora of amenities and recreational facilities. From energy-efficient design features to native landscaping and smart waste management systems, here every aspect is carefully curated to minimize its ecological footprint and maximize its positive impact on the planet.

What sets this premier development apart is its unwavering commitment to fostering a sense of community and camaraderie. Boasting seven clubhouses and an array of socializing zones, it provides residents with ample opportunities to connect with neighbors and forge lifelong friendships. Whether it's joining a fitness class, attending a wellness webinar, or simply enjoying a leisurely stroll through the scenic surroundings, it offers something for everyone.

As a LEED Platinum pre-certified and Fitwel certified community, it sets a new standard for sustainable urban living. With its innovative approach to community living and unwavering commitment to wellness and sustainability, it is poised to become a beacon of inspiration for generations to come.

title: Anantara Sharjah Residences
description:
Discover the epitome of seaside luxury living at Anantara Sharjah Residences by Arada Developer with premium 1 to 4-bedroom apartments and penthouses in Sharjah. This is an exquisite collaboration between the renowned Arada Developer and Anantara Resort Style Brand, nestled within the grounds of the Anantara Sharjah Resort, this exclusive collection of fully furnished residences offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf from every corner. Whether you're seeking a serene retreat or a vibrant beachfront lifestyle, these apartments and penthouses are designed to exceed expectations.

The development presents a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in a world of opulence and convenience. From smart home features to 24-hour security and concierge services, every detail is crafted to enhance your living experience. Residents also enjoy private beach and pool access, along with the privilege of indulging in premium wellness facilities and dining at the signature restaurant.

Located just minutes’ drive from Dubai International Airport, Sharjah stands as an up-and-coming holiday destination blending contemporary architecture with rich cultural heritage. In addition to the resort's amenities such as the beachfront infinity pool and overwater restaurant, residents can explore the vibrant city of Sharjah. From the living heritage district of Heart of Sharjah to the bustling souqs and mosques, there's a wealth of experiences waiting to be discovered. The façade truly offers the perfect balance of tranquility and adventure for both leisure and business travelers, with close proximity to the Expo Centre.

title: Hatimi Residences
description:
Discover the epitome of luxury living at Hatimi Residences by Fakhruddin Properties, nestled in the premium Dubai Islands, offering a selection of 1 and 3 bedroom apartments, as well as 3 & 4 bedroom duplexes and 4 bedroom penthouses. Designed by Treppan Living, these exclusive branded residences boast state-of-the-art amenities and breathtaking sea views, redefining the essence of seaside living in Dubai. With a focus on sustainability and wellness, the exclusive residences incorporate cutting-edge technologies and green initiatives to create a vibrant community of extraordinary living experiences.

As you step into the residences, you are greeted by unparalleled views that stretch as far as the eye can see. The azure waters of the Gulf, the golden sun, and the white sands create a picturesque backdrop, inviting residents to immerse themselves in the beauty of their surroundings. Whether indoors or outdoors, the magnificent views of the sea serve as a constant reminder of the unparalleled lifestyle that awaits within.

Here, sustainability is not just a concept; it's a way of life. The incorporation of cutting-edge green technologies ensures that residents can enjoy a luxurious lifestyle while minimizing their environmental footprint. From AI-enabled smart living to centralized hydrogen-enriched drinking water systems, every aspect of the community is designed with sustainability in mind, offering residents the opportunity to live in harmony with nature.

Moreover, the façades offer more than just a place to live; they provide a sense of community and belonging. With a diverse range of residents from around the world, the community is vibrant and dynamic. Whether attending curated dining events, participating in wellness initiatives, or simply enjoying the company of neighbours, residents have ample opportunities to connect and forge lifelong friendships.

Beyond its breathtaking views, the development boasts a range of amenities designed to elevate every aspect of residents' lives. From state-of-the-art health clubs and a floatation spa to a greenhouse cafe and sunken cabanas, every detail has been carefully curated to ensure a lifestyle of luxury and relaxation. Residents can indulge in organic treats, unwind in tranquil settings, and embrace holistic wellness, all within the confines of their exclusive community.

title: Jade Tower
description:
Discover the epitome of luxury living at Jade Tower by Tiger Properties, an architectural masterpiece nestled in Majan, Dubailand with premium studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Offering a harmonious blend of sophistication and contemporary design, the tower redefines opulent living with its meticulously crafted residences. Boasting 28 residential floors and a total of 434 fully furnished units, the luxurious façade presents an unparalleled residential experience.

As you step into the tower, you're greeted by a sense of grandeur and opulence. The lobby, adorned with exquisite finishes and elegant furnishings, sets the tone for the exceptional living experience that awaits within. Floor-to-ceiling windows allow natural light to flood the space, creating a welcoming ambiance that invites residents to unwind and relax in style.

Venture further into the façade, and you'll discover a selection of fully furnished apartments designed to exceed expectations. Whether you're seeking a cozy studio for a young professional or a spacious two-bedroom unit for a growing family, it offers a home for every lifestyle. Each residence is thoughtfully laid out to maximize space and functionality, with sleek kitchens, modern bathrooms, and panoramic views of the surrounding Majan landscape.

But the tower is more than just a place to live, designed to foster a sense of community lifestyle. Residents have access to a wealth of world-class amenities designed to enhance their lifestyle and foster a sense of belonging. Whether lounging by the outdoor swimming pool, staying active at the state-of-the-art gym, or enjoying quality time with family and friends in the community spaces, there's something for everyone.

Outside the confines of development, Majan beckons with its thriving neighborhood filled with essential amenities, educational institutions, shopping centers, and entertainment hubs. With convenient access to key destinations across Dubai and well-connected road networks, residents can experience the best of urban living while still enjoying the tranquility of Majan's serene surroundings.

title: Karl Lagerfeld Villas
description:
The Karl Lagerfeld Villas by Taraf Holding represent a fusion of haute couture and luxury real estate, offering 5 to 7-bedroom villas located in MBR City, Dubai. Developed through a partnership between Taraf Holding and the iconic fashion house Karl Lagerfeld, this limited collection of 51 exquisite villas epitomizes sophistication, elegance, and innovation.

Located within the prestigious Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum City District, the villas command panoramic views of the Crystal Lagoon and Downtown Dubai skyline, setting the stage for a lifestyle of unparalleled luxury. The Meydan community, renowned for its exclusivity and convenience, provides residents with easy access to key destinations such as Nad Al Sheba, Meydan Racecourse, Downtown Dubai, and DXB International Airport.

Designed with the ethos of Karl Lagerfeld's fashion collections, the architectural form of the villas incorporates minimalistic and sleek lines, a monochromatic color palette, and textured materials, echoing the timeless aesthetic. Each villa features a central catwalk entrance, spiraling staircase, sunken lounge, library lounge, and dedicated Majlis room, creating an atmosphere of refined elegance.

Spanning luxury bedrooms, the spacious interiors are inspired by the brand's versatility and simplicity, offering residents a seamless blend of fashion and design. Whether relaxing in the sunken lounge or entertaining guests in the library lounge, every aspect of the villa is designed to elevate the living experience to new heights.

The development also boasts an array of exclusive amenities, centered around The Karl Lagerfeld Clubhouse, also known as "The Pavilion." Here, residents can enjoy entertainment spaces, a gym, fitness studio, adult and kids' pools, surrounded by meticulously landscaped areas and parks, creating an oasis of tranquility amidst the bustling cityscape.

title: Peace Lagoons
description:
Experience the epitome of luxury living at Peace Lagoons by Peace Homes Group, an exceptional residential development with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments located in the prestigious Dubailand Residence Complex (DLRC). Boasting an innovative design across 17-storey with unparalleled amenities, the façade redefines modern living in Dubai. Nestled amidst lush greenery and shimmering lagoons, this residential haven offers a serene oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

Conveniently located near Dubai-Al Ain Road, it offers seamless connectivity to key destinations within Dubai, including Dubai Outlet Mall, Dubai Silicon Oasis, and IMG World of Adventure. Whether it's exploring the serene landscapes of Dubai Miracle Garden or indulging in equestrian pursuits at the nearby Polo Club, residents find themselves at the epicenter of excitement and relaxation. Discover the height of luxury living, where every detail is designed to exceed expectations.

Residents have access to an array of world-class amenities, including a gym with a Crossfit track, a full spa with sauna and steam room, and recreational facilities such as mini-golf, bowling, and a cinema. Whether unwinding in the infinity pool, enjoying a barbecue in the designated area, or exploring the lush gardens and parks, every moment is imbued with luxury and relaxation.

title: SHA Residences Emirates
description:
Escape to a world of beachfront luxury developed by IMKAN Properties, presenting SHA Residences Emirates at Aljurf, where impeccable design limited apartments and villas meets natural beauty to create an unparalleled living experience. Nestled within the prestigious AlJurf community, midway between Abu Dhabi and Dubai, it offers the perfect blend of convenience and serenity.

The meticulously crafted development includes 97 villas and 62 luxury apartments, each thoughtfully designed to exceed the expectations of discerning homeowners. Whether you choose a spacious villa or a contemporary apartment, you'll enjoy access to an array of world-class amenities and facilities.

From private beaches and a marina to a turtle sanctuary and 4.3 km swimming canal, it offers endless opportunities for relaxation and recreation. The community center serves as a social hub, while the kids' play areas and gymnasium cater to residents of all ages.

With flexible payment plans and expert guidance, owning your dream home has never been easier. Experience the pinnacle of luxury living in the heart of AlJurf, where every detail is crafted to enhance your lifestyle and well-being.

title: Damac Lagoon Views 2
description: Damac Lagoon Views 2 at Damac Lagoons presents the second series of residential epitome developed by Damac Properties lined with premium apartments. Following the immense success of its predecessor, this architectural masterpiece offers a perfect blend of contemporary elegance and the charm of the Mediterranean lifestyle. Nestled within the heart of Dubai's vibrant community, the façade boasts breathtaking views, promising residents a unique living experience.

title: Address Residences Phase 2
description:
Emaar Properties proudly unveils Address Residences Phase 2 at Al Marjan Island, an epitome of luxury living in Ras Al Khaimah offering 1 & 2-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. This prestigious development redefines coastal living, managed by Address Hotels + Resorts, renowned for their premium hospitality, residents can expect a lifestyle of unparalleled comfort and convenience. Set against the backdrop of the Arabian Sea, residents are greeted with panoramic views and a serene ambiance that seamlessly blends with the natural surroundings.

Embrace each day with breathtaking sea views and serene landscapes, surrounded by wide beaches and vibrant green spaces. Whether you prefer to bask in the sun or relax by the infinity pools that seamlessly merge with the clear blue waters, every aspect is designed to offer an extraordinary living experience. With top-tier amenities crafted for comfort and enjoyment, residents can indulge in gourmet dining, stay active at the state-of-the-art gym, or unwind at the tranquil spa, all within the comforts of their exclusive community.

As part of the renowned Address Hotels + Resorts portfolio, the facades bring with it the prestige and hallmark of superior service. Residents can expect nothing but the best, from the chic one-bedroom apartments to the opulent townhouses, each offering spacious layouts and panoramic views. The strategic location on View Island, the centerpiece of Al Marjan Island, ensures residents have easy access to urban amenities while enjoying the tranquility of island living.

With a variety of residential unit types, it caters to different preferences and family sizes. Whether you're a single professional, a couple seeking upscale living, or a family in need of extra space, there's a perfect home awaiting you. Floor-to-ceiling windows invite abundant natural light and offer breathtaking views of the sea and island vistas, creating a serene and inviting ambiance. Plus, with over 600 meters of beachfront, residents can enjoy sweeping views of the sea and the island, creating an idyllic setting for everyday living.

The lifestyle at Marjan Island revolves around the concept of coastal sophistication, where residents can immerse themselves in the serene beauty of the Arabian Sea while enjoying the finest in modern comforts. Whether it's lounging by the residential infinity pool, taking leisurely strolls along the expansive beachfront promenade, or engaging in water sports and volleyball activity

title: Baccarat Hotel & Residences Tower 2
description:
Situated in the heart of Downtown Dubai, Baccarat Hotel & Residences Tower 2 by Shamal Holding epitomizes luxury living with its exclusive collection of 2, 3, and 4-bedroom hotel apartments. This twin high-rise angular glass facade offers unobstructed views of iconic landmarks like the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Frame, providing residents with a lifestyle of unparalleled sophistication and convenience.

Strategically located near key landmarks such as the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary and The Dubai Fountain, it offers easy access to transportation routes and entertainment destinations. Whether it's shopping at famous malls, dining at gourmet restaurants, or experiencing the vibrant nightlife, residents are never far from excitement and adventure.

With access to hotel facilities and a wide range of à la carte services, residents can indulge in a world-class living experience. The development boasts exclusive amenities including a gymnasium, swimming pool, BBQ areas, and lush green spaces, fostering a sense of well-being and relaxation. Residents also have access to high-end dining outlets and leisure spaces, ensuring every moment is filled with luxury and comfort.

title: ELA Residences Dorchester Collection
description:
ELA Residences is a lavish complex by the award-winning boutique developer; OMNIYAT. The project comprises of a branded hotel and just 63 exclusive residences with breathtaking views of the sea, Burj Al Arab and Burj Khalifa. It is nestled on one of Palm Jumeirah’s last most exclusive plots on the Eastern Crescent.
ELA Residences comes as the UAE’s highest-graded beach resort property and the world’s first Dorchester Collection’s 5-star beach resort. The Dorchester Collection boasts a collection of the world's premier luxury hotels situated in Europe and the USA.
The development is designed by a team of world-famous experts from Zaha Hadid Architects and Vladimir Djurovic Landscape Architecture. To personalize the living spaces, you are provided with 3 options of interior designers: Elysian Design, YODEZEEN or Studio Carter.
ELA Residences is home to limited-edition 3-4 bedroom simplexes and duplexes and 3 super penthouses. The property sizes range from 5,200 sq. ft to 42,900 sq. ft. All apartments are complemented with private swimming pools, elevated sun lounging platforms, large outdoor terraces, and Juliette balconies. Select units feature outdoor jacuzzis and dual balconies.

title: Golf Place Terraces
description: Discover the epitome of luxury living with Golf Place Terraces at Dubai Hills Estate, the premium collection by Emaar Properties offering 4, 5, and 6-bedroom villas in Dubai. This modern oasis offers premier enclave designed with clean lines, expansive windows, and striking bold features, creating a contemporary architectural masterpiece. The overwhelming success of Phase I led to the creation of Terraces exclusivity, offering residents breathtaking views of the lush fairways and the majestic golf course.

title: Greenway
description:
Greenway at Emaar South is the latest residential façade crafted by Emaar Properties, introducing a new standard of luxury townhouses within an exclusive golf estate. Nestled amidst the verdant landscape of Emaar South, this development promises a lifestyle of tranquility and sophistication. Residents awaken to breathtaking views of the immaculate golf course, embraced by floor-to-ceiling windows seamlessly merging indoor opulence with the serenity of nature.

Beyond a mere residence, the development is a sanctuary where one can unwind and revel in the beauty of their surroundings. With its prime location near major business districts, educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and premier shopping destinations, residents enjoy both convenience and luxury. Seamless connectivity to highways and public transport further enhances the allure of this prestigious address.

title: The Central Downtown
description:
The Central Downtown by Aqua Properties stands as an epitome of luxurious living in the heart of Arjan, Dubai featuring luxury edition studios to 3-bedroom apartments. Comprising four distinctive towers as A, B, C, and D – this multi-building complex sprawls across a central plot of nearly 07 acres, offering unparalleled visibility and accessibility within the Arjan community.

With a strategic location at the crossroads of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Umm Suqeim Street, it provides residents with easy connectivity to major highways and proximity to key areas like Dubai Motor City, Dubai Sports City, and Jumeirah Village Circle. Luxury shopping and essential services are within arm's reach, thanks to nearby outlets such as Spinneys, Ace Hardware, and reputable healthcare facilities like Park View Mediclinic.

The thoughtful design ensures privacy for residents while offering convenient access to shopping and entertainment. The presence of the shopping mall is complemented by distinct access points for the mall and residential areas. This strategic layout allows residents to enjoy the amenities without compromising their privacy.

Spread across a generous 300,000 sq. ft. of land, the development boasts an extensive 200,000 sq. ft. of seamlessly integrated amenities. From state-of-the-art fitness centers to rooftop gardens with breathtaking city views, life in this community is truly elevated. Residents have access to recreation and entertainment spaces, including a basketball court, BBQ area, mini-golf, outdoor cinema, and more.

Wellness and fitness are prioritized with amenities like a health club, Jacuzzi, yoga room, open-air gymnasiums, and jogging tracks. Nature enthusiasts will find solace in the Organic Farm, Rainforest Retreat, Zen Garden, Dog Park, and Golf Simulator.

title: Binghatti Hills
description:
Discover the new residential epitome Binghatti Hills at Dubai Science Park, a luxurious residential development by Binghatti Developers with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Inspired by the natural contours of rolling hillsides, the façade aims to capture a serene ambiance and translate it into a stunning architectural design. Boasting one of the largest buildings in the world, this development stands out with its unique blend of smart home features, state-of-the-art interiors, and a diverse view of Dubai's iconic skyline.

Strategically situated in Al Barsha South 2, it offers easy access to Al Khail Road, Um Suqeim Road, Miracle Garden, and the renowned Mall of the Emirates. This prime location ensures a seamless commute to various parts of Dubai, making it an ideal choice for both residents and investors seeking innovation combined with opulence.

Experience high-rise living at its finest, with towers soaring up to 40 floors, providing residents with unparalleled views and a sense of grandeur. Each meticulously designed apartment is furnished with top-notch fittings, fixtures, and branded home appliances, guaranteeing ultimate comfort and convenience.

The development's first floors house amenity areas, including a private pool with a jacuzzi, a mini amphitheater, a meditation/zen garden, an infinity pool, and much more. Residents can indulge in various recreational activities such as paddle tennis, street soccer, and basketball on-site. With an indoor gym, outdoor aerobics/yoga area, jogging/walking lane, and a shaded pool bar, it offers a holistic living experience.

title: Olvera
description:
Discover the latest launch of Olvera at Bloom Living, a development by Bloom Holding with premium 2 and 3-bedroom townhouses in Abu Dhabi. Offering an exclusive selection of refined modern residential living with its impeccable design and unparalleled amenities. Situated along the iconic Zayed Road, residents enjoy effortless access to the city's most coveted destinations, including schools, hospitals, malls, and leisure attractions.

Every detail is meticulously curated to provide residents with a lifestyle of utmost comfort and convenience. The façade emphasizes lush greenery, tranquil parks, and interconnected pathways, fostering a sense of community and serenity. Residents can indulge in world-class leisure facilities, including a fully-equipped gymnasium, swimming pool, play area, and community clubhouse, all thoughtfully integrated into the fabric of the community.

With flexible payment plans tailored to suit individual needs, owning a home has never been more attainable. The dedicated team is committed to assisting clients every step of the way, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free purchasing experience. Whether you're seeking a vibrant social hub or a peaceful retreat, it offers the perfect balance of luxury, comfort, and convenience for discerning homeowners.

title: Address Residences
description:
Address Residences at Al Marjan Island is the new pinnacle of luxury and coastal living by Emaar Properties offering an unparalleled blend of luxury-class 1, 2, 3 bedroom apartments, 4 bedroom penthouses and 2 & 3 bedroom townhouses. This exclusive development is part of a sprawling 02-million-square-foot mixed-use project that redefines opulence with its limited 161 meticulously crafted luxury residences. The first phase of this façade introduces a premium lifestyle, promising an unrivalled residential experience.

The development boasts panoramic views of the Arabian Sea at Al Marjan Island, creating a serene ambience that resonates with the natural beauty of the surroundings. As part of the island within the four-island mega-development, residents will find themselves in proximity to the urban core of the master-planned community and the town centre.

The leisure collection of apartments is a masterpiece, showcasing the commitment to excellence in design and construction. The interiors seamlessly blend sophistication and comfort, featuring high-end finishes and state-of-the-art amenities. With direct access to over 600 meters of pristine beachfront, residents enjoy not just a home but an immersive coastal lifestyle.

The resort-style development draws inspiration from its exceptional natural location, creating an oasis by the Arabian Sea. The façade is more than just a residential complex; it's a sanctuary where luxury meets nature. The thoughtful integration of lifestyle amenities ensures that residents experience the epitome of comfort and convenience.

Residents will revel in the seamless harmony between the development and the idyllic landscape. The Hospitality Group's premium lifestyle brand, Address Hotels + Resorts, will manage the residences, setting a new standard for hospitality in Ras Al Khaimah. This venture marks the development's pioneering entry into the emirate, bringing its renowned Address brand to a new audience. It's an embodiment of a refined lifestyle, where every detail is meticulously curated to offer residents an unparalleled living experience.

title: Azizi Venice
description:
Discover the new residential epitome of luxury at Azizi Venice in Dubai South with a choice of studios, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and villas, developed by Azizi Developments. This exceptional waterfront project redefines opulent living with its unique blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance with residential towers from G+10 to G+22 floors, presenting a lifestyle like never before.

The development enjoys a strategic location at Dubai South, nestled right next to the Al Maktoum International Airport, near the Emaar South development. The convenience of proximity to the proposed metro station adds to its allure, making it an ideal choice for those who value connectivity and accessibility.

Spanning 23% water area within the community, this development boasts a stunning 18 km lagoon with a depth of 1.5 meters, complete with artificial waves. What sets it apart is the fact that this lagoon features sweet water and even artificial waves, ensuring that residents can enjoy the joys of the sea right at their doorstep.

The heart is the 700-meter Boulevard, destined to become one of Dubai's premier attractions. It offers an array of retail outlets, ensuring residents have everything they need at their doorstep. Additionally, the community features a 1500-seat multi-purpose cultural center (Opera), two 5-star and one 4-star hotel, two schools, a hospital, and many such.

With 155 km of park space, a tele cabin, and district cooling, it is designed to offer a lifestyle of convenience, comfort, and leisure. This visionary community combines the charm of Venice's waterside living with the modernity and luxury that Dubai is renowned for. With its extensive water features, cultural and recreational amenities, this master community aims to be an attraction point for all, a haven for residents and a symbol of modern luxury living.

title: Riwa at MJL
description:
Riwa at MJL is the latest addition to the esteemed community developed by renowned Meraas with premium 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom penthouses. The prestigious development combines contemporary elegance with the breathtaking views of the Iconic Burj Al Arab. With its prime location between Al Wasl and Jumeirah Beach Road, residents enjoy easy access to the retail, fine dining, entertainment and leisure options. The modern façade boats architectural ethos and provides residents with refined living spaces that redefine luxury. Experience the elevated living surrounded by lush green landscapes and world-class amenities including the beachfront leisure and attractions, all within minutes away reach from home.

The location isn't just a point on the map; it's an invitation to immerse oneself in the vibrant pulse of Dubai's urban landscape. Situated within the esteemed Madinat Jumeirah Living community, it offers more than just a prestigious address; it provides residents with convenient access to the city's key destinations. Whether it's a leisurely drive along Sheikh Zayed Road, a shopping spree at Mall of the Emirates, or a relaxing day at Jumeirah Beach, residents are never far from the action.

But it isn't just about convenience; it's about embracing a lifestyle of luxury and sophistication. From the moment residents’ step into their meticulously designed residences, they are greeted by an atmosphere of elegance and refinement. Every detail, from the sleek lines of the architecture to the premium finishes and state-of-the-art amenities has been carefully curated to exceed the expectations of even the most discerning homeowner.

As residents explore the expansive parkland and lush landscaped gardens that surround the development, they are reminded of the importance of balance and tranquility in today's fast-paced world. Here, amidst the serene beauty of nature, residents can escape the hustle and bustle of city life and find solace in the peaceful surroundings. Whether it's a morning stroll through the gardens or an afternoon spent lounging by the pool, it offers countless opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation.

title: Palmiera
description:
Palmiera Villas at The Oasis by Emaar Properties is a newly launched magnificent residential development that features 4 & 5 bedroom villas at service. The architectural masterpieces and exquisitely designed environment present an exceptional living experience within a private, luxury resort-like setting, surrounded by lush greenery, serene waterways, and world-class amenities.

One of the standout features is its strategic location. Situated near major transportation routes like D54 and E44, residents enjoy easy access to key areas of Dubai. The Al Maktoum International Airport is just minutes’ drive away, making international travel a breeze. For those seeking retail therapy, Dubai Marina and Dubai Marina Mall are just a 28-minutes’ drive away, while the heart of the city, Downtown Dubai, and Dubai Mall are reachable within 35 minutes.

Standing as a true sanctuary of opulence, with panoramic vistas of tranquil water canals, shimmering lakes, and verdant parks creating a serene ambience. With 265 total units, this unique residential development sets new standards for luxury living, offering a resolute focus on a majestic and expansive lifestyle. With aesthetics and practicality blending seamlessly to create a haven of sophistication, the luxurious villas are designed with elegant aesthetics and a focus on luxurious practicality.

Blending harmonious architecture and outstanding design, it is brought to life by the world's most famous architects and designers. From the exterior facades to the interior finishes, every detail exudes luxury and opulence. Each unit is masterfully designed for seamless integration with the natural environment, emphasizing comfort and a deep connection to stunning surroundings.

The Oasis community is not just a story about luxurious living spaces; it's about creating a holistic lifestyle for its residents. The project boasts world-class amenities that enhance residential luxury and convenience, ensuring residents have access to the finest comforts and services. From state-of-the-art fitness centers to serene spa facilities, every aspect of living here is designed to elevate the standard of living.

title: Al Hamra Waterfront
description:
Discover the epitome of luxury living at Al Hamra Marina by Al Hamra, an exclusive waterfront development with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments at Al Hamra Village in Ras Al Khaimah. Boasting a prime location just minutes from Dubai Airport, this residential enclave offers a harmonious blend of modern design, high-end amenities, and breathtaking views of the marina and surrounding landscape.

Spread across 77 million square feet, Al Hamra Village is a master-planned community designed to prioritize safety, security, and sustainability. Residents will enjoy access to 1.5 kilometers of pristine beaches, five resort hotels, and a two-story retail center offering a unique shopping and entertainment experience.

Here at this development, residents will have a wealth of amenities at their fingertips, including a state-of-the-art gym, tennis courts, swimming pools, and a community center for social gatherings and events. The championship golf course, that offers an enjoyable and challenging experience for golfers of all skill levels.

For those seeking relaxation and indulgence, the nearby five-star luxury hotel and spa provide the perfect retreat. Residents can also explore the culinary delights of the numerous dining options available, from casual cafes to fine dining restaurants.

With its premium finishes, spacious floor plans, and convenient location, this new façade offers residents a lifestyle of comfort, convenience, and sophistication in a stunning waterfront setting. Whether you're seeking a primary residence or an investment opportunity, it promises to exceed your expectations and elevate your living experience.

title: Falcon Island
description:
Discover a world of refined luxury and unparalleled elegance with Falcon Island developed by Al Hamra offering premium 2 to 7-bedroom villas and townhouses. Nestled within the prestigious Al Hamra Village in Ras al Khaimah, set against the backdrop of the glistening Arabian Sea and lush greenery of an 18-hole championship golf course, it offers an exclusive island living experience like no other.

Step into a realm of sophistication where every detail has been meticulously crafted to perfection. From the impeccably designed townhouses to the sprawling beachfront villas, each residence embodies the epitome of opulence and style. With options ranging from townhouses to expansive exclusive beach villas, the development caters to the discerning tastes of the most astute homeowners.

Indulge in a lifestyle of leisure and recreation with an array of world-class amenities at your fingertips. From state-of-the-art fitness facilities to championship golf courses, tennis courts, and swimming pools, it offers endless opportunities for relaxation and entertainment.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant community of Al Hamra Village, where four international 5-star hotels, over 10 restaurants, and a bustling shopping mall await. With a strategic location just a 45-minute drive from Dubai Airport, it offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience, allowing residents to escape the hustle and bustle of city life without sacrificing accessibility. Experience the pinnacle of luxury living, where every moment is a testament to uncompromising quality and unparalleled excellence.

title: Valo
description:
Discover a new dimension of luxury living with Valo at Dubai Creek Harbour, the latest residential façade by Emaar Properties with premium 1 to 3-bedroom apartments & 3-bedroom townhouses. The development promises residents an unparalleled blend of elegance, comfort, and convenience. With seamless metro connectivity and mesmerizing views of the Dubai Creek and Badia Golf Course, it epitomizes modern urban living at its finest.

Strategically located at Dubai Creek Harbour (DCH), it offers seamless connectivity to Dubai's key attractions and transportation hubs. With easy access to the RTA ferry terminal and metro station, residents can navigate the city with ease. The waterfront promenade, cycling track, and sports courts provide endless opportunities for outdoor recreation, while the proximity to Dubai's bustling heart ensures that urban conveniences are always within reach.

The architectural identity is a testament to modernity and sustainability. Designed with locally sourced materials and innovative elements such as shaded balconies and tinted windows, its aesthetic appeal is unmatched. Every aspect has been meticulously planned to ensure sustainability, innovation, and urban elegance. From sleek one-bedroom units to spacious three-bedroom townhouses, it offers a variety of residences designed to cater to every lifestyle need. Combining the eco-friendly practices, the sustainable design comes with architectural excellence to preserve the environment while ensuring resident comfort.

At the heart lies a vibrant community centre, boasting a 6000 sqm amenities podium that fosters a strong sense of community. Whether lounging by the pool, working out in the state-of-the-art gym, or enjoying a BBQ in the picnic area, residents have access to an array of amenities that elevate their lifestyle. The multipurpose room serves as a versatile space for social gatherings and events, while the lush common garden provides a tranquil escape amidst the bustling city.

Experience serenity amidst the bustling city at Dubai Creek Harbour, where vibrant living and tranquil surroundings coexist harmoniously. From yoga sessions with sunrise views to leisurely strolls amidst breathtaking scenery, every moment is designed to elevate your senses. Explore the extensive array of amenities, including luxurious serviced environs, expansive parks, and convenient retail outlets, creating a balanced community that caters to both active living and moments of peace.

title: Cala Del Mar
description:
Cala Del Mar at Marjan Island is the newest beachfront residential development by Ellington Properties that offers premium studios, 1 to 4-bedroom apartments in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE. The pristine designed 13-storey tower offers unparalleled privacy and sophistication with limited 10-units per floor. Each residence boasts direct beach access, allowing residents to immerse themselves in the breathtaking beauty of Arabian Gulf’s azure waters and golden sands.

Situated within the pristine Al Marjan Island within Ras Al Khaimah, a world class hospitality destination lined with its beachfront areas. Residents benefit from the convenient access to the retail outlets, malls and entertainment venues, all while enjoying the Island’s natural blessings and proximity to desert attractions. With a seamless blend of luxury and natural charm, it sets a new standard of waterfront living, offering residents a haven amidst the captivating landscapes.

From the moment you steps inside the façade, a world inspired by the fluidity of the ocean unfolds. Each detail, reminiscent of sophisticated yachts and marine elegance, sets a new standard for deluxe coastal living. The property seems to presents a nautical lifestyle running through its veins, with every aspect of its design optimized for both elegance and a strong connection to its nautical environment.

This isn't just a building; it's a harmonious extension of its surroundings. The design path, inspired by the ever-changing patterns of the coastline, invites residents to become an integral part of this exclusive location. Imagine waking up to unhindered views of the Arabian Gulf, surrounded by an ambiance that seamlessly integrates with the island’s iconic lifestyle.

Step into the opulent lobby with its grand entrance and marble flooring, offering more than just a warm welcome. Here, residents can admire exquisite décor, and take in fabulous ocean views through floor-to-ceiling windows. The lobby is a space where residents can linger, appreciating the beauty that surrounds them.

Furthermore, the development is about a lifestyle enriched with recreation and community. The resort-styled swimming pool, surrounded by a hospitality-designed pool deck, beckons residents to unwind. Landscaped gardens, outdoor showers, and changing areas add to the allure, creating a perfect backdrop for relaxation and leisure activities. As you explore this exclusive paradise, consider the endless possibilities it offers.

title: Vitality Residence
description:
Segrex presents Vitality Residence, a contemporary residential development in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai. Offering a blend of modern luxury and vibrant community living, this project boasts 165 meticulously crafted units, comprising 86 studios, 70 one-bedroom apartments, and 9 two-bedroom apartments to cater to diverse lifestyle preferences. Strategically located, Vitality Residence provides easy access to major highways like Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Al Khail Road, and Hessa Street, ensuring seamless connectivity to Dubai’s key destinations.

Residents will relish various premium amenities at Vitality Residence, including a swimming pool, gym, cafes, sports facilities, BBQ areas, kids’ playground, co-working spaces, outdoor yoga, and sauna, elevating the living experience. These offerings complement JVC’s reputation for a holistic lifestyle, complete with parks, sports facilities, and retail outlets.

Beyond Vitality Residence’s residential charm, JVC is a self-sufficient neighborhood boasting schools, hotels, supermarkets, health clinics, parks, restaurants, and the Circle Mall, a premier shopping and leisure destination. The area’s growing popularity among families and professionals underscores its appeal as a lucrative investment opportunity.

Vitality Residence epitomizes modern architecture, sophisticated interiors, and a wealth of amenities, all within reach of JVC’s bustling community. With its strategic location and unparalleled lifestyle offerings, Vitality Residence at JVC promises an enriching living experience for residents seeking the best of Dubai living.

title: Samana Lake Views 2
description:
Experience luxury living with the launch of Samana Lake Views 2 at Dubai Production City offering premium studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments with pool, developed by Samana Developers. Crafted with esteemed design and architecture, after the successful launch of the first phase, this development seamlessly blends modern elegance with unparalleled convenience. Each unit offers residents an exclusive retreat to unwind and soak in the breathtaking views of the Dubai skyline from their private balcony pools.

The highlight is undoubtedly the private pools adorning each unit's balcony, providing residents with an exclusive retreat to unwind amidst the breathtaking backdrop of the Dubai skyline. Beyond its opulent residences, the development boasts an impressive array of amenities tailored to cater to every aspect of residents' lifestyles.

Imagine starting your day with a rejuvenating yoga session in the serene yoga studios, followed by a refreshing dip in the private swimming pool. For fitness enthusiasts, a state-of-the-art gym and basketball court await, ensuring ample opportunities for recreation. Afterward, indulge in relaxation at the steam rooms or leisurely lounge at the pool deck, soaking in the tranquil ambiance.

Convenience is paramount with concierge services, valet parking, and round-the-clock security providing peace of mind to residents. Moreover, its strategic location offers easy access to major highways, iconic landmarks, and world-class educational institutions, making every excursion effortless. Whether you seek adventure, relaxation, or simply a refined cosmopolitan lifestyle, the development promises an unparalleled living experience. Immerse yourself in luxury, surrounded by the vibrant energy of Dubai's dynamic landscape, and discover the epitome of urban sophistication.

title: Azizi Beach Oasis 2
description:
Azizi Beach Oasis 2 at Dubai Studio City presents an exclusive opportunity to embrace a luxurious lifestyle by Azizi Developments with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Nestled within this vibrant community, this modern low-rise development redefines contemporary living with its meticulously crafted apartments and world-class amenities.

At the heart of the development lies a pristine lagoon-style swimming pool, complete with a man-made beach, offering residents the ultimate oasis to unwind and relax. Whether you're soaking up the sun or taking a refreshing dip, this tranquil setting provides a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Surrounded by landscaped gardens and a beautiful courtyard, residents can enjoy the outdoors while indulging in premium amenities such as BBQ areas and beach access.

Adding to the allure is its vibrant community atmosphere, with premium cafes and restaurants nestled within the development. Whether you're enjoying a leisurely meal alfresco or hosting a barbecue with friends, the culinary offerings within the community provide a delightful culinary experience right at your doorstep.

Convenience and security are paramount, with ample parking space and round-the-clock security ensuring residents' peace of mind at all times. Additionally, the development offers easy access to key landmarks and attractions, including Expo 2020 and Dubai's bustling city center, making it the perfect choice for those seeking a thriving urban enclave close to the heartbeat of the city.

With its contemporary design, unparalleled amenities, and prime location, this newly launched façade sets a new benchmark for luxury living in Dubai Studio City. Whether you're a young professional, a growing family, or an investor seeking a lucrative opportunity, this exclusive development promises to elevate your living experience to new heights.

title: Dusk by Binghatti
description:
Binghatti Dusk, crafted by Binghatti Developers, epitomizes modern luxury in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai, lined with premium apartments. With a commitment to redefine contemporary living, the façade offers premium residences that elevate comfort and sophistication to unparalleled levels. Meticulously designed interiors exude understated opulence and impeccable craftsmanship, transforming living spaces into veritable works of art.

The hyper tower ensures a harmonious living environment, maximizing space utilization while maintaining aesthetic appeal. Residents enjoy a prime location with easy access to shopping centers, schools, and recreational facilities, offering the perfect blend of urban convenience and serene living. Flexible payment plans make luxury living accessible to all, with options tailored to diverse needs and budgets.

Curated amenities cater to holistic well-being, featuring expansive swimming pools, dedicated kids play areas, paddle courts, and serene pavilions. Whether relaxing by the pool or staying active on the jogging path, residents can indulge in a balanced lifestyle amidst landscaped surroundings the epitome of refined living in Dubai's dynamic landscape.

title: Binghatti Dawn
description:
Binghatti Dawn, situated in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) in Dubai, epitomizes modern luxury and sophistication by Binghatti Developers with premium apartments. This hyper-tower redefines contemporary living with its unparalleled opulence and attention to detail. Each aspect of the development from its meticulously curated amenities to its bespoke finishes, reflects a commitment to excellence and exclusivity.

Residents can immerse themselves in a world of leisure and well-being, thanks to an array of amenities including expansive swimming pools, dedicated kids play areas, and state-of-the-art fitness facilities. With its prime location and flexible payment plans, it presents an unmatched opportunity for those seeking an elevated living experience in one of Dubai's most sought-after neighborhoods.

title: Arabian Hills Estate
description:
Deca Properties created Arabian Hills Estate, a magnificent new 244 million square foot lagoon community with a Polo Club and Equestrian facilities. This community provides Luxury Plots to build your Mansions, Villas and Apartments with higher quality than any other community in the UAE. It invites families to create peaceful lifestyles among like-minded peers and professionals amidst lush nature.

It's ideal for socialising due to its lively surroundings, which includes shopping malls, cafés, and world-class restaurants. Sprawling green areas and parks with sports fields give plenty of recreational activities. This suburban sanctuary offers more than simply a house; it also represents a potential investment. Come and join us in reimagining affluent living at Arabian Hills Estate, where elegance meets history to provide an unrivalled lifestyle imbued with possibilities.

title: Diamondz
description:
Diamondz at JLT is the newest residential pinnacle by Danube Properties, redefining Dubai’s luxury living with premium studios to 4-bedroom apartments with pool. Boasting 62-storey residential structure, this latest façade comes with standard designed fully furnished residences meticulously crafted to elevate the standard of modern living.
