With an emphasis on spaciousness and opulence, residents can expect nothing short of exceptional living spaces adorned with top-of-the-line specifications and interiors.

With its prime location in Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT), it offers residents easy access to a myriad of amenities and attractions. With several metro stations within walking distance, commuting is a breeze, ensuring seamless connectivity to the rest of the city. Moreover, the area is dotted with schools, hospitals, shopping centers, fitness facilities, parks, and picturesque lakes, providing residents with everything they need right at their doorstep.

Here every detail has been meticulously crafted to exude elegance and style. The turnkey apartments feature the most modern interiors, with kitchens designed to reflect the latest trends in contemporary living. From spacious living areas to sleek finishes, each apartment is a testament to luxurious living at its finest, offering residents a sanctuary to call their own amidst the bustling cityscape.

One of the standout features is its extensive array of amenities, designed to cater to every aspect of residents' lifestyles. Whether indulging in a game of tennis or cricket, unwinding at the bowling center, or hosting a BBQ party with friends and family, there's something for everyone to enjoy. From aquatic gyms and wellness clubs to jogging tracks and content creator studios, the possibilities for recreation and relaxation are endless.

For those seeking relaxation, the rooftop offers a serene escape with yoga decks, hammock gardens, and even a sky golf course. Whether unwinding with a spa treatment, stargazing from the observation deck, or enjoying an open-air cinema under the stars, residents are spoiled for choice when it comes to leisure activities.

title: Six Senses Residences
description:
Six Senses Residences Dubai Marina stands as a beacon of luxury and wellness rising 122-storey façade developed by Select Group with premium 2 to 5-bedroom apartments, penthouses, duplexes and triplex sky mansions. As part of the IHG Hotels & Resorts luxury and lifestyle portfolio, this visionary collaboration between Six Senses and Select Group promises an unparalleled living experience that exceeds mere accommodation.

At the core of this architectural masterpiece lies a commitment to holistic wellness, seamlessly integrated into every facet of its design. From the ground up, the 122-storey tower embodies a philosophy that places health and happiness at the forefront, setting a new standard for healthy living in the modern world. Boasting a diverse range of residences, as well as opulent penthouses and sky mansions, it caters to the unique needs and desires of its discerning residents. Each residence is meticulously crafted to exude elegance and sophistication, with premium finishes and contemporary design elements that create an atmosphere of unparalleled luxury.

But beyond its breathtaking aesthetics, the development is distinguished by its comprehensive suite of wellness amenities, occupying a sprawling 61,250 sq. ft. across four levels. Here, residents can embark on a journey of self-discovery and rejuvenation, from the state-of-the-art gym and dedicated longevity centre to the tranquil spa and hydrotherapy amenities.

Moreover, the innovative Sleep with Six Senses bedroom amenities, combined with elements of biophilia and classical feng shui, ensure that residents enjoy a restful and rejuvenating night sleep. For those seeking a more active lifestyle, the cryotherapy chambers, crystal sound healing room, and 25-meter lap pool on the Skydeck provide ample opportunities for physical and mental well-being.

But perhaps the most compelling feature is its commitment to sustainability. Targeting LEED Silver certification, the development employs cutting-edge technology and eco-friendly practices to minimize its environmental footprint, ensuring a greener, more sustainable future for generations to come.

title: Verdana Phase 4
description:
Verdana Phase 4 at DIP by Reportage Properties presents an exclusive residential enclave with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 2, 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses. Comprising 306 townhouses and 392 apartments, this newest development epitomizes luxury living with a perfect blend of urban sophistication and natural serenity.

With strategic location at Dubai Investments Park (DIP), it offers quick navigation and connectivity to the key famous destinations. While surrounded by parks, schools, mosques, and community facilities, residents can enjoy easy to everything at doorstep. DIP is envisioned as one of the region's most environmentally friendly developments, boasting extensive landscaping and eco-friendly policies, aligning seamlessly with the commitment to a green environment.

The townhouses offer a range of options and layouts, catering to diverse lifestyles and preferences. Each unit is meticulously designed to international standards, boasting modern aesthetics, spacious interiors, and thoughtful design elements. Private balconies or terraces offer scenic views, while fully tiled bathrooms, air conditioning, and built-in wardrobes ensure comfort and convenience. Select townhouses feature additional amenities such as double-height living rooms, sky roofs, and internal elevators, enhancing the living experience for residents. Moreover, some units include laundry and maid rooms, reflecting a commitment to providing comprehensive lifestyle solutions.

Whereas, the apartments offer a variety of configurations and bedroom layouts, providing options for individuals, couples, and families alike. Each apartment is designed with meticulous attention to detail, featuring modern kitchen cabinets, fully tiled bathrooms, and built-in wardrobes. Residents can enjoy the luxury of private parking, ensuring convenience and security.

Beyond the individual units, the façade boasts a range of amenities that elevate the living experience. Residents can unwind in the large swimming pool or let their children splash in the dedicated kids' pool. Fitness enthusiasts can maintain their workout routine at the well-equipped gymnasium, while the clubhouse offers a social space for gatherings. Shaded seating areas and landscaped zones provide inviting spaces for relaxation and community interaction.

title: The Fifth Tower
description:
The F1FTH Tower by Object 1 presents an exceptional opportunity to own a property in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), one of Dubai's most vibrant area. This project, situated in the heart of JVC, offers luxury residences including studios, and one- and two-bedroom apartments, catering to a diverse clientele. The project is expected to hand over properties by Q4 2026, although payment plan details are pending.

Property for sale at Jumeirah Village Circle is renowned for its affordability and family-friendly environment, offering a luxurious yet budget-friendly living experience. The community features a mix of apartments, townhouses, and villas, with ample amenities including parks, playgrounds, sports facilities, and retail outlets. Moreover, its strategic location provides easy access to Dubai's key attractions like the Dubai Miracle Garden and the upcoming Cityland Mall, enhancing the lifestyle and convenience for its residents.

Transportation options are well-developed, with JVC being easily accessible via major highways like Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road. Public transport facilities, including bus routes, connect residents to various parts of Dubai efficiently. Dubai International Airport is approximately 25 min drive away, ensuring swift access for international travel.

Amenities within JVC cater to every need, with Choithrams and Spinneys for grocery shopping, several schools and nurseries for educational needs, and healthcare establishments ensuring well-being. For fitness enthusiasts, there are multiple gyms, and the Circle Mall JVC offers shopping and dining options. Parks within the community provide serene spots for leisure and family time.

For those interested in buying an apartment at The F1FTH Tower, it represents not just a home but an investment in a lifestyle enriched by convenience, comfort, and connectivity. With luxurious interiors, extensive facilities, and a community-focused environment, The F1FTH Tower at Jumeirah Village Circle is a compelling choice for buyers and investors seeking quality and value in Dubai's real estate market.

title: ORA
description:
ORA at Town Square Dubai is the newest residential development by Nshama presenting a luxurious collection of 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments in Dubai. Boasting a prime location within the vibrant landscape of Town Square Dubai, the façade offers residents an unparalleled living experience amidst a harmonious blend of natural tranquility and urban convenience.

The development features a diverse selection of meticulously designed apartments. Each unit is thoughtfully crafted to maximize space and functionality, with spacious interiors flooded with natural light and premium finishes that exude modernity and refinement. From sleek porcelain floors to built-in wardrobes and fully equipped kitchens, every detail is curated to elevate the living experience and provide residents with the utmost comfort and convenience.

Architectural excellence is at the forefront, with its impressive facade showcasing sleek lines, lofty windows, and a harmonious interplay of colors. Set against the backdrop of the central park and abundant green spaces, the contemporary design seamlessly integrates with its natural surroundings, creating a visually stunning masterpiece that exudes timeless elegance.

Beyond its striking aesthetics, it offers residents an array of exceptional amenities designed to enhance their lifestyles and foster a sense of community. From state-of-the-art fitness facilities to relaxing swimming pools and vibrant kids' play areas, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Lush green spaces, jogging paths, and bike lanes provide opportunities for outdoor recreation and leisure, while convenient retail options and delightful cafes add to the vibrant ambiance of the community.

Key Highlights:
1, 2, and 3-bedroom modern designed apartments
Premium location within Town Square Dubai
Spacious interiors with natural light
Premium finishes including porcelain floors and built-in wardrobes
Fully equipped kitchens with high-quality appliances
Contemporary architecture with sleek lines and lofty windows
Diverse recreational amenities including gym, swimming pool, and kids' play area
Flexible and transparent payment plans available

title: Mirage The Oasis
description:
Mirage The Oasis by Emaar Properties presents the latest residential development with premium waterfront-designed 5 & 6-bedroom villas in Dubai. Experience the epitome of luxury living at this exclusive development boasts a collection of villas nestled amidst serene waterways and leisure areas, offering residents a tranquil retreat amidst the bustling cityscape. Designed to perfection, the façade offers three distinct villa styles – Classic, Contemporary, and Chamfered, each exuding elegance and sophistication.

With almost all villas facing water and lagoon areas, residents can enjoy picturesque views from the comfort of their homes. The spacious villas feature flat-style layouts with terrace areas and roof spaces ideal for sky gardens, providing ample opportunities for outdoor relaxation and entertainment. Further, the development comes boasting an arranged array of features and amenities lined with beautifully landscaped swimmable lagoons, generous common waterways, and state-of-the-art amenities such as a fitness centre, kids' playground, and multipurpose room. Residents also have access to the Linear Park with various recreational facilities, ensuring a well-rounded lifestyle within the community.

title: Aras Heights
description:
Aras Heights at Majan is a luxurious residential development by Aras Group with exclusive class 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments in the vibrant neighborhood of Dubai. This contemporary development is set to redefine urban living with its sophisticated design, cutting-edge technology, and a commitment to providing the best quality homes.

Nestled in Majan, it is strategically located to offer residents not only a comfortable lifestyle but also a glimpse into the future of urban living. Here, every detail has been meticulously crafted to elevate your living experience to new heights. Enjoy hassle-free access to the rest of Dubai without any hassle at all.

Experience the future with the Smart Homes. These are not just any homes; they are tech-savvy living spaces where devices and systems can be controlled remotely. This innovation adds unparalleled convenience and efficiency to your daily life. Imagine controlling your lights, climate, and more with just your voice or a few taps on your smartphone. It offers a state-of-the-art smart home technology integrated into every aspect of your daily life. Your home becomes an oasis of convenience and a hub of intelligent living.

Each residence is a masterpiece of architectural excellence. The apartments offer unparalleled comfort and convenience. The design and architecture harmonize with the surrounding environment, ensuring that every family enjoys the best living conditions. The development boasts a robust backup power system in public areas to ensure you never face an interruption in your daily life. The landscape infrastructures of the streets are arranged in harmony with common amenities, offering a sense of community and belonging.

As you step into the development, you're stepping into the future. This is where your dreams of modern, convenient, and secure living become a reality. The amenities, the architecture, and the commitment to excellence make an investment in your future, not just a place to live.

Key Highlights:
Choose from a wide range of options available with 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments.
This impressive project features a 2B+G+9 floors and offers a total of 73 residential units.
Strategically located to provide easy access to key amenities and services in Majan, Dubai.
The development stands out with its emphasis on luxury, comfort, and intelligent design.
Residents can control lights, climate, and more through voice commands or smartphone apps.

title: Haven Living
description:
Haven Living at Dubai Island is the new development by Metac, offering an extraordinary living experience like no other with premium 1, 2, 3 & 4-bedroom apartments. With meticulous attention to detail, the G+2P+10 floors residential building epitomizes modern sophistication and timeless elegance, providing residents with a sanctuary of warmth and comfort in the heart of a vibrant cityscape.

The location is unparalleled, situated on Dubai Island, an artificial archipelago located off the shores of the historically significant Deira district. With seamless connectivity to the mainland by both road and sea, residents enjoy easy access to Dubai's dynamic metropolis while basking in the tranquility of Island living.

As part of the prestigious Dubai Islands project, the development is poised to offer residents unparalleled lifestyle experiences. Spanning the community in 17 square kilometers across five islands, Dubai Islands is acclaimed for its exquisite residences, iconic hotels, lifestyle enclaves, and a majestic 20-kilometer beachfront. With over 80 hotels planned within the vicinity, residents can expect a diverse range of accommodations, catering to various preferences and tastes.

Each residence features refined design and finishing, creating an ambiance of luxury and exclusivity. From spacious layouts to well-appointed kitchens, every aspect is crafted to inspire relaxation and creativity. From spacious bedroom layouts to luxurious bedroom configurations, each apartment offers ample natural light and breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. Additionally, duplex units provide a perfect harmony of functionality and elegance, ensuring residents find their ideal living space.

With its flexible payment plan, making homeownership more accessible and convenient for prospective buyers. With options for installment payments, owning a residence in this prestigious development is within reach for individuals seeking a refined and luxurious lifestyle.

title: The Oasis
description:
The Oasis by Emaar Properties is the latest of its kind residential development in Dubai offering villas, where luxury living meets unparalleled serenity. Nestled in the heart, this masterpiece is going to redefine the standard of opulence and tranquility.

In the bustling city of Dubai, where innovation and modernity merge seamlessly, the development emerges as an oasis of calm amidst the vibrant energy. With a visionary design that harmoniously blends nature and urbanity, this exclusive villa community invites you to embark on a remarkable journey of indulgence and sophistication.

Immerse yourself in a world of refined elegance, where every aspect of living has been meticulously crafted to cater to your desires. Here, you will find a sanctuary where your aspirations are nurtured, and your dreams come alive.

As you enter the community, you will be greeted by an awe-inspiring water body that gracefully winds its way through the community, creating a sense of calm and tranquility. This mesmerizing feature serves as the centrepiece, inviting you to unwind and rejuvenate in its soothing embrace. Whether you choose to take a leisurely stroll along its banks or simply bask in its ethereal beauty, the water body promises to be a sanctuary for the soul.

Beyond the water body lies an array of meticulously designed villas, each exuding elegance and charm. From contemporary architectural marvels to timeless classics, these homes are a celebration of exquisite craftsmanship and meticulous attention to detail. Immerse yourself in the unparalleled luxury that defines every inch of these meticulously crafted residences. Each villa offers an abundance of space, ensuring that your privacy and comfort are paramount. Experience a harmonious blend of functionality and aesthetics, where modernity and tradition converge to create the perfect abode.

Key Highlights:
Immerse yourself in the epitome of architectural brilliance with stunningly designed villas
Experience the joy of secluded living in a gated community ensuring tranquility
Situated in a prime location, offers seamless connectivity to major highways
Foster a sense of belonging in a vibrant community, where residents can engage
Indulge in the calming embrace of a meticulously crafted water bodies including lagoons
Enjoy an array of exceptional amenities including the refined spaces to relax and rejuvenate

title: Ocean Star
description:
Ocean Star at Rashid Yachts & Marina epitomizes luxury waterfront living developed by Emaar Properties with premium 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. Boasting breathtaking views of the marina and the iconic Dubai skyline, residents are greeted with a harmonious blend of lush greenery, serene waterfront promenades, and panoramic vistas, creating an oasis of calm amidst the dynamic cityscape.

Nestled within the prestigious Rashid Yachts & Marina, this exclusive residential development offers an unparalleled blend of urban sophistication and natural serenity. With stunning views of the marina and the coast, it provides residents with a tranquil retreat amidst the bustling city life. With close proximity to Dubai's iconic landmarks, vibrant business districts, and cultural attractions, it offers residents the perfect balance of convenience and exclusivity. Whether you're seeking a peaceful sanctuary or a vibrant urban lifestyle, it sets a new standard for luxury living in Dubai.

The architectural brilliance reflects Dubai's visionary spirit, combining classic elegance with modern aesthetics. The development offers a diverse selection of thoughtfully designed residences. Each residence exudes timeless luxury and features open kitchens, en-suite bathrooms, expansive balconies, and ample storage space, ensuring maximum comfort and convenience for residents.

Beyond its stunning residences, it offers an impressive array of world-class amenities tailored to elevate every aspect of residents' lifestyles. From a state-of-the-art gym and sports facilities to children's play areas and serene gardens, it provides ample opportunities for relaxation, recreation, and wellness. Residents can unwind by the elegant canal pool, enjoy leisurely strolls along the waterfront promenade, or indulge in alfresco dining amidst lush greenery.

Convenience is paramount with a health clinic conveniently located within the property and close proximity to schools, shopping centres, and cultural attractions. Whether residents seek tranquillity or adventure, it offers the perfect balance of urban convenience and natural beauty.

title: ELO 2
description:
Elo 2 at Damac Hills 2 is the new development by Damac Properties epitomizing the modern urban living with a touch of tranquility offering a selection of 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. After the successful launch of the first phase, this newly addressed façade redefines luxury with its prime location, impeccable design, and world-class amenities.

Strategically positioned, it ensures residents enjoy seamless connectivity to four major highways, including the Al Qudra Road, facilitating easy access to key landmarks and destinations across the city. Despite its urban accessibility, it provides a serene escape from the hustle and bustle, surrounded by lush parklands and recreational facilities.

The development is meticulously crafted to create a harmonious living environment, where residents can thrive in comfort and style. From the contemporary design of its residential tower to the lush greenery of its landscaped spaces, every aspect is thoughtfully considered to enhance the quality of life for residents.

Beyond its residential offerings, it boasts an impressive array of amenities, including a stunning Malibu Beach, wave surfing simulator, lazy river, and multi-sports facilities. With a supermarket for everyday convenience, gymnasium for fitness enthusiasts, and dedicated kids play areas, the development ensures that residents have everything they need for a life of luxury and leisure.

title: Gharbi I Residences
description:
Gharbi I Residences at Arjan, developed by Rabdan Developments is a testament to the seamless integration of urban living with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. This prestigious development elevates the standard of luxurious living with meticulous attention to detail and architectural brilliance, that’s stands as an iconic symbol of excellence.

Comprising a total of 168 units across a G+3P+12+2R configuration, the illustrious façade promises residents an unparalleled living experience. The building's exterior draws inspiration from the forms and colors of nature, creating a tranquil and soothing environment that evokes a sense of relaxation and comfort.

Inside, residents are greeted with open floor plans, high-quality fixtures, and fine furnishings that exude sophistication and elegance. Natural light floods the interiors, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere, while smart home technology enhances convenience and connectivity. The fully fitted kitchens feature European-made appliances, ensuring both style and functionality.

One of the standout features is the inclusion of private pools on select balconies, allowing residents to indulge in luxury and leisure within the comfort of their own home. The panoramic views further enhance the living experience, providing a picturesque backdrop to everyday life.

Beyond the exquisite interiors, the façade offers a wealth of amenities designed to cater to residents' every need. From swimming pools, sauna & steam rooms to yoga space, rooftop cinema, and gaming room, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Additional amenities include a kids' playground, 24/7 security, indoor gym, club lounge, outdoor lounge, and more.

title: Natura
description:
Natura at DAMAC Hills 2 is a prestigious development by DAMAC Properties, setting a new benchmark for luxury property in Dubailand, Dubai. This vibrant community offers a unique blend of comfort, elegance, and leisure amenities, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a serene yet opulent lifestyle.

Nestled within DAMAC Hills 2, property for sale at Natura features 4-bedroom townhouses, meticulously designed to cater to the refined tastes of its residents. With sizes and specifics yet to be unveiled, townhouses for sale at DAMAC Nature are set to start at a price of 1 820 000 AED. The anticipated handover date for these properties is Q2 2026, with a flexible 60/40 payment plan, making property at DAMAC Nature an attractive investment opportunity.

For those contemplating the purchase of a townhouse at DAMAC Natura, the investment potential is substantial. The community's design integrates modern aesthetics with functionality, offering spacious interiors, state-of-the-art kitchens, and luxurious finishes that appeal to a discerning clientele. With a strong emphasis on community living, the development fosters a sense of belonging and provides a safe, secure environment for families.

Residents of townhouses at DAMAC Natura can enjoy a plethora of amenities and facilities designed to enhance the living experience. The DAMAC Hills 2 community boasts family-friendly amenities such as Malibu Beach, a wave pool, a lazy river, tennis courts, football pitches, and well-equipped fitness centers. The community also features Trump International Golf Club Dubai, a championship golf course designed by Gil Hanse, offering a world-class golfing experience. For those seeking leisure and recreation, the Park provides vast green spaces with jogging tracks, picnic areas, and playgrounds.

Educational facilities near DAMAC Hills 2 include reputable schools like Jebel Ali School, Fairgreen International School, and GEMS Metropole School, ensuring high standards of education for residents' children. Healthcare needs are well catered for with Emirates Hospital and MedCare Medical Centre within a 12-minute drive, ensuring residents have access to quality medical care.

title: Binghatti Apex
description:
Binghatti Apex at JVC stands as a pinnacle of contemporary living by Binghatti Developers lined with premium collection of studios and 1-bedroom apartments in Dubai. Boasting a striking architectural design rising 33-storey façade with ground-plus-five-podium configuration, housing residential, commercial, and retail spaces within its premises. With a total of 528 residential units, residents are treated to a lifestyle of utmost comfort and convenience.

The interiors exude an aura of understated luxury and impeccable craftsmanship. High-quality materials and bespoke finishes adorn each living space, transforming ordinary residences into veritable works of art. Beyond its strategic location, JVC offers a cornucopia of amenities meticulously crafted to enrich the lives of its residents. From sprawling green spaces to gourmet dining options, every facet of JVC is designed to cater to the discerning tastes of its cosmopolitan community.

Amenities abound, catering to the diverse needs of its cosmopolitan community. From state-of-the-art fitness facilities like swimming pools, an indoor gym, and outdoor yoga/aerobics area to recreational spaces such as paddle courts and jogging paths, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Families will appreciate the dedicated kids' pool and interactive play area, while professionals can make use of the modern office spaces and retail outlets available within the development.

title: Violet Tower
description:
Experience urban luxury at its finest with Violet Tower at JVC, a new development by Dubai Investments offering premium studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. With its sleek architecture and modern design boasting 27 residential floors, it stands as a beacon of sophistication amidst the bustling cityscape. Each residence is thoughtfully designed to maximize space and comfort, featuring high-end finishes and panoramic views of the vibrant surroundings.

The development captivates with its contemporary design and impeccable finishing, setting a new standard for urban living. The exterior boasts expansive windows that flood the interiors with natural light, while balconies offer panoramic views of the dynamic surroundings. Each unit exudes a welcoming ambiance, creating the perfect retreat for residents to unwind and recharge amidst the hustle and bustle of city life.

With this development, modern living is elevated to new heights with an array of amenities designed to cater to residents of all ages and interests. Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the fully equipped gymnasium, complete with state-of-the-art equipment to support their wellness journey. Meanwhile, the inviting swimming pool and poolside lounge offer the perfect setting for relaxation and socializing, ensuring endless hours of enjoyment for residents and their guests. Families with children will delight in the vibrant kids' playground, providing a safe and stimulating environment for young ones to explore and play.

Beyond its luxurious amenities and stylish design, it stands as a beacon of environmental responsibility, committed to promoting sustainable living practices. Adhering to the Dubai Municipality Green Code and international standards, the tower incorporates energy-efficient systems and waste reduction initiatives to minimize its ecological footprint. By embracing sustainability at every level of its design and operation, the tower not only offers residents a sophisticated living environment but also contributes to the preservation of the planet for future generations.

title: Evergreens
description:
DAMAC Evergreens at DAMAC Hills 2 presents a refined vision of luxury living, brought to you by DAMAC Properties, a renowned name in real estate development. This exceptional project offers luxury apartments, including 1 and 2-bedroom units, that cater to a variety of lifestyles and preferences. Each apartment is overlooking the lush parklands of DAMAC Hills 2 and the captivating Dubai cityscape.

The architecture and interiors of apartments a DAMAC Evergreens are crafted to perfection, embodying elegance and sophistication in every detail. The kitchen, a central piece of every home, is designed with high-end fittings and finishes, complementing the overall modern aesthetic of the apartments. Residents will have access to a wide array of amenities and facilities, including state-of-the-art sports complexes, and vibrant communal areas, promising a lifestyle not just lived but thoroughly enjoyed.

The property sizes at DAMAC Evergreens range from 50 to 82 m², starting at a price of 150 800 $ (554 000 AED), ensuring a blend of luxury and affordability. Investors and homeowners will find the payment plan of 70/30 convenient, with a down payment of 20%. The handover date of apartments for sale is set for Q4 2026. This financial flexibility coupled with the project's investment potential, particularly with expected rental yields in Dubai ranging from 4.2% to 5.7%, makes DAMAC Evergreens a compelling choice for both investors and residents looking for properties for sale at DAMAC Hills 2.

DAMAC Hills 2 itself is a master-planned community that offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of the city while remaining connected to Dubai's main attractions. The community is filled with unique amenities such as water town attractions, sports facilities, and leisure experiences, making it a vibrant place to live. The community's strategic location ensures easy access to major highways, facilitating convenient travel to and from the city's key locations. Residents can enjoy a plethora of outdoor activities, including golf, horse riding, and more, catering to a wide range of interests and age groups.

title: Sobha Orbis
description:
Unveiling Sobha Orbis at Motor City, a luxurious residential development by Sobha Group that features premium designed 1, 1.5 & 2-bedroom apartments in Dubai. Comprising three connected towers rising majestically from the podium level, the façades offer an unparalleled living experience characterized by sophistication, convenience, and connectivity.

Each tower stands tall at G+34 floors, housing a total of 19 units per floor, featuring a mix of meticulously crafted apartments. Embodying the epitome of urban living, it boasts sleek architectural design and sumptuous interior finishes, creating a timeless aura of luxury. Residents can indulge in a wide array of amenities including a sky garden, Jacuzzi, kids' play area, BBQ spaces, and a kids' pool, ensuring every leisure and recreational need is met within the confines of the community.

Conveniently located just a minute away from Mohammed bin Zayed Road and Al Qudra Road, it offers seamless connectivity to key destinations across Dubai. Additionally, the proposed metro station adjacent to the tower enhances accessibility, making commuting and exploring the city hassle-free for residents.Whether one seeks tranquility amidst landscaped gardens, a refreshing dip in the resort-style pool, or a vigorous workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center, it provides an oasis of luxury where every moment exudes grandeur. With its commitment to luxury, convenience, and connectivity, the development sets a new standard for refined living in Motor City, Dubai.

title: Azizi Jewel
description:
Experience the epitome of contemporary living with Azizi Jewel at Al Furjan, a new development by Azizi Developments offering premium studio & 1 bedroom apartments. Boasting stylish exteriors and meticulously crafted interiors, each residence exudes modern elegance and timeless appeal. With seamless connectivity to Dubai's major highways, including Sheikh Zayed Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, it provides effortless access to the city's vibrant attractions and business hubs.

Immerse yourself in a world of convenience and luxury, with shopping destinations like Ibn Battuta Mall and Dubai Marina Mall just moments away. Indulge in the finest amenities, from landscaped walk-in areas to state-of-the-art fitness facilities, ensuring every moment spent here is nothing short of extraordinary. Discover a new standard of urban living and make your exquisite sanctuary in Al Furjan.

title: Ellington Hillmont Residences
description:
Discover Hillmont Residences at JVC (Jumeirah Village Circle). A stunning new project by Ellington showcasing the very best of contemporary living within the unique layout of the community.

Featuring a striking exterior this 12-story residential tower hosts an array of apartment options. These range from studio units to spacious 1 to 3-bedroom apartments, each featuring the hallmark Ellington quality and design aesthetics.

Emphasizing a lively community atmosphere, Hillmont Residences offers expansive social areas and premium amenities designed to foster connections among residents. Each detail of Hillmont Residences reflects modern convenience melded with enduring sophistication, delivering an unmatched living experience at the core of Jumeirah Village Circle.

title: Granada II
description:
Granada II at Mina Al Arab presents the latest series by RAK Properties with premium collection of 2 & 3-bedroom waterfront townhouses in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE. This waterfront development, meticulously crafted invites residents to embrace a lifestyle where lush greenery, protected coastal wetlands, and pristine beaches converge seamlessly with modern comforts and world-class amenities.

Mina Al Arab emerges as a haven for those seeking the perfect blend of vacation and residential living. With its six distinct districts, each boasting its own unique character and charm, this master-planned community caters to diverse lifestyles and preferences. From the idyllic beachfront of Malibu to the serene surroundings, every corner of Mina Al Arab promises an unparalleled experience, whether it's a permanent residence, a weekend retreat, or a vacation escape.

Experience the allure of the Malibu lifestyle where endless white beaches, abundant sunshine, and a laid-back atmosphere redefine the concept of everyday living. At Mina Al Arab, the essence of Malibu is seamlessly woven into the fabric of modern amenities and infrastructure, offering residents an enchanting blend of coastal living and contemporary convenience. With its picturesque landscapes and beachfront vistas, Malibu beckons residents to embrace a life of leisure and luxury day after day.

The development emerges as a symbol of tranquility and luxury, where modern architecture meets traditional Arabian influences to create a welcoming ambiance for families. With its beachfront location and lush surroundings, it embodies the essence of community living, fostering connections and cherished moments amidst breathtaking natural beauty. Here, residents can revel in a relaxed lifestyle enriched by stunning water views and designer finishes, making every moment truly memorable.

At the heart of Mina Al Arab lies a wealth of amenities designed to enhance every aspect of daily life. From sea views and private beaches to recreational facilities and convenient shopping options, residents are treated to a lifestyle of unparalleled comfort and convenience. With landscaped open spaces, children's playgrounds, swimming pools, and 24-hour security, every need and desire are catered to within this vibrant waterfront community.

title: Hammock Park
description:
Hammock Park at Wasl Gate is a residential development by Divine One Group that offers premium studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments in Dubai. Perched in the vibrant neighborhood, it emerges as a beacon of sophistication and style in Dubai's ever-evolving skyline. This prestigious residential development offers a harmonious blend of contemporary architecture, lavish interiors, and unrivaled amenities, setting a new standard for upscale living in the city.

Situated at the crossroads of convenience and connectivity, it offers easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road and Dubai's major attractions. From world-class shopping destinations to pristine beaches and vibrant entertainment hubs, everything you need is just moments away from your doorstep. With its prime location, opulent residences, and world-class amenities, this exclusive community invites you to elevate your lifestyle and indulge in the finer things in life.

Within the confines of development, every aspect of life is thoughtfully curated to cater to the discerning tastes of modern homeowners. From the moment you step into your fully-furnished residence, you'll be greeted by sleek, modern interiors and exquisite finishing touches that exude elegance and refinement. Designer kitchens equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and spa-inspired bathrooms with designer sanitary ware create an ambiance of luxury and comfort.

Indulge in a wealth of resort-inspired amenities designed to cater to your every whim. Whether you're lounging by the pool, enjoying a movie under the stars at the outdoor beach cinema, or unwinding in the sauna at Elevate Hub, it offers an unparalleled lifestyle experience. With over 70,000 square feet of amenities spread across lush landscaped gardens, there's always something new to explore and enjoy.

title: Nakheel Rixos Phase 2
description:
Nakheel Rixos Phase 2 stands as the crowning jewel within Dubai Islands, offering a final opportunity with exclusive 1 to 3-bedroom apartments, 4-bedroom duplexes with large terrace, plus beach houses with gardens, designed for those seeking a dream home in an exclusive community. This development artfully combines sophistication with tranquility, featuring a diverse array of residences, defining luxury beachfront living.

Nestled within the serene embrace of Dubai Islands, this development offers a serene escape from the city's hustle and bustle. Enjoy breathtaking views of pristine beaches, azure waters, and iconic landmarks, creating a picturesque backdrop to your waterfront lifestyle. The horizon meets the shoreline, inviting residents to immerse themselves in the vibrant energy of the city while savoring the tranquil waterfront environment.

As a resident, access to private amenities and bespoke services by Rixos awaits here, creating a lifestyle where waterfront allure seamlessly integrates with the city's vibrant energy. Picture a life where the horizon meets the shoreline, and experience the pinnacle of beachfront living in these exclusive apartment residences.The collection of residences is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and design. Embrace the waterfront lifestyle allure with stylish interiors that reflect modern elegance, seamlessly blending with the natural beauty that surrounds.

Residents can indulge in state-of-the-art fitness centers, refreshing swimming pools, rejuvenating spa facilities, and sports courts within the development. Vibrant retail outlets, fine dining establishments, and entertainment options ensure a dynamic lifestyle. The community also features car parking, hotels, resorts, a golf course, retail outlets, and F&B establishments. For families, a thrilling Theme Park and Water Park add excitement, while an exhilarating Surfing Park caters to adventure enthusiasts.

title: Aldar Nouran Living
description:
Nouran Living by Aldar Properties stands as a beacon of modern living within Saadiyat Island’s vibrant Marina District with premium studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. Boasting a prime location within walking distance of the island’s marina project and prestigious educational institutions like New York University Abu Dhabi, it offers residents the perfect blend of urban convenience and coastal luxury. With 372 thoughtfully designed residences, it caters to diverse buyers seeking a well-located investment opportunity.

Designed with community in mind, the residential development features a range of amenities aimed at enhancing residents’ quality of life. From co-working spaces and a library to swimming pools and an outdoor track, the development provides ample opportunities for relaxation, recreation, and socialization. The proximity to cultural landmarks like the Louvre Abu Dhabi and recreational destinations such as Saadiyat Beach Club further enriches the living experience, while sustainable transportation initiatives underscore its commitment to eco-conscious living.

With flexible payment plans available to buyers of all nationalities, investing here is both accessible and rewarding. Whether seeking a primary residence or a lucrative investment opportunity, it offers the perfect balance of comfort, convenience, and luxury living in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s premier island destination.

title: Autograph Collection
description:
Experience luxury living at its finest with Autograph Collection at Damac Hills, the latest residential series by Damac Properties with 4 to 7-bedroom boutique villas. This exclusive collection comprises only 50 villas, each meticulously designed to embody the epitome of sophistication and community spirit. Boasting contemporary architecture and luxurious finishes, within this exceptional residential enclave that is meticulously designed to provide residents with spacious and comfortable living spaces.

Set amidst a sprawling 42 million square feet community, residents are treated to an array of world-class amenities and recreational facilities. From the award-winning golf club to the Malibu Bay wave pool, there's something for everyone to indulge in. Whether you're seeking fine dining experiences, upscale shopping options, or adrenaline-pumping activities, Damac Hills caters to every whim and desire.

Residents of the development not only enjoy the tranquility of their private sanctuary but also the convenience of being close to the vibrant pulse of Dubai. With easy access to the city’s major attractions, business districts, and transportation hubs, every convenience is just a stone’s throw away. Whether it’s a day of leisure or a night on the town, it offers the best of both worlds.

Furthermore, the development caters to the discerning homeowners who seeks more than just a residence but a lifestyle. With customizable spaces and secluded greenery, each villa provides a canvas for residents to express their individuality and create their dream home. Whether you’re hosting family gatherings or seeking solace in nature, it offers a sanctuary where every moment is cherished. With its limited number of pristine villas and meticulous attention to details, it presents an exclusive opportunity for everyone elevate their lifestyle.

With most premium leisure set of facilities, residents can indulge in the trendy Malibu Bay wave pool, offering a refreshing option abound within the community, ensuring that every culinary craving is satisfied, while vibrant F&B outlets provide the perfect setting for socializing and unwinding. Multi-sports amenities cater to fitness enthusiasts, offering a range of activities to suit all interests and skill levels. Whether it’s a leisurely swim in the pool, a round of golf, or simply enjoying the tranquility of nature, it provides residents with an unparalleled array of amenities to enhance their quality of life.

title: Electra
description:
Electra by Acube Developments is a luxurious residential tower nestled in the prestigious Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) in Dubai with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. Named after a blue-white giant star in the constellation of Taurus, this architectural marvel stands tall at 38 floors, offering a symphony of luxury, serenity, and active living. With its meticulously crafted spaces and opulent amenities, it redefines modern living in Dubai.

What sets the development apart is its commitment to innovation and technology. Every unit is equipped with smart home features, allowing residents to control various aspects of their living spaces with ease. From lighting and temperature control to security systems, residents can personalize their living experience to suit their preferences.

The amenities redefine the meaning of luxury living. The theme park-style amenity floor offers a plethora of leisure options, including a sky pool, waterpark, arcade, private cinema, and mini-golf. Whether unwinding by the poolside or hosting a movie night with friends, residents can indulge in a lifestyle of unparalleled comfort and entertainment.

Beyond its luxurious offerings, the location adds to its allure. Situated in the heart of JVC, residents enjoy easy access to major highways, ensuring seamless connectivity to key landmarks and business districts. Surrounded by lush parks, tranquil gardens, and serene landscape areas, JVC provides a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life.

This façade is more than just a residential tower; it's a sanctuary where luxury meets convenience and tranquility. Whether you're seeking a serene retreat or a dynamic urban lifestyle, it offers the perfect balance of sophistication and comfort, making it the ultimate destination for discerning homeowners in Dubai.

title: Lillia
description:
Lillia at The Valley is the latest residential series by Emaar Properties that features premium-designed 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses in Dubai. Nestled within the picturesque landscape of The Valley, it offers a lifestyle that seamlessly intertwines opulence and sustainability, promising an unparalleled living experience for discerning individuals and families alike.

Situated near Al Ain Road, this exclusive development offers residents seamless connectivity to key destinations within minutes. With easy access to major highways like Al Ain Dubai Road (E66) and Jebel Ali - Lehbab Road (E77), navigating the city is a breeze. The pristine location enhances its appeal, boasting smooth connectivity to key destinations within minutes. Residents enjoy seamless access to renowned attractions, dining options, and leisure facilities, making every day a new adventure.

Designed to elevate your everyday living experience, the architectural marvels seamlessly blend form and function. Whether you opt for cozy or premium choice, every residence exudes sophistication and style, offering spacious interiors, modern amenities, and panoramic views of the surrounding greenery. Each home is a sanctuary of comfort and luxury, where every detail is meticulously crafted to enhance your quality of life.

With its unparalleled blend of luxury, sustainability, and connectivity, these premium facades represent the epitome of modern living in Dubai. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat from the city or a vibrant community to call home, it offers the perfect balance of nature and luxury, inviting you to embark on a journey of discovery and fulfillment. Come home at The Valley and experience luxury living at its finest. Your sanctuary amidst nature awaits.

title: Seville
description:
Seville at Bloom Living epitomizes the luxurious lakeside living with premium 2 & 3-bedroom townhouses and 3 to 6-bedroom villas, developed by Bloom Holding at Zayed City, Abu Dhabi. Inspired by the charm of Mediterranean Spanish architecture, this exclusive community offers an unparalleled blend of elegance, comfort, and modernity. Boasting a master plan spread over 2.2 million sqm, lined with premium amenities and facilities at doorstep.

Step into a world where nature seamlessly intertwines with lavish amenities and services. The development invites residents to explore its verdant surroundings, adorned with lush greenery and picturesque lakeside views. Whether it's a leisurely stroll through the interconnected parks or a refreshing dip in the community pools, every moment spent here is imbued with tranquility and serenity.

These homes are meticulously crafted to cater to the diverse needs of modern families. From cozy two-bedroom townhouses to expansive six-bedroom villas, each residence exudes sophistication and comfort. With spacious living areas, elegant finishes, and panoramic windows offering breathtaking views, every detail is designed to elevate your living experience.

Experience a lifestyle where convenience meets luxury. The luxury living boasts a range of amenities and facilities, including retail outlets, dining options, mosques, prayer rooms, and international schools. Whether you're enjoying a meal at one of the neighborhood cafes or unwinding in the lush gardens, every moment is a testament to refined living.

Discover a community where every day feels like a holiday. The façades offer a unique blend of tranquility, convenience, and luxury, creating an oasis of serenity amidst the bustling city life. Welcome home, where every moment is filled with warmth, comfort, and endless possibilities.

title: Ramhan Island Villas Phase 3
description:
Ramhan Island Phase 3 by Eagle Hills is the latest premium waterfront development with 3 to 7-bedroom villas, located at the pristine shores of Ramhan Island in Abu Dhabi. Experience an unparalleled lifestyle, where the fusion of natural beauty and modern luxury creates an extraordinary living experience. With a focus on wellness and relaxation, residents can indulge in exclusive beach experiences and tranquil spa amenities.

Nestled on the pristine shores of Ramhan Island, Abu Dhabi, these villas redefine coastal living with a perfect blend of luxury and tranquility. Surrounded by lush greenery and azure waters, this exclusive residential community offers residents an unparalleled retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. The strategic location ensures easy access to key landmarks such as the Louvre Abu Dhabi and Yas Island, while providing a serene sanctuary for residents to call home.

With meticulous attention to detail, the masterfully crafted villas exude elegance and sophistication. Each residence boasts spacious interiors, premium finishes, and breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. Residents can indulge in a host of world-class amenities, including a Marina & Yacht Club, luxury shopping outlets, and a state-of-the-art Spa and Wellness center.

Whether lounging on the pristine beaches, exploring the vibrant retail promenade, or unwinding in the infinity pool, residents are treated to a lifestyle of unmatched comfort and convenience. With flexible payment plans designed to accommodate diverse financial needs, owning a piece of paradise has never been more attainable. Discover the epitome of coastal luxury, where every day feels like a vacation.

Key Highlights:
3 to 7-bedroom premium villas
Unrivaled beachfront living experience
Seamless connectivity to major landmarks
Premium waterfront dining options
State-of-the-art spa and wellness facilities
Exclusive marina and yacht club access
Family-friendly amenities including schools and nurseries
Eco-friendly design with lush green spaces
Flexible payment plans tailored to your needs

title: ELO
description:
ELO at Damac Hills 2 presents a distinctive blend of modern living and natural tranquility, developed by Damac Properties offering 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. Nestled within Dubai's vibrant community, it features two towers with 14 levels each, housing meticulously crafted residences. These contemporary living spaces boast superior finishes and expansive layouts, providing residents with both elegance and comfort.

With its prime location, the development ensures convenient access to four highways, including the Al Qudra Road, facilitating seamless connectivity to key landmarks and destinations. Despite its proximity to the city, it offers residents a serene escape from the bustling urban life, surrounded by lush parklands and recreational amenities. From the community's Malibu Beach and wave surfing simulator to its lazy river and multi-sports facilities, residents can indulge in a variety of leisure activities without ever leaving home.

The flexible payment plans and great return on investment make it an attractive option for both first-time buyers and seasoned investors. Whether you're seeking a cozy first home or a lucrative investment opportunity, it promises exceptional value and luxury living. With its unmatched amenities and convenient location, the newly launched façade sets a new standard for urban living in Dubai.

title: FIA
description: FIA at Town Square Dubai is the latest residential series by renowned Nshama that features premium designed 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments in Dubai. With its meticulously designed amenities and unparalleled location, it redefines the essence of community living in Dubai. Residents can enjoy access to 154,000 square meters of meticulously manicured parks and 16 community gardens, creating an oasis of tranquility amidst the urban landscape within the community. Whether you're relaxing by the swimming pool, exploring the cycling tracks, or enjoying a leisurely stroll through the landscaped courtyards, the development offers an all-encompassing living experience where every need is catered to within arm's reach.

title: Emaar Park Lane Interiors by VIDA
description:
Discover luxury living at Park Lane - Interiors by VIDA, a new development by Emaar Properties nestled within Dubai Hills Estate with 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments, offering unrivalled elegance and breathtaking views. Following the successful launch of Emaar Vida Residences, this newly unveiled facade continues to set standards and elicit overwhelming responses from buyers. Immerse yourself in a lifestyle of leisure and comfort with world-class amenities curated to enhance every aspect of daily living.

Nestled within the prestigious Dubai Hills Estate, this exclusive development offers a harmonious blend of sophistication and convenience. Overlooking an 18-hole championship golf course and spanning 2,700 acres, residents enjoy breathtaking views and serene surroundings. With seamless connectivity to key landmarks such as the Dubai Hills Mall, DHE corporate park, and GEMS Schools, residents enjoy the convenience of urban amenities within close proximity. Whether unwinding in the serene yoga and meditation areas or enjoying quality time with family at the kids' play areas, it offers an unparalleled living experience in the heart of Dubai.

From community parks and swimming pools to fully equipped gyms and outdoor games, the façade ensures a well-rounded experience for residents of all ages. Indulge in culinary delights at the dining outlets within the development, or take a leisurely stroll along the running tracks amidst lush greenery.

title: Avant Garde Residences
description:
Discover unparalleled luxury living at Avant Garde Residences by Skyline Builders, nestled in the heart of Dubai's vibrant JVC with posh studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. With a striking G+5 podium and 18 floors, this prestigious development offers 172 residences and 3 retail shops. The thoughtfully crafted contemporary architectural design, inspired by the Arabian desert's rolling dunes, ensures optimal views and practical living spaces throughout the building. Residents are welcomed by an expansive double-height entrance lobby adorned with premium materials, setting the tone for sophistication and elegance.

Each apartment features European interior design with natural materials and tranquil color palettes, creating a serene ambiance that exudes both comfort and style. From the infinity swimming pool and rooftop garden to the fully equipped gym and children's play areas, it offers an impressive array of amenities designed to enrich every aspect of daily life. Experience the epitome of luxury living in Dubai, where impeccable craftsmanship meets unrivaled comfort and convenience.

title: FH Residency
description:
FH Residency at JVT is a residential development that redefines urban living with premium studios, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments developed by Forum Real Estate Development. Boasting a G+24 tower with 293 apartments, it caters to diverse needs. Each apartment features high-standard finishing and build-in kitchen appliances, ensuring comfort and convenience. The ground floor hosts a welcoming lobby, a coffee shop, and designated areas for couriers and service staff.

Residents can indulge in a plethora of amenities on the first floor, including a gym, yoga studio, swimming pool, and kids playing room. Additionally, the rooftop coworking spaces provide a panoramic view of the Dubai Marina skyline, fostering creativity and productivity. With its blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, it offers the perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life.

title: Maison Elysee 2
description:
Maison Elysee 2 is the modern residential epitome by Pantheon Development in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. With its sleek architecture and contemporary design, this development redefines luxury living, offering a harmonious blend of sophistication and comfort.

Step into the tranquil interiors and feel your worries melt away. From the moment you enter, you're greeted with open, airy spaces that serve as a canvas for your personal style. Whether it's unwinding in the spacious living areas or enjoying the views from your private balcony, every corner exudes elegance and refinement.
Indulge in a lifestyle of convenience with state-of-the-art amenities, including a large swimming pool, fully-equipped gymnasium, and retail shops on the ground level. With easy access to major city landmarks and attractions, the development offers the perfect balance of urban living and tranquility. Experience affordable luxury like never before, where every detail is designed to elevate your living experience.

title: Al Naseem Villas
description:
Discover Al Naseem Villas by Modon Properties, an exclusive residential enclave situated on the pristine shores of Hudayriyat Island in Abu Dhabi with 4, 5 & 6-bedroom villas. Boasting a collection of meticulously residences, the development offers an unparalleled blend of elegance, comfort, and sophistication. Residents are welcomed into a world of opulence, with spacious interiors, state-of-the-art amenities, and breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. Choose from two distinct facade styles – the South Californian or the Modern Contemporary – each exuding its unique charm and appeal.

Whether you're relaxing in the central courtyard, entertaining guests in the private garden, or enjoying leisure activities at the nearby country club, every moment is designed to elevate your lifestyle. Experience the pinnacle of luxury island living, where every detail is thoughtfully curated to exceed your expectations.

title: Nawayef Mansions
description:
Nawayef Mansions at Hudayriyat Island, epitomize elevated Island living at its finest with 6, 7 & 8-bedroom Mansions developed by Modon Properties in Abu Dhabi. Set within the exclusive neighborhood of Nawayef West, these luxurious residences offer commanding views of the vibrant Abu Dhabi skyline and the azure waters of the Arabian Gulf. Experience the luxury living on the Island, where every detail is meticulously crafted to provide an unparalleled lifestyle in one of Abu Dhabi's most coveted neighborhoods.

With five distinctive mansion designs to choose from, ranging from contemporary Mediterranean to timeless mid-century modern, residents can find their perfect retreat in this serene enclave. Thoughtfully designed floor plans maximize natural light and panoramic views, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living spaces. Residents can enjoy a plethora of amenities, including beach access, playgrounds, a mosque, and a club house with gym, spa, and pool. Pedestrian paths and cycle routes encourage outdoor recreation, while nearby attractions such as Marsana Beach, Marina, and Surf Abu Dhabi offer endless entertainment options.

title: Bentley Mira Villas
description:
Introducing Mira Villas designed by Bentley Home, a bespoke residential enclave nestled in Dubai's prestigious Meydan District 11 with premium 5-bedroom Villas and Mansions. This distinguished development, crafted by Mira Developments in collaboration with Bentley Home, redefines luxury living with its unparalleled blend of exquisite design, opulent furnishings, and world-class amenities.

Residents are welcomed into a world of sophistication and elegance, where every detail has been meticulously curated to evoke the timeless essence of Bentley's legendary craftsmanship. From the grandeur mansions to the refined elegance of the medium-sized villas, each residence boasts breathtaking views of Dubai's iconic skyline and the tranquil serenity of a private lagoon.

Designed to cater to the most discerning tastes, it offers three distinct interior styles – Traditional, Formal, and Contemporary – allowing residents to personalize their living spaces according to their individual preferences. Whether you prefer the classic charm of Bentley's heritage or the modern allure of its present-day identity, there is a home that perfectly encapsulates your unique lifestyle.

Step inside any villa, and you'll find yourself immersed in a world of luxury and refinement. The interiors are adorned with hand-crafted furniture, complemented by renowned brands such as Bernardaud, Baccarat, Christofle, Lalique, Frette, and Gaggenau. Every villa comes fully furnished and equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, ensuring a seamless transition into luxurious living.

Beyond the confines of their homes, residents can indulge in a wealth of world-class amenities. From the bespoke gymnasium by Technogym to the exclusive club house offering F&B services, every aspect of the community is designed to elevate the resident experience. The crystal lagoon provides a serene oasis for relaxation, while the spacious sunbathing terrace areas offer solitude and tranquility amidst lush surroundings.

title: Nawayef West Heights
description:
Nawayef West Heights by Modon Properties stands as a pinnacle of elevated Island living on the pristine shores of Hudayriyat Island in Abu Dhabi with 5, 6 & 7-bedroom villas. Boasting an exclusive enclave of large, premium villas, this development redefines luxury living with unparalleled sophistication and panoramic views.

Nestled amidst rolling hills that reach heights of up to 45 meters, it offers residents a truly unique landscape that unfolds before their eyes. From every corner of this exquisite neighbourhood, breathtaking vistas stretch across the captivating Abu Dhabi skyline and the azure waters of the Arabian Gulf, providing a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Each villa is meticulously crafted to capture uninterrupted views of the coast or city skyline. With spacious living areas, abundant natural light, and grandeur at every turn, these homes epitomize luxury living at its finest. Designed to prioritize comfort and elegance, it features graceful spaces, elegant dimensions, and seamless integration of indoor and outdoor areas. From grand living rooms to spacious private bedrooms and indulgent supercar garages with hobby rooms, every aspect of these villas exudes luxury and sophistication.

Beyond the confines of their homes, residents can enjoy an array of amenities, including beach access, playgrounds, a mosque, and a club house with gym, spa, and pool. Pedestrian paths and cycle routes encourage an active lifestyle, while the tranquil surroundings provide the perfect backdrop for relaxation and rejuvenation. The exclusive development offers not just a place to live, but offers an opportunity to indulge in island living at its finest, where every moment is imbued with elegance and sophistication.

title: Nawayef Homes
description:
Nawayef Homes at Hudayriyat Island is latest residential development by Modon Properties with premium class 3, 4 and 5-bedroom villas in Abu Dhabi. This exclusive development redefines the landscape of Abu Dhabi, offering residents a unique and unparalleled terrain to call home. Nestled amidst rolling hills reaching heights of up to 45 meters, it provides breathtaking vistas of the Abu Dhabi skyline and the azure waters of the Arabian Gulf.

The picturesque location Hudayriyat Island in Abu Dhabi presents a vibrant community offering an exquisite fusion of sports, nature, relaxation, and hospitality. With an array of world-class sports facilities, boutique retail outlets, charming cafes, and delectable restaurants, residents have everything they need for a fulfilling lifestyle right at their fingertips. The island's ambitious project unveils an impressive line-up of present and under development destinations, promising an unparalleled lifestyle for residents to activate and enjoy.

The charm of the development lies in its meticulously designed villas, each offering a distinctive living experience. With six distinct villa types ranging from elegant designed bedrooms, residents can explore a variety of architectural styles, from mid-century modern designs reminiscent of California's Palm Springs to traditional Spanish-inspired villas meticulously crafted with a modest material palette. These villas boast spacious interiors, private pools, and elevated balconies, providing residents with myriad options to appreciate the breathtaking views spanning across Abu Dhabi.

Residents are not only treated to luxurious living spaces but also have access to world-class amenities right at their doorstep. From beach access and playgrounds to a mosque and a club house with gym, spa, and pool, every aspect of the community is designed to elevate the living experience. Pedestrian paths and cycle routes encourage an active lifestyle, while the nearby Hudayriyat Island amenities, including Marsana Beach, Marina, and OCR Park, offer a diverse range of recreational activities for residents to enjoy.

With its distinctive villa designs, unparalleled amenities, and proximity to the vibrant community of Hudayriyat Island, it offers residents the opportunity to live life to the fullest.

title: Vida Residences
description:
Discover a new era of luxury living with Emaar Vida Residences at Dubai Hills Estate, the latest launch of the very first branded 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. Developed by industry leader Emaar Properties, this expansive community offers residents a lifestyle beyond compare, overlooking an 18-hole championship golf course and sprawling parklands. Nestled amidst breathtaking park views, this exclusive development offers a harmonious blend of opulence and convenience. Residents will enjoy seamless connectivity to the vibrant Dubai Hills Mall, DHE Corporate Park, Kings Hospital, and GEMS schools, ensuring a lifestyle of utmost comfort and accessibility.

With its 23 storey of sleek, modern design, the development stands as a symbol of contemporary luxury in Dubai. The exteriors reflect architectural wonder, while embracing the natural beauty of Dubai Hills Park. Inside, the residences are a canvas of light and luxury, featuring open-plan designs, warm earthy tones, and handpicked natural materials. Floor-to-ceiling windows invite ample natural light, creating an inviting atmosphere perfect for relaxation and creative expression.

The development epitomizes the essence of lifestyle elegance, where every detail is carefully curated to inspire creativity and sophistication. Residents are treated to panoramic views of the verdant expanse of Dubai Hills Park, providing a serene backdrop for everyday living. From the tranquillity of the park to the bustling avenues of the Hills Mall, every aspect of life here is about convenience and quality, making it the perfect spot for those seeking a vibrant yet serene lifestyle.

Here the amenities aren't just facilities; they are the backdrop to a dynamic lifestyle. Dive into the pools, perfect for energetic swims or relaxed lounging, reflecting the youthful spirit. The gyms cater to impromptu bursts of energy and fitness goals, while play areas offer spaces of joy and exploration for children. As dusk falls, BBQ zones and communal spaces become the heart of social life, ideal for making lasting memories with friends and family.

With its lifestyle elegance, prime location, unmatched views, and luxurious amenities, this branded residence sets itself apart as a true gem in the city's real estate landscape. Whether you're seeking a cosy retreat or a spacious family home, it invites you to experience the epitome of modern luxury and vibrant living.

title: Golf Ridges
description:
Golf Ridges at Sobha One is the newest residential development located at Sobha Hartland within Dubai offering limited edition villas at service. With a unique blend of sophistication and comfort, it redefines fine living with 54 meticulously designed villaments, offering the elegance of a luxury, convenience, and the warmth of an exclusive community.

Situated in the heart of Sobha Hartland, it stands out as the newest and most prestigious luxury estate, overlooking a world-class 18-hole pitch and putt golf course. Designed for the select few, residents enjoy a world of amenities, right outside their homes. Residents and visitors can easily reach out the famous key destinations in Dubai without facing any major issues on connectivity.

This development goes beyond being a place to live; it's an experience tailored for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Residents can wake up to the golden glow of their bedrooms as the sun rises, offering stunning views of the lush green golf course. At sunset, the sky transforms into a vibrant canvas, providing a breathtaking backdrop to the vast green horizon.

Residents are privileged with private lifts, dedicated lobby access, and parking right outside their homes. The development offers a world of amenities, including villaments, and, of course, the prestigious golf course. Whether enjoying the serene lagoon, themed courtyards, or the sky terrace with its breathtaking views, residents can relish the best of luxury living.

Indulge your senses at the F&B walkway bordering the lagoon, offering a visual feast to complement its culinary delights. Whether seeking a quick coffee at the café, an intimate setting, or a grand affair, there's something for every taste and time.

title: Park Views Residences Tower A
description:
Wasl, which previously announced the successful Hillside Residences project in 2023, has unveiled the premium residential tower Park Views Residences, Tower A. The development is being built as part of the future Park Views Residences, a mixed-use project with green spaces, residential towers and boutique retail.

Park Views Residences,Tower A will consist of 42 floors. A variety of 1-4 bedroom residences are available for purchase, ranging in size from 748 sq.ft to 2333 sq.ft. Among the property options are four-bedroom duplex residences. To learn more about the current layouts and costs of the residences, please contact the staff at Metropolitan Premium Properties.

Residents will enjoy thoughtfully designed recreational locations such as a swimming pool, gym, and functional barbecue area. Multifunctional facilities will also be at your disposal. There will be a playground for children.

In the first quarter of 2024, the developer has introduced favourable payment plans, including 5% down payment on booking and 60% payment upon completion of construction.

title: Samana Lake Views
description:
Samana Lake Views at Dubai Production City presents the epitome of luxury living with premium studios 1 & 2 bedroom apartments laced with pool, developed by renowned Samana Developers. With its premium designed residences, this development offers residents a harmonious blend of modern elegance and unparalleled convenience. The highlight is undoubtedly the private pools adorning each unit's balcony, providing residents with an exclusive retreat to relax and rejuvenate amidst the stunning backdrop of the Dubai skyline.

Beyond its exquisite residences, it boasts an impressive array of amenities designed to cater to every aspect of residents' lifestyles. From a state-of-the-art fitness center and basketball court to serene yoga studios and relaxation areas, there is something for everyone to enjoy. Additionally, concierge services, valet parking, and round-the-clock security ensure peace of mind and convenience for all residents.

Strategically located within close proximity to major highways, iconic landmarks, and world-class educational institutions, it offers residents easy access to everything Dubai has to offer. Whether you seek adventure, relaxation, or family-friendly activities, you'll find it all within the exquisite confines of this prestigious development.

title: Four Seasons Private Residences
description:
Four Seasons Private Residences at DIFC stands as a testament to refined luxury, the high-rise tower developed by H&H Development with 3, 4 & 5 bedroom residences and penthouses. Meticulously designed by renowned architects David Chipperfield, this residential masterpiece offers a lifestyle beyond compare. The 50 exclusive residences and 2 penthouses, spanning floors 2 to 22, promise a sanctuary of space, privacy, and serenity amidst the bustling cityscape. Each residence, expertly crafted by Tihany Design, exudes intimacy and bespoke craftsmanship, creating an ambiance that speaks to the soul of the destination.

Life here at DIFC exceeds the ordinary, inviting residents on an emotional journey of unparalleled luxury and curated experiences. From the moment you step into the lobby and reception lounge, a sense of warm hospitality envelops you, setting the tone for true belonging. The retail courtyard, just moments away, beckons with its charming offerings, further enhancing the feeling of homecoming. Within the residence, a world of amenities unfolds, catering to every aspect of residents' lifestyles. From the rooftop terrace and outdoor swimming pool to the fully-equipped gym and spa, every detail is meticulously curated to exceed expectations.

Beyond its luxurious amenities, it is perfectly positioned within the vibrant tapestry of DIFC, offering residents an extraordinary living experience. As a global financial hub, DIFC boasts inspiring architectural marvels and contemporary office spaces, embodying sophistication at every turn. Yet, DIFC is more than just a financial powerhouse – it is a cultural and culinary epicentre that enriches residents' daily lives. With a curated collection of boutiques, art galleries, and acclaimed restaurants, the locality ensures that every facet of life is enriched, complementing the exceptional living experience offered by these Private Residences.

The architectural vision of David Chipperfield Architects is elegantly manifested in the geometric lines of the development, gracefully intertwining with the verdant central oasis. Each corner, volume, and profile of the tower reflects a thoughtful process of design, harmonizing aspirations within the broader socio-cultural and ecological landscapes. Embracing heritage, protection, and identity, the architects place a strong emphasis of buildings, enriching the sociocultural fabric of the community.

title: Rukan Lofts Phase 3
description:
Rukan Lofts Phase 3 by Reportage Properties is a gated residential address that features 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 bedroom townhouses in Rukan Community, Dubailand. This vast development redefines the modern architecture of homes and a contemporary unparalleled lifestyle. Amidst the lush and open landscapes, residents can explore an engaging and family-focused living experience surrounded by parks, wellness, retail and many exciting entertainment hubs.

The modern and elegant exterior of every unit boasts quality materials including double-glazed windows for having an abundance of sunlight and impeccable connectivity of serene homes with lush surroundings outside. An iconic neighborhood of pools, open gardens and parks enclose every home. The neutral color palette with high-end finishing and fully-furnished rooms enhance the tranquil and restful sanctuaries.

With over 800 perfectly crafted homes, this district covers a compatible area brimming with leisure attractions, vast residences and an eco-friendly environment. In the strategic location, it resides between the Arabian Ranches 2 and Al Barari districts. The seamless connectivity of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed and Emirates Road links this home address to the famous landmarks of the surrounding. It covers Global Village, Majan, Dubai Marina and the international airport of Al Maktoum.

An extensive collection of luxury amenities and services are intertwined in this project that caters to every need and desire of inhabitants. This covers private & backyard spaces for parking, swimming pools, gyms and prayer rooms, a mosque, running tracks, a shopping center and retail stores. Above all, this place is dedicated to providing an iconic, balanced and elevated living experience.

title: Taormina Village
description:
Taormina Village at Wadi Al Safa is the latest residential epitome developed by Reportage Properties that offers 3 & 4-bedroom townhouses along with 4 & 5-bedroom villas in Dubailand. Comprising 530 meticulously designed townhouses and villas, this project sets a new standard in high-end living. Embrace the lifestyle with serene ambience of the locality offering highest international standards, lined with a series of enhancing lifestyle amenities at doorstep.

The strategic location of the development in Wadi Al Safa, Dubailand ensuring residents enjoy a distinctive and contemporary lifestyle.
