The locality fulfills all the desires of everyone with the ambience here, surrounded by parks, schools, mosque and community retails. The proximity to the most of the Dubai’s attractions, makes it an ideal choice for those seeking a well-rounded and convenient living experience.

The architectural brilliance and design excellence presents meticulously crafted residences adhere to the highest international standards of design, quality and spaces. With a commitment to quality, each unit is crafted to international standards, offering a blend of contemporary design and functionality. The emphasis on environmental sustainability in Dubailand further enhances the appeal of development, making it an ideal choice for those seeking luxury amidst a green, clean environment.

The facades are equipped with an array of features that epitomize luxury living at its best. Enjoy access to private balconies, terrace with unit-specific plans, as well as kitchens cabinets and countertops culinary experience. Double glazed windows provide energy efficiency and sound insulation, laced with central air conditioning ensuring optimal comfort.

Meanwhile, the development is not just about lavish living spaces, it offers a range of amenities and services that transform daily life into a recreational retreat. Enjoy access to multi-sport activities or engage in the leisure designed spaces, where the BBQ areas, tennis courts, and gym, enhancing the sense of community. The lush landscape areas, jogging tracks and retail outlets further enrich the living experience without going anywhere.

title: Red Square Tower
description:
Red Square Tower at JVT is a luxurious new development by Tiger Properties offering residents a world of convenience and comfort with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. This architectural masterpiece stands tall in the vibrant city space of Dubai, offering residents a testament to architectural brilliance and opulence.

Situated strategically within the well-developed community of JVT, the development enjoys a prime location. JVT is renowned for its urban attractions and essential amenities, providing an ideal and thriving lifestyle for its residents. With easy access to Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, residents can conveniently reach distant landmarks across the city, adding unparalleled convenience to their daily lives.

The exterior is a testament to the true art of design, setting a new benchmark for contemporary living and aesthetics. Gazing upon this tower is an experience in itself, as it stands proudly as an iconic structure in Dubai's skyline. This residence is not just a home; it's a statement of luxury and sophistication.

Step inside the towers, and you step into a realm of unmatched comfort and elegance. Every apartment within these twin towers is a work of art, a testament to timeless craftsmanship and creative design. The furnished apartments and studios go beyond the typical, offering first-rate features and premium materials that capture the beauty of the surroundings.

Beyond its striking appearance, the towers offer a sound investment opportunity in Dubai's ever-growing real estate market. The demand for high-quality living spaces is on the rise, making this twin tower development a compelling choice for investors seeking both capital appreciation and a luxurious lifestyle.

title: Rosalia Residences
description:
Rosalia Residences at Al Furjan stands the exquisite residential gem crafted by the renowned developer Deyaar offering 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments. This urban haven offers a perfect blend of contemporary design, luxurious amenities, and unparalleled connectivity, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a refined living experience in one of Dubai's most vibrant neighbourhoods.

The development benefits from its strategic location in the vibrant Al Furjan area, known for excellent connectivity. Situated merely a minute's walk from Discovery Garden Metro Station 2, residents enjoy seamless access to public transportation. Furthermore, being just minutes from Jebel Ali Freezone and from Dubai Marina, the development ensures convenient travel to key business and leisure hubs.

This sophisticated residential development features a G+9 building with a distinctive modern architectural design. It stands out with its high-quality construction and finishes, setting a new standard for contemporary living in Dubai. The building's thoughtful design maximizes living spaces and includes spacious balconies, allowing residents to enjoy panoramic views of the surroundings. This commitment to quality extends throughout the development, emphasizing comfort and aesthetic appeal.

The development spares no expense in ensuring residents enjoy a luxurious lifestyle. From a comprehensive fitness center to a relaxing pool and jacuzzi, every amenity is designed to enhance well-being. The sun deck offers a perfect retreat for leisure, while the kids' play zone ensures families have a space for recreation. Indoor and outdoor social areas foster a sense of community, creating opportunities for private and shared engagements.

title: Samana Manhattan 2
description:
Discover Samana Manhattan 2 at JVC, a luxurious residential development that offers studios, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with a pool in the heart of Dubai. Following the success series of the initial launch by Samana Developers, this project redefines modern living and offers a second chance for those seeking upscale living with a unique blend of comfort, convenience and sophistication.

Strategically located in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) alongside Sheikh Zayed Road, this development offers easy access to Dubai's major destinations, including schools, malls, and entertainment hubs. Whether it's a quick drive to Kids World Nursery or a leisurely visit to the Dubai Marina, you're always well-connected.

title: Samana Barari Views 2
description:
Samana Barari Views 2 is the second residential series by Samana Developers, redefines modern living in Dubailand. This residential masterpiece offers a spectrum of opulent units, ranging from chic designed apartments, embodying the essence of contemporary design and functionality.

Strategically positioned in Dubailand, the development ensures seamless access to key areas in Dubai, presenting a unique blend of urban convenience and tranquil living. The architectural marvel emphasizes both aesthetics and practicality, promising residents an unparalleled living experience.

Key Highlights:
Integration of the latest smart home features for enhanced daily living
Strategic location in Dubailand, ensuring easy access to key areas in Dubai
Proximity to attractions like IMG Worlds of Adventure, Dubai Autodrome, and Global Village
Contemporary architectural design for an aesthetically pleasing environment
Comprehensive amenities, including a swimming pool and outdoor gym, promoting an active and social lifestyle
Emphasis on residents' safety with 24x7 security, parking, surveillance, and firefighting systems.

title: Marquis Insignia
description:
Marquis Insignia at Arjan stands as a testament to unparalleled luxury and opulence with 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, developed by Marquis. The architectural presents the captivating fusion of regal allure and contemporary designs, offering an epitome of lavish comfort. The development is a masterpiece, reflecting a commitment to harmonize privacy and community, elevating the standard of luxury living in Dubai's ever-changing real estate landscape.

Strategically located in Arjan, it offers easy access to major highways, providing residents with convenience, accessibility, and proximity to key amenities and attractions. Arjan's vibrant and expanding district sets the stage for a breathtaking experience, away from the hectic pace of urban living, yet minutes away from Dubai's entertainment, shopping, and business hubs.

Each unit layout is meticulously crafted, with its harmonious blend of luminous hues to epitomizing luxurious functionality. The apartments, set in a timeless setting, boast abundant living spaces with panoramic views and are adorned with exquisite fittings, from designer faucets to resplendent doors, ensuring a flawless amalgamation of style and artistry.

title: Avenue Residence 6
description:
The epitome of luxury living starts with the launch of Avenue Residence 6 at Al Furjan, a residential development with 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments by Nabni Developments. This luxurious residential masterpiece, nestled steps away from the Discovery Gardens Metro Station, presents an unparalleled living experience. With a limited collection of 96 unique residences, it caters to individuals with a discerning eye for the extraordinary.

This 12-storey luxury building stands proudly at the heart of Al Furjan, featuring a contemporary classic design that seamlessly merges with urban sophistication. The project ensures a secure and luxurious lifestyle with G + 1 podium parking, 10 residential floors, and 24/7 security. Residents can indulge in daily experiences marked by bespoke hospitality, fine dining, and unique residences.

The interiors are a testament to refined living, with Italian manufactured brands, floor-to-ceiling 3.2-meter and double-height reception areas, and built-in Siemens kitchen appliances. The inclusion of branded Tooy chandeliers, golden finish accessories, and smart home automation further elevate the sense of sophistication.

title: Rehan Residences
description:
Rehan Residences at Maryam Island is a new development by Eagle Hills offering an unparalleled living experience with studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments in Sharjah. This G+P+9 storey building, hosting a total of 162 units, redefines contemporary living with its masterful blend of modernity and elegance.

Positioned as a beachfront destination in Sharjah, it offers not only a coastal lifestyle but also strategic proximity to key locations. A mere minute away from Dubai International Airport and the iconic Burj Khalifa, it provides residents with easy access to both leisure and business hubs.

The façade is more than just a residential structure; it's a modern sanctuary meticulously crafted with attention to detail. Adjacent to a diverse array of retail establishments on Maryam Island, including a beach, waterfront promenade, and community park, this residence seamlessly integrates into the island's luxurious master plan.

Complemented by the outstanding amenities available on the Island. With a location close to the scenic beach and park, residents can relish a coastal lifestyle. The 4000 square meter community park features walking and jogging trails, a basketball court, a children’s playground, and ample greenery. An 800-meter seaside promenade nearby provides a diverse range of cafés and dining establishments.

This elegant class venture distinguishes itself with its exceptional facilities, including a private swimming pool for relaxation, a fully equipped gym for fitness enthusiasts, and podium landscapes adorned with lush greenery, creating a serene environment. The adult pool, gymnasium, and green spaces contribute to a holistic living experience.

title: Verdana Phase 3
description:
Verdana Townhouses Phase 3 at DIP is the latest residential series by Reportage Properties featuring limited entries of 2, 3, 4 & 5-bedroom luxury townhouses. This beautifully designed new phase introduces a limited collection of 131 meticulously designed residential facades, offering a harmonious blend of comfort and sophistication.

Located in the Dubai Investments Park (DIP) within Dubai offers a prime address surrounded by leisure areas of attractions, parks and community retails. The community is envisioned as one of the region's most environmentally friendly developments, aligns seamlessly with this vision. Extensive landscaping and eco-friendly policies underscore the commitment to a green, clean environment.

The townhouses boast an array of features designed to enhance comfort and style. Private balconies and terraces offer scenic views, while kitchen cabinets and countertops showcase modern aesthetics. Fully tiled bathrooms, air conditioning, and double-glazed windows add to the overall appeal. Built-in wardrobes, some with private bathrooms, reflect thoughtful design, while select townhouses boast additional features like a double-height living room, sky roof, and internal elevators.

The exclusive class development sets itself apart with a range of amenities that elevate the living experience. Each unit comes with private parking, providing convenience and security. Residents can indulge in relaxation at the large swimming pool or let their children splash in the dedicated kids' pool. The well-equipped gymnasium caters to fitness enthusiasts, while the clubhouse offers a social space for gatherings. Shaded seating areas and landscaped zones create inviting spaces for leisure and community interaction.

The lifestyle here encapsulates the essence of a luxury in every move, providing residents with not just a home but an exclusive haven. The project stands as a testament to meticulous planning, impeccable design, and a commitment to environmental sustainability.

title: Aveline Residences
description:
Aveline Residences by Citi Developers is a stunning project with exclusive studios, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments at Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai. Boasting an iconic G + 20 structure with three podium levels, the exclusive development offers 263 meticulously designed apartments at ease. The living spaces are adorned with high-quality finishes, showcasing a devotion to design excellence. Clean lines define the architectural ethos, creating an atmosphere of understated elegance.

Designed to foster connections, celebrate diversity, and embrace sustainability, the development is more than just a living space; it's an exceptional residential experience. The project features a harmonious blend of indoor and outdoor areas, providing residents with a luxurious connection to nature right outside their doorstep.

title: Vincitore Aqua Dimore Phase 2
description:
Discover a world of unparalleled luxury at Vincitore Aqua Dimore Phase 2, a prestigious project by Vincitore Development with premium class apartments nestled in the heart of Dubai Science Park (DSP). Offering a splendid array of options, with private pools, this development redefines opulent living. Beyond being a residence, it's an invitation to experience life in a private oasis, where contemporary design meets the tranquility of nature.

Strategically located in Dubai Science Park (DSP), the development ensures excellent connectivity to business hubs, shopping destinations, educational institutions, medical facilities, and leisure options. Immerse yourself in a lifestyle that transcends ordinary living, with residences reflecting Elite Victorian era design and craftsmanship, harmonizing opulence and heritage seamlessly.

A standout feature is the comprehensive list of lifestyle amenities spread across a dedicated leisure design area. Enjoy the indoor-outdoor sky pool, aqua fitness and gym, and classic Italian architecture are just a glimpse of the luxuries that await. The project's holistic approach to experiential living creates a haven high above others, allowing residents to escape, rejuvenate, and connect with themselves.

title: Reportage Plaza 2
description:
Plaza 2 by Reportage Properties is the latest residential development at Masdar City with luxury studios, 1, 2 & 4-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom townhouses in Abu Dhabi. These luxury-rated residential complexes, spanning over 31,205 sq. ft., seamlessly blends contemporary design with opulence, creating a harmonious eco-friendly community where nature meets technology.

Strategically positioned in Masdar City, Abu Dhabi connects seamlessly to main roads and is surrounded by essential amenities. Parks, schools, mosques, banks, and community retails are all within walking distance, offering residents a convenient and vibrant lifestyle. The square-shaped complex embraces serene views of greenery and turquoise swimming pools, providing a living experience that balances sunlight and tranquility.

Every inch of the development is a statement of class and modernity. The residences are designed to meet various needs and tastes, boasting high-quality finishes and a neutral color palette. Kitchens feature cabinets and scratch-free countertops, while bathrooms, whether en-suites or guest, are fully tiled with bathtubs and showers. With attention to detail, the development ensures functionality and refined taste in every corner of its living spaces.

Boasting a total of 98 units across a range of configurations. From 15 stylish studio apartments to 12 spacious four-bedroom townhouses, the complex caters to diverse living preferences. The architecture is a pure manifestation of modern Arabian themes, with facades adorned by a soft touch of Arabesque patterns. By achieving sustainability through dedicated solar panels and renewable energy sources, reflecting Masdar City's commitment to a greener future.

The façade elevates the resident experience with a range of amenities and services. From a swimming pool and kids' swimming pool to a BBQ area and gymnasium, the development caters to diverse recreational needs. The presence of ample covered parking spaces, two large lifts, and a double-height lobby adds to the convenience and accessibility.

title: Nesba 2
description:
Nesba 2 at Aljada is the premium second series residential development by Arada Developer that features luxury design 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments in Sharjah. Nestled within the vibrant Aljada community, it presents a diverse selection of meticulously crafted apartments, boasting smart home features and premium European appliances, each residence promises both comfort and convenience.

Situated in the heart of Sharjah's burgeoning urban landscape, Aljada emerges as a dynamic hub where residents can access an unparalleled array of amenities, entertainment options, and cultural experiences. Designed to foster a harmonious balance between work, leisure, and family life, Aljada epitomizes contemporary urban living with its innovative masterplan inspired by the city's rich heritage districts.

Within the community, residents are invited to immerse themselves in a thriving community where every convenience is within reach. From lush green parks to world-class dining establishments, the development caters to diverse interests and preferences. The crowning jewel of Aljada is Madar, envisioned by Zaha Hadid Architects, which stands as the UAE's fastest-growing family entertainment destination, captivating visitors with its eclectic mix of attractions and activities.

Embracing a holistic approach to wellness, residents enjoy direct access to a comprehensive range of sporting and recreational facilities. Whether indulging in a game of football on the main sports complex's full-size pitch or exploring the vibrant East Boulevard's shopping and dining offerings, residents are empowered to lead active and fulfilling lifestyles. Additionally, an exclusive residents' gym and swimming pool further enhance the community's well-being quotient, providing avenues for relaxation and rejuvenation.

Sustainability lies at the heart of its design ethos, with eco-friendly practices and features seamlessly integrated throughout the development. From energy-efficient systems to thoughtfully landscaped green spaces, the development prioritizes promoting a greener, more sustainable way of life. Each aspect of the development is meticulously curated to minimize environmental impact and enhance overall quality of life for residents.

title: Ramhan Island Villas Phase 2
description: Discover luxury living at its finest on Ramhan Island Villas Phase 2 in Abu Dhabi, a prestigious development by Eagle Hills with premium 3 to 7-bedroom villas. Nestled on the pristine shores of the Island, this exclusive community offers a range of standalone villas with private beaches, boasting natural beauty of the Island. Indulge in an epic lifestyle where modernity meets nature, with exceptional wellness spaces, fine dining options, and luxurious amenities.

title: Reportage Marlin
description:
Marlin at Al Reem Island is the newest residential development by Reportage Properties that features 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 3 & 4-bedroom penthouses within Abu Dhabi. Nestled within this picturesque setting, the twin tower development houses 18 floors of residential living spaces with amenities podium areas and lower ground levels with refined services and iconic life spaces. Whether you seek serene landscapes, breathtaking views, or modern amenities, the façade offers everything available at your doorstep.

Located on Al Reem Island, the residential façade enjoys close proximity to Abu Dhabi's most notable attractions, including the Louvre complex, Al Reem Mall, and The Galleria Maryah Island. With three bridges connecting the island to Downtown Abu Dhabi, residents benefit from easy access to the city center, financial district, and major roadways. Whether shopping at world-class malls, dining at fine restaurants, or seeking top-notch healthcare at Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi, everything residents need is just moments away.

Each residence is meticulously designed to the highest standards, boasting elegant interiors and seamless connections between indoor and outdoor spaces. Floor-to-ceiling windows flood the interiors with natural light, inviting residents to bask in the serene waterfront experience right from the comfort of their homes. Whether enjoying the private balconies or terraces, residents can relish in the breathtaking beauty of the surroundings, creating a tranquil retreat amidst the bustling city life.

The design philosophy revolves around creating a harmonious blend of modern aesthetics and eco-friendly features. From the sleek kitchen cabinets to the fully tiled bathrooms, every detail exudes sophistication and functionality. With central air conditioning, built-in wardrobes, and en-suite bedrooms, each unit is thoughtfully crafted to cater to the discerning tastes of its residents, ensuring the utmost comfort and convenience at every turn.

Beyond the residences, it offers an array of exceptional amenities and services, including a large swimming pool, kids' swimming pool, gymnasium, and children's play areas. Shaded seating areas provide the perfect spot for relaxation, while ample private parking ensures convenience for residents and their guests. Whether unwinding by the poolside or staying active in the state-of-the-art gym,

title: Ocean Point
description:
Ocean Point at Rashid Yachts & Marina is an eagerly anticipated development by Emaar Properties, ready to redefine luxury living with premium apartments. Nestled within the prestigious waterfront of Rashid Yachts & Marina, its architectural design symbolizes sophistication and seamlessly blends urban charm with natural beauty.

With panoramic views of lush greenery, shimmering waters, the iconic Burj Khalifa, and the Arabian Sea, residents are promised an unmatched living experience. Conveniently located near key landmarks such as Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai International Airport, Downtown Dubai, and the Dubai Mall/Burj Khalifa, Ocean Point offers easy access to iconic destinations.

Residents will enjoy coastal luxury living with warm weather, sandy beaches, and a cosmopolitan lifestyle. The project is complemented by Rashid Yachts & Marina, providing discerning yacht owners with modern waterfront architecture and a floating yacht club.

title: Kaya
description:
Nshama Kaya at Town Square Dubai is the latest residential development standing as a testament to modern urban living with premium 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments at service. This visionary façade promises a transformative experience for its residents. Boasting contemporary apartments, meticulously designed amenities, and an unparalleled location, it redefines the essence of community living in Dubai.

At the heart of Town Square Dubai, the community beckons with its promise of a vibrant lifestyle intertwined with serene green spaces. With 154,000 square meters of meticulously manicured parks and 16 community gardens, residents are greeted with an oasis of tranquility amidst the urban landscape. Whether it's jogging along scenic trails, enjoying a leisurely cycle ride, or simply relishing a moment of repose in one of the cafes, it offers an all-encompassing living experience where every need is catered to within arm's reach.

The architectural marvel seamlessly blends into the fabric of Town Square Dubai, adding a touch of elegance to its surroundings. The graceful curves of the buildings harmonize with the lush greenery, creating a visual spectacle that captivates residents and visitors alike. Step inside, and you'll be greeted by interiors that exude sophistication and practicality in equal measure. Glazed porcelain floors, built-in wardrobes, and fitted kitchens combine to create spaces that are not just aesthetically pleasing but also highly functional, ensuring that every corner of your home is a sanctuary of comfort and style.

The amenities further elevate the living experience, offering residents a host of leisure options right at their doorstep. From a landscaped courtyard with a swimming pool and spacious deck to dedicated play areas for children, every aspect of life is designed to cater to the diverse needs of its residents. Whether you're seeking a refreshing dip in the pool, a friendly game of basketball, or simply a quiet moment of relaxation, you'll find it all within the confines of this exceptional residential development.

title: The Lana Dorchester Collection
description:
The Lana Residences Dorchester Collection by Omniyat stand as a beacon of luxury with limited 2 to-5-bedroom apartments, duplexes and penthouses in the heart of Dubai's Marasi Bay. With only 39 exquisite residences, managed exclusively by Dorchester Brand. Designed by the renowned Foster + Partners and Gilles & Boissier, this waterfront development epitomizes elegance and sophistication. The 32-storey tower offers a range of exclusive units, each boasting gracious proportions, private terraces, and floor-to-ceiling windows that overlook the mesmerizing cityscape of Dubai.

Nestled amidst the gleaming skyscrapers of Business Bay and beside the tranquil waters of Dubai Canal, it offers residents the best seat in the house. Residents enjoy leisurely strolls along the waterfront and breathtaking views of Dubai's iconic landmarks, including the Burj Khalifa. Days here unfold effortlessly with leisurely strolls along the waterfront, while nights are filled with the vibrant energy of the city.

The collection is not just a place to reside; it's a statement of opulence and refinement. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to provide residents with an unparalleled living experience. From the iconic architecture to the captivating vistas, every aspect of this prestigious address exudes luxury and exclusivity.

As a Dorchester Collection property, it epitomizes the legacy of exceptional service and quality. The rooms and suites, designed by Gilles & Boissier, blend traditional and contemporary elements inspired by the spirit of Dubai. Whether it's the Marina Royal Suite or the Marina Sky Room, each residence offers breathtaking views, private balconies, and luxurious amenities, ensuring a stay of incomparable delight.

The development boasts a range of amenities designed for the discerning few. From an outdoor pool overlooking the Downtown skyline to a fully equipped gym with yoga studios, residents have access to luxury living and leisure at their fingertips. Additionally, The Lana Hotel, adjacent to the residences, offers guests a unique taste of life in Dubai, along with a selection of restaurants, bars, and luxury facilities.

title: Equiti Home
description:
Equiti Home at Al Furjan is a masterpiece of contemporary living crafted by BNH Developers offering luxury class 1 to 3-bedroom apartments, duplexes and 4-bed penthouses in Dubai. At the heart of the development lies a distinctive architectural marvel, boasting a structure that seamlessly blends luxury with functionality. With its Ground + 2 Podium + 10 Floors + Roof layout, the development offers a total of 10,000 square meters of podium area, providing residents with a plethora of engaging activities.

Strategically positioned in the bustling Al Furjan area, it offers unparalleled connectivity. Just a stone's throw away from Metro Station, residents benefit from effortless access to public transportation, facilitating seamless travel across the city. Additionally, its proximity to key business hubs such as Jebel Ali Freezone and leisure destinations like Dubai Marina ensures a perfect balance between work and play.

Beyond its prime location, the façade offers a wealth of amenities designed to enrich the lives of its residents. From a state-of-the-art co-working space to recreational facilities like basketball and table tennis areas, every aspect of modern living is catered to its residents. The swimming pool, gym, and kids play area provide avenues for relaxation and fitness, while the running track and Padel area cater to those with active lifestyles.

Embracing the concept of holistic living, the beautifully designed development incorporates dedicated spaces such as the zen zone and pet zone, offering residents moments of tranquility and opportunities to bond with their furry companions. Moreover, retail outlets within the development ensure that daily essentials and indulgences are always within reach, adding to the convenience and comfort of residents' lives.

title: Empire Suites
description:
Empire Suites at JVC is a branded hotel development by Peace Homes Group that presents luxury design studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments and duplexes in Dubai. This premier residential enclave redefines the very essence of luxury living, offering an unparalleled fusion of sophistication, comfort, and convenience. From its meticulously curated interiors to its array of world-class amenities, it sets a new standard for contemporary urban living in Dubai.

Step into your sanctuary at Jumeirah Village Circle, where Italian finishes and custom marble fittings by Versace Ceramics adorn every corner, creating an ambiance of timeless grandeur. The exceptionally fitted kitchens boasting German appliances cater to the discerning chef in you, ensuring both functionality and style seamlessly blend together.

What sets this apart is its commitment to offering more than just a living space - it provides a lifestyle. Every unit comes complete with an ensuite private swimming pool and cinema, elevating the concept of in-home entertainment to unprecedented heights. Whether unwinding by the poolside or hosting a movie night under the stars, residents can indulge in luxury without ever leaving the comfort of their own home.

As if the lavish interiors weren't enough, the development offers its residents with an array of world-class amenities designed to cater to every whim and fancy. From the magnificent lobby and reception area to the state-of-the-art gymnasium and Olympic-sized adults swimming pool, every aspect is crafted to evoke a sense of awe and wonder. For families, the separate and secure kid's pool, enchanting kids' play area, and lush green spaces offer ample opportunities for recreation and relaxation.

Beyond the confines of your apartment lies a vibrant community waiting to be explored. The façade enjoys a premium location with easy access to schools, medical facilities, malls, and an array of shops and restaurants, ensuring residents never have to venture far for their daily needs.

title: Meydan Horizon
description:
Meydan Horizon developed by the esteemed Meydan Group, emerges as a beacon of modern living lined with premium residential plots within Dubai's dynamic landscape. Spanning an impressive 21.5 million square feet, this mixed-use development promises a vibrant and layered lifestyle experience.

Nestled opposite the iconic Meydan racecourse, its prime location offers unparalleled connectivity to key destinations via the Dubai-Al Ain and Ras Al Khor highways. Strategically located near Downtown Dubai and the Dubai International Airport, it enjoys seamless connectivity via major highways and upcoming metro lines. Residents have effortless access to a plethora of cultural, entertainment, and business destinations, ensuring that every day is filled with endless possibilities and discoveries.

At the core lies its meticulous design that effortlessly blends into the natural surroundings. Lush landscaping, four crystalline lagoons, and panoramic views of the Ras al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary form the backdrop of this captivating development. Whether relaxing amidst turquoise waters or indulging in bespoke amenities, residents are enveloped in an ambience of tranquillity and sophistication that defines the essence.

Comprising commercial, residential, retail, and recreational spaces, it is a testament to refined living. Every aspect of this integrated community is thoughtfully curated to cater to the needs of modern families, offering a myriad of leisure opportunities amidst verdant greenery and azure waters. From vibrant retail hubs to tranquil parks, it embodies the perfect balance between urban convenience and natural splendor.

The development's commitment to sustainability and wellness further enhances its allure, drawing inspiration from the adjacent Ras al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary. From green lawns to winding pedestrian paths, every aspect of the development is designed to promote a healthy and active lifestyle for residents of all ages. With dedicated parks for children and teenagers, as well as serene contemplative spaces, the luxury development fosters a sense of community and well-being that transcends the ordinary.

title: Burj Binghatti Phase 2
description: Burj Binghatti Phase 2 is the next masterpiece crafted by Binghatti Developers and Jacob & Co. an architectural marvel with luxury apartments and penthouses in Business Bay, Dubai. At the pinnacle of the tower sits a diamond-shaped crown, designed by Jacob & Co., adding a touch of royalty to the Dubai skyline. The partnership ensures meticulous attention to detail and elegant design subtleties throughout the tower, making it a standout landmark in Dubai's ever-growing landscape.

title: Beverly Gardens
description:
Taste the upscale lifestyle at the Beverly Gardens at Discovery Gardens, Dubai by AA HMB Developments with chic-styled studios, 1, & 2 bedroom apartments. Explore the divinely established environment where residents can witness the serenity and modern pace of the suburban district. Discover the soothing retreat in this state-of-the-art complex that enhances extreme comfort, privacy, convenience and elegant sophistication.

Every sanctuary boasts a mesmerizing and fulfilling lifestyle showcasing spectacular living spaces with floor-to-ceiling windows adorned with warm and captivating sun-lit interiors. This mid-rise complex encapsulates a few of the spacious units with a personal pool. The neutral colour palette and international standard of exquisite materials ensure beautifully-looking aesthetics.

Key Highlights:
Choose from an elegant spacious series of studios, 1, & 2 bedroom apartments
A few studios and 2 bedroom units with a private pool
Proximity to the Metro Station, Ibn Battuta Mall, & Sheikh Zayed Road
Prestigious and international standard of facilities and services

title: Binghatti Phoenix
description:
A brand-new residential gemstone of Binghatti Phoenix at JVC, Dubai combines an exquisite series of studios, 1, & 2 bedroom apartments by Binghatti Properties. This rising masterpiece exudes extravagant infrastructure where meticulously crafted lines separate the balconies. The minimalistic and finest standard of the materials presents a captivating façade. Explore an all-inclusive lifestyle where required facilities impeccably blend with luxurious and comfortable homes.

By one of the renowned developers, this mid-rise complex features a basement, a ground, a podium, 8 floors and a rooftop level with residential and retail areas. This beacon encapsulates around 434 home units and 30 shops with a diverse range of amenities and environment-friendly surroundings. It is a thoughtfully planned project with a seamless combination of endless elegant aesthetics with modern & sophisticated innovation.

Find your heaven-like sanctuaries where privacy, comfort and serenity thrive altogether. The neutral colour palette, spacious ceilings, and wide windows with fully-furnished home interiors ensure sun-lit rooms with access to the views of open landscapes. Indulge in the active and wellness-focused environment available within the complex. Keep yourself fit and enthusiastic at the gym, play area, yoga spaces, a vast garden, golf putting and many others.

Positioned in the strategic destination, this project is next to the Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road. Have the advantage of easy & instant access to the various essential hubs to sustain an elevated life in this fastest-growing and safest community. It covers many common parks, open spaces, sports courts, medical facilities, educational centres, restaurants, a Mall, & many more.

title: Sky Living
description:
The Sky Living at JVC, Dubai exudes a grandeur collection of excellent studios, 1, & 2 bedroom apartments and 2 & 3 bedroom duplexes by Peace Homes Development. Immerse in the thoughtfully planned abodes that encourage an inspiringly balanced lifestyle. Upscale your living standard in this redefined urban jewel where you can find exquisitely crafted detailing, innovative sophistication, and comfortable spaces.

Explore the ever-lasting essence of a luxurious lifestyle with the advantage of accessing an active, engaging, and wholesome lifestyle. This complex adorned the skyline with 19 residential floors, while ground and 4 podiums are the additional spaces with a diverse range of facilities. There are only a limited collection of residences with private Jacuzzi.

Taste the endless enthusiasm every day at the leisure and extraordinary choices of residents’ amenities and common areas. A large infinity pool, a well-equipped gym, a sauna-steam, & kid’s play area are some features dedicated to the inhabitants. Experience the serene privacy and modern convenience within the semi-furnished smart homes.

title: Lakeshore at The Sanctuary
description:
Redefining opulence and elegance, The Sanctuary comes as the first master community by one of the leading developers in Dubai; Ellington Properties. The project will be nestled in District 11 of the prestigious MBR City, which houses plenty of natural areas with luscious greenery. The first cluster of The Sanctuary will be called The Waterside and features just 17 exquisitely crafted villas with direct access to a breathtaking crystal lagoon. These will come in the following 4 types: The Retreat, The Hideaway, The Escape and The Oasis.

There are 4–6 bedroom configurations available, with total living areas ranging from 7,844 sq. ft to 14,606 sq. ft, whilst the plot sizes vary between 5,726 sq. ft and 14,384 sq. ft. To personalize your residence, you can select from 2 distinctive design schemes. It is worth noting that 4 and 5-bedroom villas will comprise 3 floors, whereas 6-bedroom properties will feature 4 levels. Select layouts will feature a multi-purpose room that can be converted into an additional bedroom/fitness studio.

The second cluster, released in August 2023, is called The Lakeshore and features 38 residences with 4 or 5 bedrooms. The villas consist of 3 floors, with a swimming pool, an elevator, a patio and a garden. The residences come in 2 types: The Cascade Villas and The Garden Villas.

Evoking a sense of harmony, each unit will feature open living and dining areas built around a stunning open sky courtyard. That said, the courtyards will be inspired by Japanese Zen Gardens with stones, gravel and a central tree as a symbol of simplicity and serenity. At the same time, innovative technologies for temperature control, such as AC, water heaters and building materials that control the heat transition, will make living in The Sanctuary villa even more comfortable. The large sliding floor-to-ceiling windows will also provide a seamless transition between indoors and outdoors and offer unparalleled views of the surroundings.

In line with the Dubai Green Building Regulations, each home in The Sanctuary will be cooled with low-noise efficient FCUs, while condensate will be reused to irrigate the outside gardens. Not forgetting parking for electric cars, recycled materials, energy efficient lighting and water-saving sanitaryware, which will represent the best sustainability practises.

title: The Beach Collection Villas
description:
Exuding the utmost luxury, The Beach Collection is a meticulously crafted villa project by Nakheel Properties on Palm Jebel Ali. The developer is particularly famous for creating the iconic Palm Jumeirah. You have the opportunity to acquire any one of the ultra-opulent 5-6 bedroom villas which come in 8 distinctive styles: Tropical Mist, Sapphire, Provence, Mediterranean, Indigo Ocean, Blue Horizon, Azure Blue, Aquamarine.

The property sizes range from 7,319 sq. ft to 8,439 sq. ft. Each residence features 3 floors, across which a number of premium in-house amenities will span. Among them are a maid’s room, a driver’s room, a study, a panoramic swimming pool, terraces, a 2-car garage, a rooftop lounge and more. The residences will be framed by azure waters and lush greenery, enabling you to enjoy one-on-one time with nature.

A number of international and regional architectural companies will work on the design of the villas, which will be done in a way so as to reflect the stunning natural surroundings. The floor-to-ceiling windows will overlook pristine white private beaches that residences will have direct access to. The palette of the interiors will be light and soft, with shades of beige, grey, emerald, milk and graphite. For the utmost sophistication, the high-end finishes will have touches of wood, gold, marble and brass.

title: Mallside Residences
description:
Mallside Residence is a premium branded project by Royal Development Company, launched in November 2023, in Dubai Hills Estate. It will be connected to the Hilton brand, a leading global hospitality company.

The complex features 144 residential units, among which are studios and 1-3 bedroom apartments. The properties will spread across 18 floors. The size of the units ranges from 400 sq. ft to 1,800 sq. ft. Depending on your preference, you can choose an apartment that is furnished or unfurnished.

There will be a 105-key Hilton hotel on the first 5 or 6 floors of the project. Thanks to this, occupants of the residences will be able to take advantage of all the signature hotel amenities and branded a la carte services.

There will be an array of world-class amenities, including:

Separate pools for adults and children
Gym
Signature spa
Bar and lounge area
Infinity swimming pool
Rooftop restaurant, bar and lounge
Mallside Residence will be connected to Dubai Hills Mall. In addition to the 600+ outlets, the shopping centre houses a hypermarket, a cineplex and four major family entertainment venues. The world’s fastest vertical indoor roller coaster is also located here.

title: Shamsa Townhouses
description:
Shamsa Townhouses is an upscale residential development by Expo Dubai Group in Expo Valley, Expo City Dubai. It features a collection of 3-4 bedroom townhouses with a living area of 2,655 sq. ft to 3,284 sq. ft. The residences will have an open kitchen with an island feature, several balconies, a maid’s room and 2 parking spaces. Not forgetting walk-in closets in the master bedrooms and built-in wardrobes in other bedrooms.

In November 2023, the master developer launched the second phase of the project. Similar to the first edition, this release has 3-4 bedroom townhouses. The total size of each residence is either 2,700 sq. ft or 3,300 sq. ft.

Occupants of Shamsa Townhouses will be provided with full access to the countless amenities of Expo City Valley. These include:

Swimming pools
Splash pads
3 clubhouses
Spa and sauna
Health and beauty salon
Outdoor cinema
Farmers’ markets
Gyms
Yoga studio
Skate park
Pedestrian walkways and cycling tracks
Picnic areas

title: Eden Hills
description:
Eden Hills is a boutique community by H&H Development in the prestigious MBR City. Now you have the opportunity to buy one of the land plots to build a villa on. The total plot size measures from 12,917 sq. ft to 25,923 sq. ft. Please note that the next phase of the project will feature villas as well.

The nature-inspired community will comprise of the following clusters:

Country Woodlands – for those who love a rural environment, with parks, leafy green spaces, and farm-style buildings.
Agrarian Ranch – for farmers, with agricultural land plots, orchards, manicured lawns and walking paths.
Shady Canyon – for those who love outdoor activities, with natural canyons and gullies, bike paths and hiking trails.

Occupants will have privileged access to amenities within all of the 3 clusters, such as:

Terraced walls
Wadis
Ponds
Equipped cycling trails
Picnic pavilion
Designated pet area
Linear park

title: The Rings
description:
The Rings by PMR is an exquisite addition by PMR Property to the breathtaking Dubai Water Canal in Jumeirah. The luxurious complex has two stunning low-rise buildings, with just 12 opulent units. Crafted by the renowned firm Foster + Partners, known for their exceptional designs worldwide, The Rings promises to be an architectural masterpiece.

Adding a touch of Emirati artistry to this already remarkable development is Mattar Bin Lahej, the talented artist behind the iconic calligraphy of the Museum of the Future. His unique creations will adorn the walls of this exceptional project, elevating it to a whole new level of grandeur.


There are eight 5-6 bedroom duplex Sky Mansions and four 6-7 bedroom triplex Sky Palaces. The meticulously designed properties measure a spacious 9,500 sq. ft to an even more generous 19,800 sq. ft.

The Rings by PMR offers more than just a collection of ultra-lux homes; it provides an unparalleled living experience. Residents will enjoy the exclusivity of their own elevators, air-conditioned garages, cinemas, swimming pools, gardens, maid’s and driver’s quarters and gyms. Not forgetting private terraces and outdoor grilling stations. From the comfort of your property you will enjoy 180-degree views of Dubai Water Canal, Burj Al Arab, Safa Park, the Dubai skyline and the Burj Khalifa.

The residences are thoughtfully adorned with high-quality fittings from renowned brands such as OBEGI, Antoniolupi, Gaggenau, Poliform, and Rimadesio, ensuring the utmost in comfort and style. Thanks to a full ceiling height of 11 ft and double height living areas of 26 ft, the properties feel even more spacious and airy.

title: Altissima
description:
Set amidst leafy natural landscapes, Altissima by Al Barari Dubai is the final phase of the prestigious Al Barari neighbourhood. The luxury project features a limited collection of only 23 exquisite 7-bedroom villas.
 
The properties have 4 floors, with a total colossal area of 27,199 sq. ft. The plot sizes range from 18,000 sq. ft to 20,000 sq. ft. Residents will appreciate multiple in-house amenities, including a private swimming pool, a gym, a home cinema, a BBQ area, a pool house with its own kitchen and a bar, sunken seating and an Altissima planter.

In addition to those, the lavish villas are complemented with a lift, a car wash, a nanny’s room, a driver’s room, a maid’s room, a rooftop lounge, an office, and a gym. For the ultimate relaxation experiences, you will have a spa and a home cinema at your disposal.

title: Trussardi Residences
description:
Trussardi Residences crafted by Mira Developments, represent the epitome of luxury living with 1 & 2 bedroom apartments with pool in the vibrant heart of Al Furjan, Dubai. This 11-storey tower seamlessly blends classical Italian aesthetics with Dubai's modernity, creating an architectural masterpiece. These Trussardi-branded residences offer an exclusive experience with fully furnished interiors featuring special pieces from the Trussardi Casa collection.

With ceiling heights soaring to 3.4 meters, these apartments exude elegance. Residents enjoy a 3-year maintenance warranty, ensuring peace of mind. Enjoy a range of premium amenities, including a 26-meter infinity pool, a rooftop garden, gymnasiums, and indoor and outdoor children's playgrounds. The location is in close proximity to the Discovery Gardens metro station, providing convenient connectivity.

title: Address Residences Zabeel
description:
Address Residences Zabeel by Emaar Properties lets you discover the latest luxury and sophistication in the heart of Dubai's financial hub with premium 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom penthouses. This iconic four tower high-rise development combines the allure of skyline living with urban excellence, embodying the renowned Address Brand style.

Nestled in the tranquil Zabeel District, this residential complex combines urban vibrancy with serene landscapes, providing residents with a haven of tranquility and luxury. The Zabeel area, known for its lush greenery and elegant villas, slows down the city's rhythm, creating a perfect setting for those seeking a more relaxed lifestyle.

This address complex encompasses four towers, each designed to offer an extraordinary living experience. Tower 1, soaring at 198.85 meters with 50 floors, provides a sanctuary in the sky, offering breathtaking views of the cityscape, including the iconic Burj Khalifa, Dubai Creek, and the modern marvel of the Dubai Frame. Tower 2, the tallest among them at 232.85 meters with 58 floors, elevates the living experience to new heights, providing residents with limitless possibilities and stunning panoramic views.

In Tower 3, a 205.35-meter-tall emblem of modern luxury, residents can enjoy a contemporary yet comfortable lifestyle with sweeping views of Dubai's urban landscape, from gleaming towers to lush green parks. Tower 4, rising majestically to 214.35 meters with 54 floors, is positioned on a prime corner of the site, making it a lifestyle statement and a symbol of luxury living visible to all who pass by.

The penthouses at the top of these majestic towers redefine opulence, offering unparalleled luxury with sweeping panoramic views and sumptuously appointed interiors. More than just residences, these exclusive homes are expansive, private realms in the sky, representing sophisticated urban living in the true Address signature style.

The residential experience extends beyond the private quarters, offering a world of exclusive indulgences. The podium level seamlessly combines comfort with community, featuring top-tier amenities such as a fully-equipped gym, shaded kids' area, barbecue pods, and a yoga deck. The Central Vista and Zabeel Pools provide aquatic escapes amidst city life, while the retail area caters to every need, redefining indulgence for the residents.

title: District One West 2
description:
District One West is a premium residential community by Meydan Group in one of the emirate’s most prestigious areas, MBR City. Prospective buyers have the opportunity to choose from an array of 4-5 bedroom villas from The Garden Villas collection and 6-bedroom villas from The Mansions collection. There are also exclusive 7-bedroom mansions in The Island collection that will be situated on a separate island with direct access to a stunning lagoon.
There are a total of 479 units on offer in the first phase of development. The BUA area of these gorgeous residences ranges from 5,774 sq. ft to 22,969 sq. ft, whilst the plot area varies between 6,657 sq. ft and 22,969 sq. ft. Each home will be complemented with a private swimming pool for the absolute enjoyment of the homeowners.

In Q1 2024, Meydan Group released District One West 2 with a collection of 4-bedroom Garden Villas, 5-bedroom Lagoon Villas and 6-bedroom Island Villas. The total size of the properties in the second phase of the project ranges from 6,768 sq. ft to 11,238 sq. ft.

Residents of District One West will be able to enjoy an elevated lifestyle while living just a few steps away from a stunning lagoon and sandy beaches. The ultra-luxury community will appeal to families with children in particular, as the master plan of the project includes a community garden with sports facilities and pocket parks.

title: Wadi Villas
description:
Wadi Villas by Arista Properties is the fresh announcement of an exclusive community with 4-6 bedroom private villas. The project is being constructed by Arista Properties in the emerging District 11 neighbourhood in Meydan. The villas are scheduled to be fully ready for handover to owners in the fourth quarter of 2026.
The residences are available in floor plans ranging from 6,545 sq.ft to 16,085 sq.ft. The villas will be three storeys high, with spacious balconies, a variety of functional spaces within the building and a private swimming pool on site. The site has parking for private vehicles and green recreational areas.
The villas will start from AED 14 million (USD 3.8 million) in the first quarter of 2024. The exclusive property is available on a convenient 60/40 payment plan with a down payment of 10% at the time of booking.
In addition to options for recreational activities in the house and private plots, residents will be able to spend time in the clubhouse. A luxurious 25m swimming pool is provided for relaxation, while active workouts can be done in the equipped fitness centre with exercise machines, yoga and meditation areas, etc. The community will have a wide range of green spaces for family recreation. The landscape is being created by world-renowned experts from Coopers Hill.
With sleek contemporary architecture that blends seamlessly with the tranquil oasis setting, the villas in the new collection offer a secluded lifestyle. And the location close to Dubai's active lifestyle centres suits those seeking convenience and accessibility to important locations. Downtown Dubai is about half an hour's drive away, while popular seaside holiday destinations can be reached in 40 minutes by private vehicle.

title: Elaya
description:
Elaya at Town Square Dubai by Nshama is the latest residential series presenting an unparalleled blend of luxury, nature, and community living with premium apartments. Embracing the essence of tranquility and balance, the development boasts a meticulously planned community enriched with jogging trails, cycling lanes, charming cafes, and convenient retail options. Residents are immersed in a dynamic environment that exudes warmth and vitality, fostering a sense of belonging and well-being.

The development's interior design transcends ordinary living, elevating each detail to create an extraordinary experience. From the inviting lobby to the landscaped courtyard featuring a swimming pool and children's play areas, every space is crafted to evoke serenity and sophistication. Architecturally, it embodies modern contemporary elegance with clean lines and timeless aesthetics. Glazed porcelain floors, built-in wardrobes, and fully fitted kitchens epitomize both style and functionality, transforming each residence into a haven of efficiency and grace.

title: Roma Residences
description: Roma Residences by JRP Development presents harmonious fusion of modern aesthetics and timeless charm with studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments at JVC, Dubai. This distinguished luxury residential building is spread across B+G+5 floors, totaling limited 81 premium curated apartments. Designed to redefine urban living, it encapsulates elevated sophistication with meticulously crafted architectural details and sustainable living principles.

title: Fairway Villas 3
description:
Fairway Villas 3 at Emaar South is the latest residential series by Emaar Properties that epitomizes luxury 4 and 5-bedroom villas with breathtaking golf course views. This exclusive community boasts 72 meticulously designed limited edition units, promising residents unparalleled elegance and a serene lifestyle. The exclusive class facades redefine luxury living, offering residents an oasis of tranquility amidst lush greenery and landscaped gardens.

Nestled within the prestigious Emaar South Dubai, this development offers connectivity to major road networks, making Dubai's city center, entertainment hubs, and dining destinations easily accessible. The proximity to the international airport ensures convenient travel. Each villa is a masterpiece of contemporary design, seamlessly integrating indoor and outdoor spaces to create an ambiance of refined sophistication.

title: Golf Greens Tower 2
description: Discover unparalleled luxury living at Damac Golf Greens Tower 2, nestled within the prestigious Damac Hills with premium selection of 1 & 2-bedroom apartments and 2 & 3-bedroom townhouses. Developed by Damac Properties, this stunning residential tower offers a blend of sophistication, tranquility, and modern elegance. Tower configuration spans G+3P+31F+R, with 1st to 31st floors dedicated to the apartments, ensuring breathtaking views of the surroundings.

title: Floarea Vista
description:
Experience modern urban living at its finest at Floarea Vista developed by Mashriq Elite with premium curated studios, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments in Discovery Gardens, Dubai. Boasting exquisite interiors, contemporary exteriors, and an array of exceptional amenities, this 10-floor architectural masterpiece comprises limited 158 residential units at service. This exclusive residential development offers a contemporary lifestyle in the heart of the bustling community.

With its strategic location and easy accessibility to major roads like Sheikh Zayed Road, Al Khail Road, residents enjoy seamless connectivity to the rest of the city. With metro stations within walking distance and schools, shopping malls, and recreational hubs nearby, it offers the perfect blend of convenience and luxury, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a contemporary urban lifestyle in Dubai.

The meticulously designed apartments boast sophisticated interiors and innovative features, including fully equipped kitchens, designer walls, and smart home technology. Floor-to-ceiling glass windows flood the interiors with natural light, creating a bright and airy ambiance. Residents can indulge in a luxurious lifestyle with a host of amenities such as an organic swimming pool, sun deck, indoor techno gym, and sky lounge.

title: Condor Sonate Residences
description:
Sonate Residences by Condor Developers introduces a paradigm residential shift offering premium collection of studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments at JVT, Dubai. Nestled within the vibrant enclave, this high-rise development epitomizes refined urban living. Boasting European contemporary interior design by Ecru Design Studio, it offers an array of meticulously crafted residences that offers a harmonious blend of wellness-centric living.

Situated in the heart of Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT), the development enjoy proximity to an array of leisure and entertainment destinations. With convenient access to Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, residents can effortlessly explore Dubai's iconic landmarks and attractions. The friendly neighborhood ambiance, complemented by community parks, sports courts, schools, cafes, and restaurants, fosters an ideal setting for a thriving lifestyle.

Residents are enveloped in a world of opulence and convenience, with two amenities decks hosting over 15 wellness amenities. From a rooftop infinity pool to sauna/steam rooms, jogging tracks, cinema, padel tennis courts, yoga studios, herb gardens, BBQ areas, and more, every aspect of life is curated for a holistic living experience. Generous layouts ensure ample space for relaxation and entertainment, while the prime location grants easy access to key leisure and commercial hubs in JVT, Dubai Studio City, and beyond.

title: Ellington Rosemont Residences
description:
Rosemont Residences by Ellington Properties is the newest residential façade presenting a distinguished living experience with 1 & 2-bedroom apartments in Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT), Dubai. This low-rise residential tower epitomizes avant-garde architectural brilliance, offering a seamless blend of luxury, convenience, and tranquillity. With its prime location, exquisite design, and world-class amenities, it redefines modern living in Dubai. Featuring spacious layouts, high-end finishes, and floor-to-ceiling windows, the façade provides breathtaking views of the city skyline and surrounding landscapes.

Strategically located in the Jumeirah Village Triangle, it offers proximity to a myriad of amenities and attractions. From renowned international schools like Sunmarke School to world-class leisure destinations such as Montgomerie Golf Club and Dubai Marina, residents enjoy effortless access to the best that Dubai has to offer. Moreover, with key landmarks like the Mall of the Emirates, Palm Jumeirah, and Burj Khalifa just a short drive away, convenience is truly at your doorstep.

Boasting a distinctive architectural design, the façade stands amidst lush landscaped communal areas and parks, creating a serene oasis for residents to call home. Comprising limited 47 spacious apartments, the building exudes sophistication and charm at every turn. Whether you're seeking a cozy one-bedroom retreat or a spacious two-bedroom abode, it caters to a diverse range of lifestyle preferences.

Beyond its prime location, it boasts an array of state-of-the-art facilities designed to enhance the quality of life for its residents. Whether you're looking to unwind by the swimming pool, indulge in retail therapy at the boutique shops, or host a barbecue gathering with friends and family, the options are endless. Additionally, the well-equipped gymnasium, kids' play area, and sprawling parks and gardens ensure that every member of the family finds something to enjoy within the confines of this exceptional community.

What truly sets this apart is its commitment to creating a holistic living experience that transcends mere accommodation. With a focus on fostering a sense of community, the building serves as a hub where neighbours can come together, forge meaningful connections, and create lasting memories. Whether it's organizing community events, participating in recreational activities, or simply sharing a friendly conversation by the poolside, residents are invited to be

title: Bay Villas Dubai Islands
description:
Bay Villas Dubai Islands by Nakheel presents a haven of tranquility and luxury design lined with premium 3, 4 & 5-bedroom waterfront, garden and semi-detached villas along with townhouses. Situated on the scenic Dubai Islands B, this development offers an unparalleled waterfront lifestyle with modern and luxurious design elements. Residents are treated to breathtaking views of pristine beaches, azure waters, and iconic landmarks, creating a serene ambiance that complements the vibrant energy of the city.

The waterfront villas epitomize panoramic architecture, capturing breathtaking water and skyline views. Each villa along the shoreline exudes a distinct character that harmonizes with the natural surroundings of the Dubai Islands. From open living spaces shaded by a pure frame to lush vegetation providing privacy, these waterfront villas offer a serene retreat amidst the bustling city. With features like expansive terraces and architectural brilliance, it redefines waterfront living in the heart of Dubai.

For those seeking semi-detached villas, it presents an elegant option with G+1 floors, luxurious ensuite bathrooms, and thoughtful design elements. The juxtaposition of wood cladding and lighter brick/stone facades adds to the villa's gracefulness, offering residents a blend of sophistication and comfort. Complete with maid's rooms, laundry facilities, and parking, these villas are designed to meet the needs of modern living.

Townhouses boast eye-catching designs that combine bold lines, floor-to-ceiling windows, and dark wooden panels. With a focus on both aesthetics and functionality, these townhouses offer a seamless blend of style and practicality for residents to enjoy. Garden Villas here offer a play of light and texture, with facades adorned in light tones, stone cladding, and offset block designs. With spacious interiors and serene outdoor spaces, it provides the perfect setting for relaxation and enjoyment.

Away from the city but connected by quality, residents are embraced by nature at every turn. Verdant landscaping and nature integration abound, with access to pristine resort beaches and landscaped green corridors. From beach clubs to sports courts, and swimming pools to linear parks, the façades offer a range of facilities designed to enhance the quality of life for its residents.

title: Selina Bay by Reportage
description:
Selina Bay at Yas Island is the latest residential development by Reportage Properties presenting an unparalleled opportunity with studios to 3-bedroom apartments, 3 & 4-bedroom duplex penthouses and 4-bedroom townhouses in Abu Dhabi. Residents are invited to indulge in a world of sophistication, surrounded by upscale dining options, recreational facilities, and proximity to Yas Island's world-famous attractions.

Situated in Yas West, the development epitomizes the perfect blend of urban convenience and natural serenity. This vibrant community offers a harmonious balance between bustling city life and tranquil surroundings, where residents can experience the energy of Yas Island while reveling in moments of peace and quiet. Surrounded by parks, schools, mosques, and community retail outlets, it ensures that every necessity is within reach, fostering a sense of belonging and convenience for its residents.

With a total of 679 meticulously designed units spread across two distinct sections – East and West, the development epitomizes elegance and sophistication. With residential floors spanning from ground level to the 18th floor, residents are treated to breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape, creating a truly immersive living experience. From the breathtaking canal views to the vibrant energy of the island, the façade promises a lifestyle of pure indulgence where every day feels like a celebration.

Saying yes to this new development means saying yes to the vibrant Yas Island lifestyle. Whether exploring the waterfront promenade, indulging in world-class dining experiences, or enjoying thrilling adventures at nearby attractions, residents are immersed in a lifestyle unlike any other. As the area transforms into a premier waterfront destination, residents can look forward to an even brighter future, where every moment is an opportunity to create lasting memories and experiences.

Elevating the concept of luxury living, the development offers an array of amenities and services designed to cater to every need and desire. Residents can unwind by the poolside, stay active in the state-of-the-art gymnasiums, or enjoy quality time with family at the dedicated kids' play areas. Landscaped gardens, shaded seating areas, and BBQ facilities provide the perfect backdrop for outdoor gatherings, while pet-friendly amenities ensure that every member of the family feels at home.

title: Ellington Claydon House
description:
Claydon House at Meydan redefines luxury living, developed by Ellington Properties with premium designed 1, 2, 3, and 4-bedroom apartments in MBR City, Dubai. The high-rise building features a range of design-led residences, including a luxury lifestyle. Positioned to offer sweeping vistas of the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary and the iconic Downtown Dubai skyline, residents will enjoy direct access to a crystal-clear lagoon, adding to the allure of this exceptional development.

Step into a world of indulgence and comfort with its exceptional amenities. From the tranquil ambience of the library to the excitement of the cinema room, every corner is designed to cater to the diverse needs of modern living. Dive into the lap of luxury at the adult lap pool, find your Zen at the indoor and outdoor yoga studios, or unleash your competitive spirit at the fitness and boxing facilities. With a plethora of options ranging from co-working spaces to karaoke rooms, it ensures that every moment is filled with delight and satisfaction.

Beyond its lavish interiors, the façade is set within a vibrant community that offers a seamless blend of convenience and leisure. Each dwelling is meticulously crafted to offer seamless integration of indoor and outdoor living spaces, allowing residents to immerse themselves in the surrounding natural beauty. With its impeccable craftsmanship, breathtaking views, and unmatched amenities, the development transcends the ordinary and offers residents an extraordinary lifestyle experience.

With its ground-floor retail promenade and community lagoon, it redefines the concept of urban living. The tower configuration, featuring 38 residential floors atop 5 podium levels, ensures that every resident enjoys a sense of exclusivity and privacy. Whether admiring the crystal-clear waters of the lagoon or gazing at the majestic Burj Khalifa, residents are treated to a panorama of natural splendour and urban allure. With ample parking spaces and state-of-the-art elevators, it seamlessly combines luxury with practicality, setting a new standard for upscale living.

Indulge in a lifestyle of leisure and recreation with the first-floor amenities. From the infinity-edge leisure pool to the serene sun lounger area, every space is designed to evoke a sense of tranquillity and relaxation. Stay active and healthy at the state-of-the-art fitness studio, or let your children's imagination run wild at the engaging kid's play area.

title: Arada CBD Building 5
description:
Arada CBD Building 5 is located at the heart of Aljada, Sharjah represents the epitome of modern commercial and office spaces designed to enhance productivity and foster innovation. Boasting six floors of flexible commercial space, the building is designed to cater to the evolving needs of progressive corporations. Its strategic location overlooking the green spine makes it an ideal choice for forward-thinking businesses looking to thrive in a sustainable and employee-friendly environment.

The development offers more than just office spaces; it fosters a culture of collaboration and well-being. With wide, open floor plans and floor-to-ceiling windows allowing ample natural light, the workspace of tomorrow is here today. Green rooftop terraces provide venues for outdoor meetings, events, and networking, complemented by juice bars and yoga zones to promote employee health and wellness.

Connectivity is key in today's fast-paced world, and it delivers on all fronts. Situated within easy reach of Sharjah International Airport and Dubai International Airport, with direct access to major roadways, the district offers unparalleled accessibility for businesses and travelers alike. Moreover, its proximity to key landmarks such as University City, Sharjah Airport Free Zone, and City Centre Al Zahia mall further enhances its appeal as a prime business destination.

In addition to its strategic location and modern amenities, the building is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship. Every office within the district benefits from smart solutions aimed at increasing efficiency and reducing carbon footprints. Step outside the office, and you'll find yourself immersed in a world of convenience and leisure. The district's 'green spine' offers a tranquil retreat amidst the hustle and bustle of urban life, with shaded walkways, art installations, and seating areas providing spaces for relaxation and reflection. A diverse array of cafes, dining establishments, and retail outlets cater to the needs of local employees.

title: South Living
description:
South Living by Dubai South is the latest premium development located at Dubai South offering range of meticulously designed studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. This leisure design 12-storey façade presents some of the best-in-class amenities to redefine the lifestyle, where luxury meets convenience in the heart offering endless opportunities for residents and businesses alike.

Located within the vibrant Dubai South Residential District, it boasts a prime location with easy access to Expo Road and a host of amenities just steps away. Whether you're in need of groceries, dining options, or recreational facilities, everything you desire is within reach. The community park nearby offers a serene escape, while the strategic placement ensures seamless connectivity to major landmarks and amenities across Dubai.

Step into luxury as you arrive, where a grand entrance lobby sets the tone for the elegance that awaits within. From sleek finishes to spacious layouts, every detail has been carefully crafted to ensure maximum comfort and style. But the luxury doesn't end there. The development offers a wealth of amenities designed to enhance your lifestyle, including a gym, pool, play areas, and more.

For outdoor gatherings and leisurely evenings, the BBQ area and gazebo seating provide the ideal setting. With additional amenities such as a library, multipurpose hall, and kids' play area, it ensures a holistic living experience that caters to every need.

title: Emaar Parkside Hills
description:
Emaar Parkside Hills at Dubai Hills Estate introduces a new standard of luxury living in the heart of Dubai with a premium collection of 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. This eagerly awaited residential development by Emaar Properties promises to redefine opulent living with its unparalleled blend of upscale amenities, convenient location, and stunning views. Set amidst the sprawling Dubai Hills Estate, residents will enjoy easy access to Al Khail Road, ensuring quick connections to Downtown Dubai and other key destinations.

The locality at Dubai Hills Estate offers the green heart of Dubai, where residents will benefit from the strategic position between Downtown Dubai and Dubai Marina. The family-friendly neighbourhood offers easy access to world-class attractions, as well as access to the world-class facilities, central park, championship golf course, Dubai Hills Mall and many such, ensuring a comprehensive lifestyle experience for its residents. With the planned Etihad Rail and Metro lines in close proximity, fast and easy access to the airports and other emirates is guaranteed in the future, enhancing connectivity and convenience at every turn.

The architectural style of the development is a masterstroke of contemporary elegance, seamlessly integrated with the lush green surroundings of Dubai Hills Estate. Each building is meticulously designed to provide sweeping panoramic views, connecting residents with the best that the green heart of Dubai has to offer. Whether admiring the iconic Burj Khalifa from the higher floors or reveling in the serenity of Dubai Hills Park, every aspect is crafted to inspire and amaze.

With meticulous attention to detail and aesthetics, every unit provides captivating views and a sense of warmth and elegance. The thoughtful use of earthy tones and premium finishes transforms each space into a welcoming haven, where residents can unwind and recharge amidst the hustle and bustle of city life.

Step into a world where luxury meets sophistication, where each day is a blend of elegance and comfort tailored for those who appreciate finer living. From the luxurious lobby adorned with classic contemporary designs to the state-of-the-art elevated podium, the arrival experience sets it apart from other neighbourhood developments. Residents can indulge in a wealth of amenities, including an infinity pool, fitness center, children's play area, and landscaped podium deck, creating an exclusive oasis for relaxation, and fitness.

title: Alta by Meteora
description:
Alta by Meteora Developers is the new residential development that beckons discerning individuals seeking luxury design studios and 1-bedroom apartments in JVC, Dubai. This architectural marvel promises an unparalleled lifestyle experience in one of Dubai's most coveted locations seeking a harmonious blend of contemporary living and natural tranquillity.

Strategically situated in the southwestern part of Dubai, JVC offers unparalleled connectivity to major highways, ensuring effortless access to various parts of the city. Surrounded by prominent areas such as Dubai Sports City, Motor City, and Jumeirah Village Triangle, residents enjoy proximity to an array of dining, retail, and leisure destinations. Whether embarking on a culinary adventure, indulging in retail therapy, or exploring the vibrant cultural scene, the possibilities are endless in this dynamic neighborhood.

The development design transcends mere aesthetics to evoke a sense of serenity and harmony inspired by the majestic sea waves. Drawing upon elements of fluidity, curvature, and dynamic forms, the conceptual design seamlessly integrates with the surrounding landscape, creating an environment that is both visually captivating and functionally efficient. Each residence exudes timeless elegance, offering residents a sanctuary where they can unwind and recharge amidst the beauty of their surroundings.

Elevating the standard of luxury living, the façade boasts an array of world-class amenities designed to cater to every aspect of modern life. From a serene pool and kids' pool for leisurely dips on sunny afternoons to an outdoor cinema where residents can indulge in cinematic experiences under the starlit sky, every detail has been meticulously curated to enhance the quality of life. Additionally, a lounge and bar provide the perfect setting for social gatherings, while a mini-golf course and kids' play area offer endless entertainment options for families. With a jogging path and ample seating areas scattered throughout the community, residents can embrace an active lifestyle while soaking in the scenic views that surround them.

title: The Waterway
description:
The Waterway at Meydan Horizon is a premium development by Prestige One Developments offering exclusive 1 & 2-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom penthouses. With its sleek G+3 P+18 structure overlooking crystal lagoons, this residential masterpiece offers a lifestyle of unparalleled elegance and sophistication. From the moment you step into the grand reception lobby, you're greeted with an atmosphere of minimalist luxury that invites you to unwind and indulge in the finer things in life.

But it's not just the amenities that set this waterfront development apart—it's the attention to detail and commitment to excellence that truly elevate this development to new heights of luxury. From the sleek design of the tower to the breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape, every aspect has been carefully curated to offer residents a lifestyle that is as exclusive as it is extraordinary. Whether you're a young professional looking for a stylish urban retreat or a family seeking a spacious and elegant home, it has the perfect residence for you.

What truly sets this façade apart, however, is its seamless integration of convenience and luxury.
