From the grand entrance lobby to the community lounge, outdoor sports facilities, and ample parking space, every detail has been thoughtfully considered to ensure that residents can enjoy a lifestyle of utmost comfort and convenience. And with the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary just a stone's throw away, nature lovers can escape the hustle and bustle of city life and immerse themselves in the serene beauty of Dubai's natural landscape.

The meticulously crafted interiors boast exquisite materials and impeccable finishing, ensuring that every corner exudes opulence and refinement. Whether you're relaxing by the infinity pool, working out in the state-of-the-art gym, or enjoying movie nights at the outdoor cinema, it provides an array of world-class amenities designed to cater to your every need and desire.

title: Eleve by Deyaar
description:
Eleve by Deyaar is the latest residential tower that stands tall as a symbol of contemporary living in the bustling Downtown Jebel Ali in Dubai with premium studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. This 38-storey residential skyscraper, developed by renowned real estate developer promises a lifestyle of luxury and convenience. With two basement levels dedicated to parking, residents can enjoy seamless access to their vehicles.

Situated within the 6.5 million square meter Downtown Area of Jebel Ali, it offers more than just a home; it provides a gateway to a vibrant community. The neighborhood, characterized by a blend of residential and commercial buildings along Sheikh Zayed Road, features parks, plazas, and shaded sidewalks. With Expo City Dubai just kilometers away, residents will have easy access to world-class exhibitions and entertainment venues. As Downtown Jebel Ali continues to evolve, the luxury design tall façade remains at the forefront of innovation, offering residents not just a place to live, but a lifestyle to cherish.

The allure of the development extends beyond its architectural marvels. Residents are treated to a wealth of amenities designed to elevate their everyday experiences. From a spacious pool deck and modern fitness center to charming courtyards in the lobby, every aspect is crafted to provide residents with a tranquil retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. Private balconies in all units offer stunning views of the surrounding port and neighborhood, while nature-connected living principles ensure a harmonious balance of wellness and privacy.

In addition to its exceptional array of amenities, the places a strong emphasis on sustainable living. Eco-friendly materials and technologies are integrated throughout the development, reflecting Deyaar's commitment to environmental responsibility. This focus on sustainability not only enhances the quality of life for residents but also contributes to a greener, more sustainable future for the community.

As residents of the development, you’ll find yourself immersed in a world where every detail is thoughtfully curated to enhance your quality of life. Whether you’re lounging by the pool, unwinding in the sauna and steam room, or enjoying a movie under the star at the outdoor cinema, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

title: Cove by Imtiaz
description:
Imtiaz Developments proudly presents Cove at Dubailand, an epitome of luxurious living nestled within the vibrant landscape with premium studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments. The high-rise façade presents the 19th floor of residential haven with the rooftop surprise lined with attractions like the Paradise Island on the first floor, Zenith Fitness as well as Haven and lounge areas to elevate your body and mind. On the other, the rooftop rendezvous becomes a magical island to enjoy and relax.

Each residence boasts timeless materials and unmatched finishes, curated to elevate residents' well-being. The vertical community is adorned with unparalleled amenities, inviting discerning individuals to indulge in life's simplest pleasures. Soft hues, ambient lighting, and delicate touches of rose gold create an inviting atmosphere, where residents can unwind and indulge in life's simple pleasures. Whether you're hosting a gathering in the sleek dining area or seeking relaxation in the haven for self-care, every corner exudes timeless sophistication and comfort.

Step outside your apartment and into a world of unparalleled amenities designed to cater to every aspect of your lifestyle. From the vibrant Paradise Island with its paddle court and running track to the serene Zenith Fitness Haven & Lounge, the development offers endless opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation. Take a dip in one of the sparkling pools, enjoy a BBQ with friends and family, or unwind in the sauna and steam room – the choice is yours. With a dedicated kids' play area, open-air cinema, and sky garden, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

The rooftop is a true sanctuary where dreams meet the skyline under a starlit embrace. Whether you're practicing yoga by the poolside, relaxing on a sunbed, or enjoying a movie night at the open cinema, every experience is elevated to new heights. Serene cabanas offer a tranquil escape for outdoor relaxation, while the infinity pool provides a breathtaking view of the bustling city below. Immerse yourself in luxury and serenity as you indulge in the exclusive rooftop amenities.

Beyond the amenities and luxurious interiors, the leisure design façade offers a lifestyle unlike any other. With its prime location in the heart of Dubailand, residents enjoy unparalleled connectivity to the city's main attractions and amenities. Whether you're exploring the vibrant neighborhood or simply enjoying the magnificent backdrop from your apartment window, it promise

title: City Walk Northline
description:
City Walk Northline by Meraas redefines luxury living in Dubai, offering residents an unparalleled level of sophisticated design 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. From sleek, modern interiors to expansive terraces with breathtaking views, every aspect of the development exudes elegance and refinement. Boasting bright interiors and expansive terraces offering stunning views of lush parks, each home invites residents to immerse themselves in a dynamic urban lifestyle.

Setting a new standard in city living, the project boasts a sleek, minimalist exterior design inspired by The Green Planet and the vibrant atmosphere of City Walk itself. With reflective blue glass accents that introduce a modern flair, the architecture seamlessly integrates into its lush surroundings. Inside, lavish accessories and superior finishes adorn spacious interiors, offering unobstructed views of the Dubai skyline through floor-to-ceiling, openable glass panels. Each apartment reflects a warm sense of modernity and sophistication, inviting residents to indulge in effortless charm.

Step outside and immerse yourself in the unparalleled amenities designed to elevate every aspect of urban living. From the infinity-edge pool overlooking the Dubai skyline to the well-equipped gym seamlessly integrated into the urban vibe, every detail is crafted with your comfort and well-being in mind. Take advantage of outdoor fitness spaces, viewing decks, and multipurpose rooms, providing endless opportunities for relaxation, recreation, and leisure.

Elevated privacy and breathtaking views await in the top-floor apartments of Northline 1, while connected podiums link the two buildings housing residences in Northline 2. Whether you're seeking a cozy one-bedroom retreat or a spacious three-bedroom haven, each residence is thoughtfully designed to cater to your every need. Experience the true essence of urban living where modern design, lush surroundings, and unparalleled convenience converge to redefine contemporary city living.

This exclusive façade is not just a place to live; it's a destination where possibilities unfold. With premium retail, dining, leisure, and entertainment options right at your doorstep, every day presents a new adventure. Whether you're strolling through landscaped drop-off areas enriched with art and water features or enjoying a tranquil retreat on private terraces with infinity-edge pools, the essence of luxury permeates every corner of this vibrant community.

title: Helvetia Residences
description:
Helvetia Residences at JVC is the first-class residential marvel developed by DHG Properties offering premium designed studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments. With landscaped green spaces, modern conveniences, and a serene village-like atmosphere, it provides residents with easy access to everything redefining the essence of contemporary living.

Nestled within the prestigious Jumeirah Village Circle in Dubai, it offers an unparallel living experience for those seeking luxury and sophistication. With the convenient location, the allure of the development presents green landscaped green spaces greeted with a serene atmosphere. Additionally, residents are living proximity to the popular malls, iconic landmarks and attraction ensuring unparallel convenience, allowing to immerse in the vibrant culture and lifestyle.

Step into the epitome of luxury as you enter the superbly designed architecture that presets the finest of all. From extensive floor-to-ceiling windows that flood each room with natural light to open-plan layouts that facilitate seamless flow and spaciousness, every detail exudes elegance and sophistication. The exquisite kitchens, serene bathrooms, and calming bedrooms serve as sanctuaries of comfort and relaxation, adorned with premium finishes and contemporary design elements that elevate the living experience to new heights.

Elevating well-being is at the heart with a plethora of amenities designed to promote health, activity, and relaxation. Whether it’s working out in the state-of-the-art rooftop gym, challenging friends to a game of padel on the courts, or enjoying a refreshing dip in the swimming pool, residents have access to the world-class facilities that cater to all ages and lifestyles. The tranquil meditation room offers a peaceful retreat for mindfulness and introspection, while the engaging kids play area and the lush green gardens provide opportunities for outdoor recreation and family bonding.

As the sun sets over the horizon, residents can unwind and indulge in culinary delights at the elegant restaurant, or simply take a leisurely stroll through the wellness garden, soaking in the beauty of nature. With electric parking facilities and a grocery store convenience for residents.

title: Oria by Emaar
description:
Elevate your lifestyle with the new launch of Oria at Dubai Creek Harbour, a new residential development by Emaar Properties lined with 1, 2 & 3 bedroom beachfront apartments. This exclusive advancement offers a beachfront façade designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. With its urban designs and seamless connectivity to the metro, it presents a prime investment opportunity in Dubai's ever-growing real estate market. From breathtaking views of Dubai Creek Canal to lush parks and iconic skyscrapers, it promises residents an enchanting tapestry of urban vibrancy and natural beauty.

Nestled within the vibrant heart of Dubai Creek Harbour, it stands as a beacon of modern elegance amidst the dynamic urban landscape. One of the standout features is its prime location, offering seamless metro access and proximity to a plethora of attractions and amenities. From upscale residences at Creek Island to retail and dining options at Creek Marina, residents are spoiled for choice when it comes to leisure and entertainment. The nearby Central Park and Harbour Promenade provide lush green spaces and stunning cityscape views, while the Creek Harbour Beach offers a sophisticated urban experience, blending coastal charm with urban energy.

The residential units offer a range of living spaces, each boasting impressive urban views and luxurious amenities. Designed for the modern socialite, the lounges and game rooms provide the perfect blend of entertainment and relaxation, while the outdoor and indoor gym spaces cater to the fitness enthusiast. Additionally, the 3600-sqm amenities podium serves as a lively community center, featuring a multipurpose room, state-of-the-art gym, elegant pool areas, and tranquil wellness spaces, fostering a strong sense of community and enriching the living experience.

Living here is more than just residing in a luxurious apartment; it’s about embracing a lifestyle characterized by balance, elegance, and convenience. Whether strolling along the scenic waterfront promenade, enjoying the vibrant social scene at the leisure podium, or exploring the nearby attractions, residents are presented with endless opportunities for relaxation, recreation, and connection. With its unmatched combination of modern design, premier amenities, and prime location, it sets a new standard for waterfront living in Dubai Creek Harbour.

title: Tiger Faradis Tower
description:
Discover the Faradis Tower at Sharjah, an exclusive 50-storey development by Tiger Properties in the bustling Al Mamzar with premium class 1, 2, 3 & 4-bedroom apartments. With its sleek design and premium features, this architectural masterpiece stands tall as a beacon of sophistication in Dubai's skyline. Each apartment within the tower is meticulously crafted to offer residents a harmonious blend of comfort, elegance, and modern convenience.

Situated majestically along the pristine shores of Al Mamzar, the façade stands tall as an emblem of elegance and sophistication in Sharjah. As a city that seamlessly blends tradition with innovation, Sharjah is a melting pot of diverse experiences. From its bustling souks to its world-class museums, every corner of the city tells a story.

Step inside the tower, and you're transported into a world of refined luxury. Despite its soaring height, the tower's interior exudes warmth and sophistication. The communal areas are adorned with exquisite furnishings and tasteful decor, setting the stage for an unparalleled living experience. Neutral tones dominate the palette, creating a sense of tranquillity and harmony. Whether you're relaxing in the lobby or exploring the amenities, every corner here exudes an air of elegance and refinement.

Boasting an array of world-class amenities, residents are treated to a lifestyle beyond compare. From the refreshing outdoor swimming pool to the state-of-the-art gym, every facility is designed to cater to the needs of modern-day living. Families will delight in the dedicated kids' play area, while fitness enthusiasts can enjoy the running and walking track. Whether you seek relaxation or recreation, it offers an unparalleled living experience.

Beyond its allure as a luxurious residence, the tower also presents a lucrative investment opportunity in the Middle East's thriving real estate market. With its prime location and array of amenities, this development promises both capital appreciation and a high standard of living for investors and residents alike.

title: Farm Gardens Phase 2
description:
Emaar Properties introduces Farm Gardens Phase 2 at The Valley, offering luxurious 4 & 5-bedroom villas nestled within the heart of Dubai. These residences come in two styles as Horizon and Oren, and epitomize sophistication with a unique blend of farming activities and a tranquil lifestyle. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the villas boast modern aesthetics and spacious interiors, providing a secure haven for families.

Step into the development and be greeted by expansive spaces designed to cater to every aspect of refined living. From the elegant architectural design to the floor-to-ceiling windows that welcome natural light and provide breathtaking views of the picturesque landscape, every detail has been meticulously crafted to create a haven of tranquillity and sophistication.

One of the defining features is its commitment to sustainability and environmental consciousness. With a sustainable living core integrated into the community, residents can enjoy features designed to enhance comfort, improve air quality, and promote water efficiency. From communal farming initiatives like hydroponics greenhouse and community gardening to comprehensive amenities such as gardens, sports courts, and a community center focused on wellness and leisure activities, the facades offer a holistic approach to sustainable living.

Choose from two distinct villa styles, each offering its own unique charm and character. Whether you prefer the tranquillity and steadiness of Horizon Villas or the seamless indoor-outdoor living experience of Oren Villas, there's a perfect home waiting for you. Spanning between 431 sqm to 564 sqm, the villas are meticulously designed to create an environment where luxury meets comfort. With large yards ready to be transformed into your own personal oasis, and thoughtful additions like fitted elevators and driver's rooms adding functionality and accessibility, these homes are tailor-made for modern families seeking both space and style.

So why settle for the ordinary when you are experiencing the extraordinary here at this new development? Embrace the rustic bliss with a modern touch, cultivate connections in nature’s embrace, and discover your style and sanctuary in this exclusive enclave where luxury knows no bounds. In the meanwhile, enjoy and explore the lifestyle with facilities including the likes of pocket parks, picnic areas, sports courts, rock climbing, Zen and Oasis Garden and many such facilities at your doorstep.

title: One Park Central by Iman
description:
One Park Central at JVC is the latest 23-storey high-rise residential development by Iman Developers with luxury studios, 1 & 2-bedroom apartments, duplexes and penthouses. Rising majestically, this architectural marvel boasts a striking design comprising a basement, ground floor, five podium levels, twenty-three floors, and a rooftop terrace. With 482 residential apartments, 38 commercial units, and 6 retail spaces, it caters to diverse lifestyles, offering an array of options to enjoy and explore the lifestyle.

Embodying urban elegance and luxury, the façade epitomizes sophistication and innovation. Nestled gracefully facing Central Park, it seamlessly integrates with its surroundings, creating a harmonious blend of opulence and convenience. Meticulously crafted residential units feature premium designs, boasted with private pools in the penthouses. Each residence exudes modernity and style, providing residents with a haven of comfort and refinement.

Beyond its exquisite living spaces, the development sets a new standard for luxury amenities. Boasting over 60 premium facilities, residents are treated to a host of exclusive offerings designed to enhance their lifestyle. From dedicated fitness and wellness facilities to retail and commercial spaces, every aspect is meticulously curated to elevate the living experience. Whether indulging in a workout at the premium fitness club or unwinding at the rooftop pool, residents are surrounded by luxury at every turn.

Complementing its luxurious amenities are best-in-class tenant services aimed at providing unparalleled convenience and comfort. A professional concierge service ensures that residents' needs are met promptly, while community events foster a sense of belonging and friendship. Onsite property management, 24/7 security offer peace of mind, while maintenance and cleaning services ensure that every detail is taken care of. Additionally, luxurious guest suites, a pet spa, and grooming area cater to the needs of residents and their furry companions.

For those seeking recreational pursuits, it offers an array of leisure options to cater to every interest. Co-working spaces provide a conducive environment for productivity, while a games room offers entertainment for residents of all ages. Golf enthusiasts can perfect their swing at the golf simulator, while the sky lounge provides a serene retreat with breathtaking views of the cityscape. Outdoor BBQ and entertainment spaces allow residents to host gather

title: Binghatti Phantom
description:
Binghatti Developers proudly presents Binghatti Phantom at JVC, a captivating addition of high-rise luxury designed tower with premium 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments in Dubai. As the latest marvel in architectural innovation, the façade epitomizes luxury living in the heart of one of Dubai's most sought-after communities. With its impressive height and distinctive design, this iconic tower stands as a testament to modern elegance and sophistication.

Nestled in the vibrant surroundings of JVC, it offers residents unparalleled access to a plethora of amenities and attractions. From Dubai Sports City to Dubai Marina, and from the Dubai International Stadium to the Jebel Ali Racecourse, every key destination is within easy reach. Whether it's leisurely strolls through landscaped gardens or indulgent dining experiences at nearby cafes and restaurants, residents will find themselves immersed in a world of convenience and luxury.

The residences are meticulously crafted to provide a haven of tranquility amidst the bustling cityscape. With high-end architectural design and meticulously curated interiors, each apartment exudes an air of timeless sophistication. Expansive floor plans, complemented by stylish balcony areas, invite residents to bask in panoramic views of the surrounding neighborhood, while deluxe amenities such as swimming pools, landscaped gardens, and retail shops cater to every lifestyle need.

The luxury high-rise façade offers more than just a home; they are welcomed into a community defined by elegance and exclusivity. Whether unwinding by the poolside or socializing at the onsite cafes and restaurants, every moment is imbued with a sense of luxury and refinement. With its seamless blend of architectural grandeur and modern convenience, it sets a new standard for upscale living in Dubai's dynamic real estate landscape.

title: Damac The Sapphire
description:
Damac Properties unveils its latest masterpiece, The Sapphire at Sheikh Zayed Road, a high-rise tower sets to redefine luxury living with 1, 2, 3-bedroom apartments, townhouses and limited penthouses. With its distinctive tower configuration spanning across 54 floors, it stands as a testament to architectural excellence and opulence. This iconic development promises a lifestyle of unparalleled opulence, boasting meticulously crafted living spaces designed for transformative experiences tailored to meet the discerning tastes of its residents.

Strategically located along Sheikh Zayed Road, it offers unrivaled convenience and connectivity to residents. With the convenience of its central location in Safa Park, residents are living next to renowned leisure destinations like City Walk, Box Park, and Jumeirah Beach. With its strategic location near major highways, residents enjoy seamless connectivity to the rest of Dubai, making it the ultimate epitome of luxury living in the city.

Upon arrival, residents and guests are greeted by a branded entrance area that sets the tone for the lavish lifestyle within. The ground level features captivating lobby areas designed to leave a lasting impression, while podium levels house exquisite townhouses, ensuring privacy and exclusivity. The fifth floor serves as a haven for relaxation and rejuvenation, with luxury spa retreats and a 24/7 gym catering to residents' wellness needs. From the 6th to the 52nd floor, the luxury apartments await, each meticulously crafted to exude sophistication and comfort. For those seeking the epitome of luxury living, the 53rd and 54th floors boast exclusive sky penthouses, offering unparalleled views of the city skyline.

Beyond its lavish interiors, the development sets itself apart with an array of amenities designed to elevate the resident experience. From the serene sunflower and canary gardens to the innovative circadian pods and observation deck, every aspect of this development is imbued with a sense of luxury and tranquility. Notably, amenities such as the immersive ring of light, energy bubble, and immersive nature bring a touch of novelty and enchantment, ensuring residents experience moments of wonder and delight at every turn. The inclusion of a roof garden and swimming pool further enhances the allure of outdoor living, providing residents with a serene retreat amidst the bustling cityscape.

title: Treppan Living
description:
Treppan Living at JVC by Fakhruddin Properties redefines luxury living with fully-furnished 1 & 3-bedroom apartments, 3 & 4-bedroom duplexes and 4-bedroom penthouses in Dubai. This twin tower serviced façade presents a harmonious blend of sustainability, wellness, and cutting-edge technology, designed to foster meaningful connections among residents. The impeccable hospitality and state-of-the-art amenities make this haven for those seeking a holistic and eco-conscious lifestyle.

The future of serene living unfolds within thoughtfully designed ultra-luxurious bedrooms, where every detail contributes to revitalizing your space. The air, as pure as a mountain breeze, ensures an unparalleled indoor air quality experience. Furthermore, the commitment to sustainability extends to the centralized RO purified drinking water system, significantly reducing plastic consumption, carbon emissions, and landfill impact, offering a place to reside but also a commitment to a greener legacy.

Incorporating innovative waste management systems that emphasize the 3R – reduce, recycle, and reuse. This eco-conscious approach aligns with the overall vision of building a sustainable tomorrow. Energy and cost-saving are at the forefront, thanks to the implementation of innovative and patented technologies, ensuring a residence that is not only luxurious but also environmentally responsible. The serviced residences go beyond conventional living by introducing AI-enabled smart home automation and a rewards program, providing residents with the utmost convenience at their fingertips.

The development focuses on sustainability, wellness, and technology, setting it apart as a unique project. Key features such as concierge and valet parking, 24-hour reception, fully automated apartments, and fully furnished interiors ensure a luxurious living experience. Additional services like laundry and spa services, housekeeping and maintenance, fully equipped kitchens, and wellness-centered amenities makes this a comprehensive solution for those seeking an elevated lifestyle.

title: Rove Home Marasi Drive
description:
Rove Home Marasi Drive is the latest stellar creation by IRTH Development, standing as the new edition of luxury studios, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments at Business Bay, Dubai. The second Rove Home in Dubai, this residential marvel is poised to offer a new echelon of hassle-free living. The ethos behind the branded residences is to curate distinct and personalized expressions of living spaces. The developers have meticulously selected prime locations to ensure residents receive nothing but the best.

Within Marasi Drive, it stands proudly alongside the iconic Dubai Canal at Business Bay. This prime location ensures quick access to Al Asayel Street, providing a seamless connection to Al Khail Road. Residents can also effortlessly reach Sheikh Zayed Road and the Dubai Metro, offering the epitome of connected city living.

What sets the development apart is its commitment to creating spaces that uplift, energize, and foster a sense of belonging. The interiors are a blend of contemporary style and cozy comfort, providing residents with a sanctuary they are proud to call home. The amenities are not just thoughtful but also engaging, offering a lifestyle that seamlessly combines modernity with convenience.

The Rove brand is more than just a residence; it's a new yet familiar expression of style, design, warmth, and a forever-young spirit. These properties fuse 21st-century innovation with sophistication, embodying simplicity, efficiency, and authenticity. Each home connects artful inspiration with cleverly activated spaces, creating a living experience that resonates with both locals and expatriates alike.

title: Burj Azizi
description:
Embark on a groundbreaking venture with Burj Azizi at Sheikh Zayed Road, a colossal billion project by Azizi developments destined to be Dubai's second tallest skyscraper, soaring over 700 meters. This architectural marvel isn't just about height; it's a symphony of residential opulence, a seven-star hotel experience, and a revolutionary vertical mall, creating a vertical realm of luxury.

Emphasizing the development as a legacy - a towering gift to the emirate that has provided abundance and opportunity. The developers envision an extraordinary experience with a unique observation deck and upscale dining options that will elevate the city's skyline.

title: Trinity at Arjan
description:
Trinity at Arjan is the latest jewel by Deca Properties, standing tall as an epitome of luxury and sophistication comprising 1, 2, and 3-bedroom luxury apartments. This residential marvel boasts groundbreaking 15-floor structure, complete with a sprawling entertainment podium – the largest in a single residential building in Arjan. Residents can indulge in the ultimate retreat with private pools adorning select apartments, offering an exclusive oasis within this urban sanctuary.

Nestled in proximity to Emaar Dubai Hills, the strategic location ensures convenience at every turn in Dubai. Just minutes from the renowned Dubai Hills Mall and within walking distance to prestigious educational institutions like the Australian International School, it presents an unparalleled lifestyle. Moreover, accessibility to hospitals such as Neuro Spinal Hospital and Mediclinic Parkview Hospital adds a layer of security and convenience for residents.

The exclusive designed façade promises a lifestyle beyond compare, exemplifying the epitome of elegance and modern living. The meticulously designed apartments boast contemporary finishes and expansive floor to ceiling windows that usher in abundant natural light, creating a bright and inviting ambiance. Residents have the unique privilege of enjoying private jacuzzi pools, adding an extra touch of opulence to their living spaces.

The architectural marvel presents more than just the desired living spaces; it offers a plethora of amenities that redefine luxury living. From the leisure design kids water park to the swimming pool, paddle tennis court to the reminiscent of a beach resort, it leaves no stone unturned. Enjoy more with the dedicated kids pool areas, gym, sauna and multiple water elements.

Striking 1 to 3-bedroom apartments with contemporary finishes.
16-storey building with ground floor plus 15 floors, lined with superior amenities.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light and light-filled environment.
Private jacuzzi pools in many apartments to provide a serene leisure retreat.
Prime location in Arjan, Dubai and opposite Emaar Dubai Hills.
Walking distance to supermarkets - Carrefour, Viva Supermarkets, Nesto Supermarkets.
Paddle tennis court, children's water park, swimming pool, kids' pool area, gym, sauna, multiple water features.

title: Cello by Taraf
description:
Discover luxury living with Cello at JVC, a prestigious project by Taraf Development offering luxury design studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom penthouses. This twin tower architectural masterpiece comprises Tower A with 21 floors and Tower B soaring to 23 floors, showcasing a harmonious blend of modern aesthetics and thoughtful design, boasting a serene lifestyle redefining luxury living.

Strategically positioned at the edge of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai and offers swift access to all the key destinations. Residents of the development can enjoy next access through the Al Khail Road, providing convenient access to the JSS International School, serene leisure areas of attractions, and an abundance of retail and dining. The surrounding parks and lush green spaces invite residents to get out and enjoy the serene lifestyle.

The architecture is distinctive, complemented by chic, bright and calming interiors with high-grade luxury fittings and fixtures to offer a serene ambience. The thoughtfully designed spaces allow residents to seamlessly blend work, life and play, creating a haven that resonates with their unique rhythm. The focus on details and finishes ensures that each residence strikes the perfect balance between functionality and experience.

The project's amenities are a symphony in harmony with residents' lifestyles. Outside, a large pool, kids' pool, outdoor gym, zen reading spot, landscaped park, outdoor cinema, and BBQ area create the perfect backdrop for memorable days and extraordinary nights. Inside, an indoor gym and a multipurpose room with professional lighting and sound system cater to impromptu karaoke sessions and parties. Relaxing music in every public area enhances the exclusive vibes.

The list of amenities is extensive, featuring a lap swimming pool and kid's pool, pool deck, leisure lawn with an outdoor cinema, reading deck, lounge fire pit, multi-purpose room with a social counter, kid's indoor and outdoor play areas, and both indoor and outdoor gyms with a yoga deck. The barbecue area is ideal for social gatherings, adding another dimension to the vibrant community lifestyle.

title: Art Bay
description:
Art Bay at Al Jaddaf Waterfront is a new residential development by Ellington Properties lined with exclusive studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments with Dubai Creek Views. This residential haven unveils a new vision of urban living with Dutco's commitment to delivering excellence, seamlessly integrating art, culture and wellness into the daily lives of its residents.

Situated in the heart of Al Jaddaf, it ensures easy connectivity with its proximity to highways and the metro. Residents enjoy swift access to Al Khail Road, facilitating convenient reach to Zabeel Stadium, Al Wasl Indoor Stadium, Downtown Dubai, Business Bay and the iconic Burj Khalifa. For those seeking vibrant city life, Downtown Dubai and the Dubai Creek Tower are a short minute's drive away. Additionally, the prestigious Palm Jumeirah beckons within a convenient minute's distance.

Beyond its strategic location, it promises a lifestyle of luxury and convenience with a range of amenities. The development boasts retail spaces, a 24/7 concierge service, a stylish lounge, a well-equipped gym for fitness enthusiasts and community gardens for tranquil moments. Outdoor working pods cater to professionals seeking an inspiring workspace, while the co-working space adds versatility to residents' daily routines.

Standing as an ode to the symphony of wellness, offering more than just a residence but a sense of place enriched by thoughtful design and cultural integration. As a waterfront development with unparalleled connectivity, stunning views and a curated lifestyle, it invites discerning individuals to experience the epitome of urban living in the heart of Dubai's vibrant arts and culture scene.

Key Highlights:
Situated in one of Dubai's most exciting new locations, it immerses residents in the vibrant arts and culture scene.
Low-rise architecture design is seamlessly integrated with exclusive lifestyle amenities, where residents and guests can enjoy and relax.
Within minutes, residents can reach significant landmarks like Royal Zabeel Palace, Wafi Mall, Downtown Dubai and Dubai Creek Tower.
Seamlessly integrates wellness into daily life, providing a variety of amenities, including a well-equipped gym, community gardens and outdoor leisure areas.
Families can enjoy the kids' play area and a multipurpose room, enhancing the overall living experience.

title: Sama Yas by Aldar
description:
Sama Yas in Yas Park, Abu Dhabi is the prime home address by Aldar Properties that offers 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment, duplex, garden apartment, & penthouse. This mega-development offers an opportunity to explore the amazing blend of luxurious and naturally aesthetic lifestyle within the verdant community park. Here, residents can appreciate the scenic views of the park & quick accessibility to the other leisure & wellness facilities from their homes.

This masterpiece is a majestic innovation that redefines modern homes within the 3 low-rise buildings that encompass a total of 234 excellent abode units. Recreate a well-balanced well-being lifestyle where you can sense the unparalleled lush environment within the privacy-focused serene and comfortable sanctuaries. Every home interior is an innovative collection of sustainable, smart and convenient features. Residents can sense the elevated dining experience in the kitchens that are curated by the renowned Chef Izu.

The significant features of Woods Bagot, Mustard & Linen all together create an enthralling concept of home interiors. The opulent architectural craftsmanship and meticulously settled windows & balconies establish a thoughtfully designed enthralling and finest façade. This avant-grade development aims to hold the benchmark of Estidama 3 Pearl rating, Fitwel, & LEED Gold Certification. The cutting-edge features of sustainable features, a functional design, and water, waste & energy efficient options are elements that foster a sustainable, thriving, and healthy lifestyle.

Being nestled in the most vibrant destination of the island, residents here can enjoy the quick and smoothest access to the many famous attractions of the community. This masterfully designed elegant development that compiles exciting amenities of a boutique spa, retail areas, concierge services, a lounge, a multipurpose room, & a theatre room. Many recreational and fitness-oriented facilities a gym, cycling-running track, outdoor working pods, co-working spaces, a library and a kid’s play area are at the fingertips of the inhabitants.

title: Grove on the Park
description:
Grove on the Park is the latest residential series by Nshama, set to redefine contemporary living with luxury design 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments located at Town Square Dubai. The residential gem offers a diverse range of thoughtfully designed residences, meeting the varied needs of its residents. Enveloped in a world of top-notch amenities and services, it seamlessly blends convenience and luxury.

The façade stands as a testament to modern architectural finesse. Clean lines and a timeless aesthetic define the exterior, strategically positioned to enhance residents' appreciation of breathtaking park views. This architectural brilliance fosters a seamless connection with nature, making every moment spent outdoors a visual delight.

The strategic location at Town Square Dubai provides central access to the rest of Dubai without causing any further problems. The locality provides easy access to the essential amenities, schools, hospitals and entertainment options, famous landmarks and monuments within minutes away.

Expertly master-planned community Town Square Dubai sets a new gold standard for planned communities. With parks spanning 154,000 square meters, community gardens, and an extensive network of trails, it provides a city life once thought impossible. The development is priced within reach of renting families and professionals, offering an exclusive address and exceptional opportunities.

With a central park, landscaped green spaces, cafes, restaurants, and convenience retail, provides a perfect setting for a healthy and peaceful lifestyle. Energy and warmth permeate every corner, creating an inviting community atmosphere. Diverse wellness, entertainment, and leisure choices surround residents, offering a myriad of options for every interest. From kids' play areas to an exclusive residential gym, a swimming pool, and a BBQ area – ensures that there's always something for everyone. Your community becomes an extension of your home, catering to explorers, thinkers, and playful spirits alike.

title: Altitude Tower
description:
Altitude De Grisogono at Business Bay is the latest residential revealed by Damac Properties offering luxury class studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments with awe-inspiring Canal views in Dubai. The high-rise architectural masterpiece is concerned with offering exceptional views of the Canal and Skylines with an unparalleled lifestyle lined with its podium and lower-level amenity zones. The development seamlessly blends cutting-edge advantages, including proximity to Lazy River, connecting residents to major destinations like Burj Khalifa and Downtown Dubai.

Situated in the coveted Business Bay, the façade shares its neighborhood with esteemed projects and leisure landmarks. The location is recognized as the heart of new Dubai, and offers proximity to iconic landmarks like the Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and DIFC, ensuring residents are surrounded by the best of the city's offerings.

The name 'de GRISOGONO' itself carries a legacy of luxury, drawing inspiration from the Greek word 'Chrysogonos,' meaning 'begotten of gold.' This Italian-Lebanese luxury brand seamlessly blends traditional high jewelry craftsmanship with modern elegance. As the development takes shape, expect a living experience that reflects the brand's commitment to excellence and sophistication.

Overlooking the Dubai Canal, the tower draws inspiration from the enchanting opal—a radiant gemstone known for its captivating play of colors. This inspiration permeates every element of this exquisite property, inviting you to explore a sparkling and opulent world.

The luxury class tower goes beyond expectations with a curated collection of amenities. From relaxation pods dedicated to star-gazing to a spa, beauty bar, and temperature-controlled flotation pods, it promises a life well-lived. Whether lounging on solar-powered sunbeds or enjoying post-workout bliss in the pool, serenity and splendor await at every turn.

title: Аmara
description:
Amara is a distinguished villa cluster within Tilal Al Ghaf, Dubai, presenting the epitome of opulent living with 3, 4 & 5 bedroom Villas, brought to life through a collaboration between Majid Al Futtaim and Bergman Design House. Comprising 116 twin villas, each villa exudes tranquility and captivates the senses with its light and organic design approach, inspired by serene layers of Zen.

Tilal Al Ghaf stands as a premium living community, centered around a stunning lagoon bordered by white sandy beaches. With nearly 500,000 square meters of parks, green spaces, and interconnected walking and cycling trails, it seamlessly integrates into this lush environment. Culinary delights, retail experiences, and a renowned International school are all within a leisurely stroll away, providing a lifestyle that's both convenient and enriching.

The development embodies an energizing sense of freedom ingrained in every aspect of the community. From paddle court sessions to refreshing dips in the pools, every activity resonates with a celebration of life, nature, and community. Drawing inspiration from desert dunes, Ghaf trees, and wadis, the community creates a harmonious blend of natural and cultural elements. It's a place where every step is a celebration of nature, design, and the art of community living.

Comprising 116 distinctive twin villas, the development offers a unique interplay between volumes, creating a dynamic street facade. The architecture, designed by Bergman Design House, showcases an exquisite blend of contemporary design and luxurious comfort. Semi-outdoor areas introduce greenery into living quarters, framing the scenic landscape and providing an immersive connection with nature.

Spanning across three floors, the twin villas combine contemporary design with luxurious comfort. Friendliness, privacy, and a peaceful sanctuary define these residences, providing the perfect backdrop for quality time with family and friends.

title: Pearl House
description:
Pearl House at JVC is the latest residential addition by Imtiaz Developments that offers a premium collection of studios and 1 bedroom apartments in Dubai. This exquisite development features a sleek and modern design that seamlessly blends aesthetics with functionality. Boasting an impressive array of residential units, catering to the discerning tastes of individuals seeking an elevated living experience.

Situated at Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), one of Dubai's most sought-after residential communities, it enjoys a prime location that offers the perfect balance between tranquility and accessibility. The development is strategically located, providing convenient access to major highways, business districts, world-class shopping destinations, and an array of entertainment options.

From meticulous planning and impeccable construction to unparalleled customer service, it ensures that each resident experiences the epitome of luxury and comfort. The world of sophistication features high-quality interiors with premium materials. Enjoy the breathtaking views of the leisure surrounding from the expansive balconies offering a perfect spot to relax and unwind.

The development offers an exceptional range of amenities and facilities, elevating the concept of luxury living to new heights. Residents can indulge in a host of exclusive features tailored to enhance their lifestyle and well-being. For those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, a spa and wellness center awaits, offering a sanctuary of tranquility. Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the well-equipped gymnasium, enabling them to maintain an active lifestyle without leaving the comfort of their home. In addition, it offers meticulously landscaped gardens, providing residents with an idyllic outdoor retreat.

title: Habtoor Grand Residences
description:
Habtoor Grand Residences is a G+49-storey luxury residential tower in the heart of Jumeirah Beach, Dubai Marina redefining opulent living with 2 to 4-bedroom apartments, townhouses and penthouses, developed by Al Habtoor Group. Each residence in this high-rise tower boasts breathtaking views of Dubai Marina and the Gulf, ensuring residents wake up to an unparalleled waterfront experience.

The proposed development provides a haven of leisure and wellness with a rooftop swimming pool, recreation facilities, a fully equipped gym, tennis courts, and jogging tracks. Entertainment options are abundant, featuring a cinema room, library, and a dedicated play area for children. Retail outlets and cafes within arm's reach cater to every shopping and dining need.

With 24/7 security, concierge services, and valet parking, residents can indulge in a lifestyle of convenience and exclusivity. The property's prime location near the marina ensures easy access to the finest dining and retail options, making it a coveted address in JBR.

title: Cavalli Estates
description:
Cavalli Estates at Damac Hills is a new development that features exclusive design 6 & 7 bedroom villas, lined with premium amenities within Dubai. These exclusive luxury residences by Damac Properties are crafted with a cosmopolitan lifestyle, where every facility is available right at your doorstep.

Located in a tranquil environment at Damac Hills, Dubai, it offers excellent connectivity options, ensuring a lifestyle that is as exclusive as possible. With proximity access to the major road networks, you are further provided with a viable address concerned about hassle-free access to the rest of the city.

These spacious villas are designed with great care and attention at every corner, so you can feel the luxury and warmth inside the premises, offering the best of comfort and convenience. If you wish to have a home that redefines the notion of living, this is where you can perhaps make a fresh new start.

The exclusive mega villas overlook the Trump International Golf Club's stunning green areas and come with extensive terrace areas, so you can enjoy the views, making it a perfect place for outdoor entertainment. In comparison, it is flanked by landscaped gardens and parks, thus providing you with the option to live and thrive far away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

title: Aeon
description:
Discover the epitome of waterfront living with AEON at Dubai Creek Harbour, developed by the renowned Emaar Properties, lined with premium 1, 2 & 3-bedroom beachfront apartments. This new development seamlessly integrates ultra-modern urbanism with the historic charm of Dubai Creek. Wake up to awe-inspiring open skies and picturesque water scenes, as Dubai Creek Harbour emerges as a thriving community for living, working, playing, and capturing cherished moments.

Dubai Creek Harbour boasts an efficient and fully integrated transport system, featuring an extensive road and bus network, four metro stations, water taxis to Downtown Dubai, and a convenient interchange. Pedestrian-friendly streets connect the neighborhood center to open spaces, creating a trendy destination with a vibrant mix of retail, business, recreation, and community facilities.

Immerse yourself in the biodiversity haven along the historic Dubai Creek, home to the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary. Here, nature lovers can admire tens of thousands of birds in their natural habitat, adding a unique touch to the community. Find your dream home in a range of modern properties that exemplify design excellence. The architectural elements and textures coexist with a soft color palette, enhancing the surrounding views and creating a sense of modern luxury. The eclectic interiors provide the perfect setting for a private urban retreat.

Residents of the development are treated to a visual feast from dawn to dusk. Extending views of the captivating Dubai Creek Canal, verdant parks, and Dubai's skyscrapers create an intricate weave of thriving energy and natural beauty. Being an inhabitant means having the metropolis at your fingertips. From Dubai Creek Harbour to pristine beaches and the city's bustling heart, residents are perpetually plugged into the urban grid.

From sleek lounges to game rooms, enjoy recreational spaces designed for the modern-day socialite. It's a mix of entertainment and relaxation, creating a vibrant community within the development. Cycling tracks, a skate park, and sports courts invite residents to embark on thrilling adventures. It doesn't just provide a home; it fosters an environment where residents can actively engage in a variety of recreational pursuits.

title: Skyhills Residences
description:
Discover luxury living at Skyhills Residences, a remarkable development by HRE Development located at Dubai Science Park with luxury studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartments and duplexes. This twin-building complex boasts a striking architectural design rising 33 and 40-storey with an impressive glass facade that sets it apart. Elevating the concept of living, the development features two iconic towers that ascend majestically above the hills along Umm Suqeim Road.

Conveniently located in Al Barsha South 2, with easy access to Al Khail Road, it promises a lifestyle that combines innovation with opulence. The prime location ensures a seamless commute to different parts of Dubai, making it an ideal choice for residents and investors alike. As well as the strategic position also provides easy access to Um Suqeim Road, Miracle Garden and Mall of the Emirates, enhancing overall accessibility.

Experience the high-rise living soaring impressively up to 40 floors, lined with premium design and architecture at ease. The vertical elegance of the development is unmatched in the city, providing residents with unparalleled views and a sense of grandeur. Enjoy the breathtaking views of the Dubai Skylines, Dubai Hills and many such, adding a touch of panoramic beauty to your homes.

Each apartment within the complex is meticulously designed, and furnished with top-notch fittings, fixtures, and branded home appliances, guaranteeing ultimate comfort and convenience. The development's first floors house amenity areas, providing residents with additional full-floor spaces for leisure and recreation. The façade is more than just a living space; it's a masterpiece that promises a lifestyle soaring beyond the clouds.

Elevate your living experience lined with exclusive facilities including drop-off areas, play zones, pools, gyms, sauna and many more. Unfolds the world with an exclusive beach pool, lazy river pool, outdoor gyms, lap pool, and beach volleyball courts to get inspired every day.

title: DAMAC Lagoon Views
description:
Discover the epitome of Damac Lagoon Views, the latest project by Damac Properties with limited 1 and 2-bedroom lagoon views apartments located at Damac Lagoons, Dubai. This architectural masterpiece is nestled in the heart of the vibrant Dubai community, offering a perfect blend of contemporary elegance and Mediterranean lifestyle. The project boasts a striking façade and breathtaking views, creating a unique living experience. Explore a world-class lifestyle in Dubai's majestic community, strategically located near iconic destinations like Dubai Marina, Expo 2020, and Mall of the Emirates.

Immerse yourself in the enchantment of Lagoon community, where the vibrant spirit of the Mediterranean is intricately woven into every detail. The development features Montecarlo Towers A, B, C, and Marbella Towers A, B, C, offering a range of apartments across G+6 Floor structures. The community, inspired by the Mediterranean is situated close to the charm of Damac Hills, yet hidden away from the bustle. The Lagoons community spans 45 million square feet, embracing the most elegant developments surrounded by azure blue lagoons, white sandy beaches, tropical island vibes, and other enchanting experiences.

Whereas the development provides an array of key amenities, including beauty hills, olive trees garden, honey bar, flamenco gardens, Aqua opera school-house pavilion, volcanic stones park, & floating pods, and sunset beach bar. This development seamlessly blends opulence with cultural richness through its exceptional amenities, creating a lifestyle beyond the ordinary.

Explore a world-class lifestyle strategically located near iconic destinations like Dubai Marina, Expo 2020, and Mall of the Emirates. The beach club, luxury pools floats, boho lounge add to the allure, promising residents a haven of luxury and tranquility. This is not just a residence; it's an immersive experience that captures the essence of Mediterranean living in the heart of Dubai.

Key Highlights:
Exclusive limited 1 and 2-bedroom lagoon views apartments, designed across six floors plus roof layouts, combining architectural sophistication.
Experience leisure living surrounded by azure blue lagoons, pristine white sandy beaches, and tropical island vibes, encapsulating the essence of tranquility redefined.
Premium Island locality at Damac Lagoons in Dubai that offers a lifestyle like never before, inspiring all day and night.

title: Quattro Del Mar
description:
Quattro Del Mar is a waterfront residential complex located on Hayat Island, in the upcoming Mina Al Arab area. Developed by RAK Properties, this premium project comprises 4 towers, with a total of 880 fabulous units.

Proposed properties within the development include studios, 1-bedroom suites, 1-bedroom premium units, and 2-3 bedroom apartments. For those seeking more spacious residences, there are also 3-bedroom penthouses and 2-3 bedroom sky duplexes & garden townhouses available.

The living areas of the properties range from a cosy 413 sq. ft to a generous 4,623 sq. ft, ensuring ample space for all residents. Moreover, the residences offer breathtaking views of the lagoon and the sea from their balconies and terraces, adding to the overall appeal of the complex. Please note that select units also come with a maid’s room for the utmost convenience of owners.

title: Fashionz by Danube
description:
Fashionz by Danube: A Luxury Lifestyle

Due to its style and elegance, Fashionz by Danube stands apart in Dubai's real estate market. The reputable Danube Properties designed this unique residential complex to satisfy the modern lifestyle demands of its residents. The project, which is now in the planning stages, is anticipated to be finished by Q1-2027 and will have a variety of luxurious amenities.

A Peek into Fashionz by Danube

The prestigious Jumeirah Village Triangle neighborhood is home to Fashionz by Danube. It provides studio, one-, two, and three-bedroom apartments, all of which are tastefully and comfortably designed. The project is the first FashionTV-branded residence in Dubai, making it a magnificent residence for lovers of fashion and style.

These apartments start at a price of 850,000, which is a fantastic deal for a high-end lifestyle in a prominent setting. A variety of unit sizes will be offered, including .

- studio apartments that are between 347 to 529 square feet

- one-bedroom apartments that are between 759 to 873 square feet

- two-bedroom apartments that are 1078 to 1177 square feet

- three-bedroom apartments that are 1472 square feet

Architectural Excellence and Luxury Amenities

The architecture of Fashionz by Danube is both gorgeous and modern. Every residence in this community is a smart home, complete with modern amenities for a comfortable life. These properties are perfect living environments because of their absolutely stunning views:

Kids Pool
Swimming Pool
Kids Play Area
Jacuzzi
Multi-Purpose Court

title: Aeternitas
description:
London Gate new launch Aeternitas is located at Dubai Marina, set to be the tallest residential clock tower in the world with luxury residential options as off-plan apartments. This esteemed residential development seamlessly combines sophistication, class, and lifestyle, enhancing your living experience to unparalleled heights.

Aeternitas London Gate in Dubai Marina will be graced with commanding views of the city’ skyline and waterfronts. This 450 meter high-rise tower distinguishes itself by positioning maximum units to overlook the waterfront and skyline. This development warmly invites you to an impeccable home, introducing a lifestyle enriched with limitless opportunities.


This development will not only offer the eye-catching views, but provide a secure and welcoming atmosphere in the distinctive location of Dubai Marina. title: The Sustainable City
description:
Focused on sustainability and eco-conciousness, The Sustainable City Yas Island will be a premium community by Abu Dhabi’s largest listed developer; Aldar Properties, in collaboration with Diamond Developers. The grand development is located on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi and will feature a total of 864 condominiums and townhouses spread across 10 car-free residential clusters. All properties will be equipped with solar panels and biodomes in line with the ongoing sustainability trends.

The key features of the premium development can be found below:

Renewable energy
Waste separation
Low-flow water fixtures
EV charging stations
Communal e-buggies
Smart irrigation systems
In January 2023, as part of the first phase of The Sustainable City Yas Island, Aldar Properties launched 120 townhouses in 3 and 4-bedroom configurations and 128 condominiums with 1–3 bedroom layouts. Potential buyers can select between a dark and a light scheme to personalize the interiors of your dream home.

The properties in The Sustainable City Yas Island range in size from 721 sq. ft to 3,358 sq. ft. At the same time, the plot size of the townhouses averages around 2,551 sq. ft–2,852 sq. ft. When it comes to layouts, 1-2 bedroom condominiums and some townhouses will come with private gardens and terraces. On top of that, those living in 2–3 bedroom condominiums and townhouses will also have a staff room for their convenience. It is worth noting that 1 and 2-bedroom properties will be provided with access to 1 and 2 parking spaces respectively. Three-bedroom units and all townhouses will come with 3 parking spaces.

Alkaser, located on Yas Island, complements the fast-paced metropolitan lifestyle with its tranquil ambience. The property sprawls across rich landscapes and luxurious foliage, providing homeowners with a serene haven. Whether you enjoy leisurely strolls or prefer relaxing in beautifully planted gardens, Alkaser guarantees a rejuvenating atmosphere for the mind, body, and spirit.

Celebrate Active Living

The Alkaser way of life entails much more than simply living comfortably. It's about maintaining an active lifestyle in opulent surroundings. The development has a cutting-edge fitness facility outfitted with cutting-edge technology. Residents may continue their health journey without compromising with Alkaser.

Unmatched Privacy and Security

Alkaser values its people's privacy and security. The property is intended to provide a stress-free environment in which inhabitants may enjoy the panoramic canal views without being concerned about security.

Project Specifications

 Alkaser is currently under construction and is expected to be completed by Q2-2026.The project includes a variety of unit kinds, including:

 While pricing information is not yet available, it is worth mentioning that Alkaser provides an unrivaled lifestyle experience, making it a worthwhile investment for future homebuyers.

Discover the Alkaser Advantage

Living in Alkaser offers its residents an array of advantages. Its prime location on Yas Island ensures close proximity to the city's key landmarks. With an assortment of luxury amenities, Alkaser guarantees a lifestyle marked by comfort,

title: Royal Park
description:
Royal Park at Masdar City, Abu Dhabi is a wide-spread residential development by Reportage Properties that features 1, 2 & 4-bedroom apartments and 4-bedroom penthouses & townhouses. This is a strategically planned project that settles in the lush landscapes with distinctive and urban homes adorned with panoramic views of a central park. It is a contemporary architectural infrastructure with endless luxurious charm of world-class amenities and exceptional lifestyle.


Key Highlights:

Exquisite range of 1, 2 & 4 bedroom apartments and 4 bedroom townhouses and penthouses

Total of 6 clusters with 844 home units

The low-rise buildings with a ground, 2 basements, & 8 floors

Stunning views of Central Park & surrounded by schools, mosques, & community retail areas

Integrated wellness & recreational facilities with elegant communal areas

title: The Source 2
description:
The Source II: A Luxurious Residential Complex in Saadiyat Grove

Imagine living in a residential complex that combines elegant design with premium amenities. That's exactly what The Source II by Aldar Properties PJSC offers. Nestled in the heart of Saadiyat Grove on Saadiyat Island, this residential complex is the epitome of luxury and comfort. 

Splendid Living Spaces

The Source II is an architectural marvel with a structure housing residential units. Buyers have the opportunity to select from various sizes of apartments.

Furthermore, the apartments boast of:

- Panoramic windows for ample sunlight

- Private balconies with views of the emirate's new landmark — Zayed National Museum

- Laundry rooms and built-in wardrobes in bedrooms

- Maid’s room in some two-bedroom and all three-bedroom residences

Prime Location

The location of The Source II is noteworthy as it offers residents quick access to the most sought-after locations around the Emirates. You are never far away from the bustling city life, yet you can enjoy the tranquility that Saadiyat Island offers.

A Range of Housing Options

The Source II caters to a variety of residential needs. The project includes the following unit types:

1 Bedroom Apartment
 2 Bedroom Apartment
3 Bedroom Apartment
A Wealth of Amenities

Residents of The Source II will enjoy a wealth of prestigious amenities, including:

- State-of-the-art gymnasium

- Swimming pool

- Kids play area

- Landscaped gardens

- 24-hour security and concierge service

Project Status and Delivery

The Source II is currently under construction with an expected delivery date in Q4-2026. The careful blend of design, location, and amenities make The Source II not just a residential complex, but a lifestyle destination.

Conclusion

The Source II by Aldar Properties PJSC is more than just a residential complex. It's a community designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. From its prime location on Saadiyat Island to its wide range of housing options and luxury amenities, The Source II is an ideal place to call home.

title: The Source
description:
Discover the epitome of wellness living at The Source by Aldar Properties, an innovative development nestled in the heart of Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi with 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments. This low-rise community is more than just a residential project; it's a holistic approach to living, where every aspect is tailored to enhance your physical and mental well-being.


The development marks Aldar's venture into 'Wellness' developments in the UAE, featuring modern design residences at ease. Designed responsibly with sustainability in mind, these homes boast a 2 Pearl Estidama rating, reflecting reduced carbon emissions and the use of green building technology. The emphasis on sustainable materials and locally sourced components contributes to a positive environmental impact.


Residents not only experience the tranquility within their homes but also benefit from a range of amenities designed for holistic well-being. From the rooftop Zen Garden and Yoga space to squash courts and a thermal suite with a sauna and steam room, every detail is crafted to foster a sense of balance. The community gym, panoramic pool, and wellness concierge further enhance the overall wellness experience.


Connected to the rich cultural district of Saadiyat Island, it offers proximity to renowned landmarks like the Guggenheim Abu Dhabi, Zayed National Museum, Louvre Abu Dhabi, and more. Residents can explore kilometers of walkways, running tracks, and beaches against the backdrop of world-class museums, creating a cultural playground right at their doorstep.


Residents will have access to a full suite of amenities, including yoga, Pilates, and meditation rooms, gyms, pools, thermal suites, saunas, squash courts, and an exclusive residents' lounge. The façade stands as a beacon of well-being in the heart of Saadiyat Grove, blending sustainability, cultural richness, and personalized living to create a community that resonates with those seeking a holistic and enriched lifestyle.


Key Highlights:

Choose from 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments with customizable interior finishing themes.

Immerse yourself in a community designed for holistic well-being offering an elegant lifestyle.

Enjoy breathtaking vistas of Zayed National Museum and cultural landmarks from your home.

Elevate your lifestyle with yoga spaces, meditation rooms, and state-of-the-art fitness facilities.

Experience an elevated living environment with carefully selected materials and bioorganic architecture.

title: Nobu Residences
description:
Introduction

Nobu Residences is the newest high end residential project by acclaimed developers Aldar Properties. This exclusive development combines the bespoke design and unique vision of world renowned brands Aldar and Nobu, along with a team of globally recognised architects and designers. Together, they've crafted a new standard in luxury living, offering an unparalleled blend of modern design and traditional craftsmanship.

A Masterpiece of Design    

Nobu Residences is a triumph of architectural ingenuity and interior design. The residences beautifully merge Nobu’s renowned minimalism with a warm palette of natural materials and finishes. The design is crafted to stimulate your senses and create a sanctuary of tranquility in each one to three bedroom residence, two bedroom loft, and the expansive four bedroom sky villas and penthouses. 

Refined Interiors: A Union of Tradition and Modernity    

The interiors at Nobu Residences are a testament to the timeless allure of natural textures and colours. You'll find a harmonious blend of wood, stone, and glass, interspersed with contemporary materials such as leather, linen, and metal. This delicate balance results in spaces that exude sophistication and warmth, further enhanced by the use of subtle, strategic lighting.

Prime Location: At the Heart of Saadiyat Island’s Cultural District    

Nestled in Saadiyat Island’s vibrant cultural district, Nobu Residences presents an exclusive beachfront community that's surrounded by some of the world's most iconic cultural landmarks. Residents will have access to the likes of the Louvre Abu Dhabi, Natural History Museum, Guggenheim Abu Dhabi, and the Zayed National Museum. To top it all, the pristine beaches and protected coastal areas will add to the serene and luxurious lifestyle.

A Rich Selection of Units    

Nobu Residences flaunts a broad range of properties to suit different lifestyles and preferences, from compact yet luxurious one bedroom units to opulent four bedroom penthouses. All residences are designed with the same painstaking attention to detail and premium finishes.

title: Yas Golf Collection
description:
The Yas Golf Collection project launched in 2022. The resort community is located on Yas Island and consists of mid-rise residential complexes. A total of five clusters with 1,062 residential units are slated to launch here. Developer Aldar Properties has announced the project’s completion by 2025.

The first phase of development is represented by Souq Furnished Apartments. It consists of four buildings in traditional style. Distinctive features include classic courtyards and small canopied balconies.

Souq Furnished Apartments features furnished studios and 1-bedroom apartments. Unfurnished 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom apartments are also available. The layout includes a staff room.

Property sizes at Souq Furnished Apartments range from 452 to 2,981 sq. ft. Potential buyers can choose the colour palette of the interior based on their personal wishes.

The buildings will have views of the Yas Links golf course, the sea and mangroves, and the complex is equipped with smart home systems.

In Q1 2023, Aldar Properties released the second phase of Yas Golf Collection called Yas Golf Collection Views. The newest phase offers 122 fully-furnished studios and 1-3 bedroom apartments of 463 sq. ft to 3,003 sq. ft in size. The units come with 3 different views, including Yas Links views, a sea view and a garden view. These residences are designed for Airbnb, which is perfect for those interested in earning a passive income.

The community has excellent infrastructure for recreation and sports. There are swimming pools, landscaped gardens, and fitness centres, as well as walking and jogging paths around the buildings. For children, there are playgrounds outside and playrooms inside the buildings.

title: Saadiyat Lagoons
description:
Nestled on the coveted Saadiyat Island, Saadiyat Lagoons – Clusters 5A & 2B is part of the ever popular Saadiyat Lagoons project, designed exclusively for UAE nationals. The project is being created by Aldar Properties, who is the largest listed developer in the capital. Within this phase, there are a total of 206 residential units, namely 4–6 bedroom mangrove villas with either a minimalistic design or a pitched roof design. The construction of the project is set to begin in Q2 2023.

The total size of the properties range from 4,962 sq. ft to 6,415 sq. ft. To customize your home, you are provided with an option to choose from a cool or a warm colour scheme, and on top of that, there are Standard and Premium packages which offer different finishes and appliances. The Premium variation offers a smart home package with 1 main door key-pad entry with a key, 1 doorbell with a camera and 2 external security cameras. At the same time, the Standard option will include only provisions for smart home solutions.

title: Yas Park Views
description:
Yas Park Views is the newest gated community designed by Aldar Properties, who is the main developer of Abu Dhabi. Located on Yas Island; the most attractive destination in the UAE`s capital, the project offers a host of recreational venues, exclusive amenities, and services, all in one place.

The project will be handed over in the beginning of 2026 and will include 211 stylish 3-5 bedroom standalone luxurious villas. Yas Park Views earned its name from its close proximity to the vast 1,399,000 sq. ft Yas Park. The park has promenades, picnic zones, sports courts and jogging tracks which all bring calmness and solitude to life surrounded by lush landscapes.

On the other hand, the green environment is mixed with the endless fun epicenter of Yas Island. The community will benefit from its prime location next to some of the world’s most famous theme parks, including Ferrari World Abu Dhabi, Yas Waterworld and Warner Brothers World Abu Dhabi. Yas Island can provide every aspect of a luxurious lifestyle from the white sands of Yas Beach to the best shopping in Yas Mall, as well as the dining and recreational activities in Yas Marina.

Yas Park Views offers 2-storey Mediterranean style family homes ranging in size from 2,077 sq. ft to 3,186 sq. ft. Villas will be available with various types of interior design to choose from – in light or dark colours. Each villa’s floor plan will include 3-5 bedrooms, an additional maid’s bedroom and a covered garage. Residents will also enjoy a spacious backyard with a garden and a private pool.

Each residence will be designed according to the latest sustainability standards, using environmentally friendly materials and equipment, such as high solar reflective roof coverings. The use of advanced ventilation and lighting systems will decrease consumption of all energy sources and emissions into the environment.

title: Ramhan Island
description:
Ramhan Island comes as the most grandeur development in Abu Dhabi, offering the unique opportunity to reside in an exclusive beachfront property surrounded by raw nature on a purpose built island. The USD 3.5B mega-project is the masterpiece of Mohamed Alabbar, who is the founder of the best-selling development company in Dubai; Emaar Properties. It is worth noting that Ramhan Island belongs to the portfolio of Mohamed Alabbar’s privately-owned real estate company called Eagle Hills.

Spanning across a colossal area of more than 43 million sq. ft, the flagship natural development will boast over 19 million sq. ft of an unrivaled sea channel. In line with the master plan, Ramhan Island will house 1,800 standalone waterfront villas and 900 premium marina residences, in addition to 120 luxury hotel keys and 120 residence keys. That said, there will be 4 distinctive villa communities

title: Manarat Living
description:
Manarat Living is an upscale residential development by Aldar Properties in the Cultural District of Saadiyat Island. The complex will feature a total of 273 units, namely studios and 1-2 bedroom apartments with living areas between 323 sq. ft–1,593 sq. ft. Select 2-bedroom residences will also have a maid’s room, whilst each property, except for some studios, will come with a private balcony. There will be 2 design schemes options for interior finishings called dark and light, which will allow you to customize your living spaces more to your own style.

Manarat Living will offer extraordinary views of Cranleigh Abu Dhabi, Reem Island, museums, the sea, and Manarat Al Saadiyat. Designed in line with the Estidama Pearl 2 standards, the residential complex will have an improved energy performance, interior water use reduction and will use recycled materials.

title: Sea La Vie
description:
Sea La Vie is a premium waterfront development on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, in the upscale Yas Bay location, and is the first project by the boutique developer; Nine Yards. The company was created through a partnership between Ethmar International Holding and Al Nahda International Holding. The master developer of the project is Miral.

The luxurious complex, located on a nearly 323,000 sq. ft beachfront site, will comprise 4 towers between 15–18 storeys in height with a common podium. The development will house 660 luxury residences, namely 1-4 bedroom apartments, 30 townhouses nestled along the promenade, 2 exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses, duplexes and lofts, as well as 5,372 sq. ft of retail space. The residential units range in size from 796 sq. ft to 6,835 sq. ft, including balconies.

The towers will be designed in an extraordinary triangular shape, providing the maximum number of residents with stunning waterfront and sea views. The stylish interiors of the residences are inspired by their natural surroundings, and will be designed in white, aqua and sand tones.

title: Fay Al Reeman 2
description:
Fay Al Reeman II is the second phase of Aldar Properties’ large-scale Fay Al Reeman community located in Abu Dhabi, in the Al Shamkha district, which is far from the bustling capital city. The project, presented in February 2023, is the latest addition to the Alreeman freehold area and will comprise 557 three–six bedroom villas ranging in size from 3,272 sq. ft to 5,238 sq. ft. All homes will be 2-storey’s with layouts including balconies, terraces, indoor and outdoor majilis and a maid’s bedroom. Detached plots range in size from 5,705 sq. ft to 11,570 sq. ft and can be fitted with an optional private swimming pool. The residences will also have 2–5 parking spaces depending on their size.

Villas will be unfurnished so you can customize the living spaces to your liking. For the maximum comfort of residents, all residences will be equipped with DX split air-conditioning systems. The community is focused on sustainability and has been awarded 2 pearls in Estidama’s sustainability rating system. Specifically, the building will use highly reflective roofing material, low-emission paint and adhesives, LED lighting, a solar water heater and low-water consumption equipment.

Interested buyers and investors can choose from 2 types of villas (Modern and Contemporary) and two types of finishes — in light or dark tones. In addition, premium finishes are available, which include parquet flooring in the bedrooms and luxury porcelain stoneware flooring in the other rooms, natural stone staircase cladding, as well as other benefits. The premium furnishings will also include kitchen and laundry appliances, consisting of a washer and a dryer, a cooker hood, a microwave oven, a refrigerator and a dishwasher.

title: Perla 3
description:
Perla 3 is a complex with gorgeous waterfront views by the Reportage Properties development company. As of Q3 2023, the project is under construction, and the date of handover is expected to be in Q2 2027.

The development consists of a high-rise building housing 326 units, including a limited number of spacious four-bedroom townhouses. You can also choose from studios, junior apartments with one bedroom and apartments with 1–3 bedrooms. Residences in Perla 3 provide a huge amount of sunlight throughout the day that comes through the wide double-glazed windows.

The complex offers its residents a number of prestigious amenities to enjoy during their downtime. Entertainment facilities comprise a giant chess play area, a bocce play zone and an outdoor table tennis area. There are also several landscaped parks within Perla 3, such as the Art Garden, a Zen Garden and a Yoga Garden. The complex is pet-friendly and offers a special pet area, where you can spend time with your little friends.

title: Gardenia Bay
description:
